title: Disney Cast Life
description:
Disney Cast Life is an app that allows Disney employees and Cast Members to access features from the Disney HUB on the go. 

If you choose to download this experience, please consider this app contains:

* Social media links to connect with others
* The option to accept push notifications to let you know when we have exciting updates like new content
* Links to online stores to purchase real products
* Location-based services
* Advertising for some third parties
* As well as advertising for the Walt Disney Family of Companies

This app contains local notification alerts. You can disable local notifications in settings.

comments: This is just pitiful copy and paste from desktop view. The imagineers should have taken longer to actually create a worth while mobile app. Dont waste time and space downloading, use a regular web browser.
This is what I was asking for a long time ago but I finally have it. The app will perform any needs for cast members in a more convenient way. There is enough room to improve. Well done Disney! üëè

it's so prettyüòç super easy to navigate, I love the calendar, love having everything more easily accessible than searching through the hub, looking forward to any new features that get added in the future but for this being a brand new app, it's pretty great
All I can say is it's about time. I like the app so far.
Endless loop to sign in page. I'm unimpressed. Loaded to Android.

title: Cleanup Duplicate Contacts - Updated Contacts
description:
Cleanup Duplicate Contacts app will automatically suggest contact updates if any of the contacts in your address book have any changes in their contact information such as phone, work email, company, job title, location etc. The Updates are powered by our proprietary and secure AI Engine which discovers when important connection details change in your address book, and surfaces new contact info or updates so no contact information in your contact book becomes outdated. 
 
This mobile app runs automatically but you will stay in control. Before scanning your contacts, you can configure the merge level: only detect 100% matches or also detect several kinds of partial matching. After that, it will run a scan to check for all duplicate contacts. Once the scan is complete, it will present you with the results. You can then choose to remove all matching contacts from your address book or to merge only a sub-selection of the duplicates found.
 
We let you analyse your address book as many times as you need for free. Also, the full preview of duplicates and partial duplicates is free as we want to convince you of the power of our deduplication algorithm.
 
After you‚Äôve had a chance to review the suggested merges and we convince you that our algorithm does a great job, you'll be prompted to upgrade to the premium version. Once you upgrade the app once, you will be able to save later analysis results for free as often as you want.
 
Merging contacts happens automatically. All partially matching contact details will be merged under just one contact for better management. The contact management App also works flawlessly with multiple sources like Gmail and Outlook to keep all duplicate contacts centralised.
 
-- Cleanup Duplicate Contacts App Features --
# Instant Cleanup of Duplicate Contacts
# Choose the merge-level you need
# Very fast - 5000 contacts centralized in about 45 seconds
# Automatic contact update suggestions 
# Detailed reports of scanned results
# Automatic merging of duplicate contacts
# Manages multiple contact sources like Gmail and Outlook
# Creates a backup of your address book before cleaning
# Lets you easily restore backups or a part of a backup
# Save and export contacts from your phone as a .CSV file
 
The Cleanup Duplicate Contacts app will clean up your mobile address book within seconds and you'll be amazed. This app is the ultimate contact cleaner.
 
*****Awesome Customer Support*****
 
If you have any questions or suggestions, please contact us at support@circleback.com

CONTACT
More help:
For more information please visit https://circleback.zendesk.com/hc/en-us/categories/201880903-CleanUp-Dupes-FAQs or email us at support@circleback.com 

We love talking to our users! Feel free to send us any questions or suggestions you have!
Love what we‚Äôve done? We‚Äôre just getting started :)
Rate us in Google Play!

Got suggestions or issues? Email: support@circleback.com

title: PDF Viewer - PDF Reader
description:
PDF expert is a professional and free pdf app that helps you open and read pdf reader in the most convenient way. With our pdf-expert you can easily open pdf-reader by extremely easy operations.

Normal document files may display differently on different devices and browsers. Therefore, the use of pdf viewer format is gradually becoming popular, because pdf expert free are guaranteed to keep the original document format when opened. pdf reader free will help you open and read pdf file more conveniently and easily.

Fast PDF Reader App automatically finds documents and receipts in your photos and converts them to PDF files, so you don't have to. With all the features you need as a PDF reader free: PDF viewer for android, we will provide you with an ebook reader for the better. All your pdf documents in one place that supports all kinds of file formats. You can scan your document and photos to keep a digital copy of all these and easily share PDF docs with others. You can easily bookmark PDF files with a separate tab in the PDF viewer app. The Android pdf viewer app is your workhorse in the office for reading text or reading material when downloading PDF files. Support for documentation zooming, bookmarks, and the option to display the screen to help you have the best experience when using a PDF file with the PDF app for Android. PDF Reader & Viewer Document app is a professional PDF file manager.

PDF VIEWER feature:

- Quickly open and view PDF documents.
- A simple list of PDF files
- Search, scroll, and zoom in and out.
- Choose a single page or continuous scroll mode
- Bookmark PDF pages for future reference
- Go to the page number directly and see the page count and total pages
- Scroll PDF Documents page by page

Use it as your default PDF viewer or PDF reader and directly view PDF files from file manager, email, cloud or web in this PDF reader without having to open the app.
This PDF viewer is definitely the most efficient office and productivity tool for reading PDF files. Not only is this app an effective PDF reader but is also an instant all document reader.

Hopefully you will enjoy this amazing app. PDF Reader ‚Äì PDF Viewer is still in development period so your feedback is welcome. If you have any questions, don't hesitate to contact our support email
Thank you. Have a nice day ‚ù§Ô∏è

title: Microsoft OneDrive
description:
Microsoft OneDrive keeps your photos and files backed up, protected, synced, and accessible on all your devices. This OneDrive app lets you view and share OneDrive files, documents, and photos with friends and family. Plus, you can use the app to automatically back up your phone‚Äôs photos and videos. Start with 5 GB of free cloud storage or upgrade to a Microsoft 365 subscription to get 1 TB of storage.

Microsoft OneDrive offers the following features:

Back up photos & videos
‚Ä¢ Automatic photo backup when you turn on Camera Upload
‚Ä¢ Find photos easily thanks to automatic tagging
‚Ä¢ View photos on your phone, computer, and online

File sharing and access
‚Ä¢ Share files, photos, videos, and albums with friends and family
‚Ä¢ Get notifications when a shared document is edited
‚Ä¢ Set password-protected or expiring sharing links*
‚Ä¢ Access selected OneDrive files on the app without being online

Document Scanning
‚Ä¢ Scan, sign, and send docs right from the OneDrive mobile app
‚Ä¢ Scan and markup docs, receipts, whiteboards, and more

Search
‚Ä¢ Search photos by what‚Äôs in them (i.e. beach, snow, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Search docs by name or content

Security
‚Ä¢ All OneDrive files are encrypted at rest and in transit
‚Ä¢ Personal Vault lets you protect your important files with identity verification
‚Ä¢ Restore files with version history
‚Ä¢ Stay protected with ransomware detection & recovery*

Works with Microsoft Word, Excel, PowerPoint, OneNote, Outlook
‚Ä¢  Use Microsoft Office apps to edit and collaborate in real time on Word, Excel, PowerPoint and OneNote files stored in OneDrive.
‚Ä¢  Back up, view, and save your Office documents.

The OneDrive app for Android offers 5 GB of free cloud storage to sync photos and files across your devices, share photos and docs, and keep your digital life backed up in the cloud.

Upgrade to a Microsoft 365 subscription
With a Microsoft 365 Personal subscription you get 1TB of storage (1TB of storage per person for up to 6 people with the Family subscription), OneDrive premium features, and access to all features in Word, Excel, PowerPoint, Outlook, and OneNote on mobiles devices, web browsers, PCs and Macs. 

To make an in-app purchase of a Microsoft 365 Personal or Family subscription: open the app, tap the Me tab, then tap your storage or the diamond icon. Subscriptions begin at $6.99 a month in the US, and can vary by region. Microsoft 365 subscriptions and OneDrive standalone subscriptions purchased from the app will be charged to your Google Play store account and will automatically renew within 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription period, unless auto-renewal is disabled beforehand. 

To manage your subscriptions or to disable auto-renewal, after purchase, go to your Google Play store account settings. A subscription cannot be cancelled or refunded during the active subscription period.

Using this OneDrive app for work or school
For you to sign into your work or school account on OneDrive, your organization needs to have a qualifying OneDrive, SharePoint Online or Microsoft 365 business subscription plan. 
 
Privacy
This app is provided by Microsoft. Data provided through the use of this store and this app may be accessible to Microsoft and transferred to, stored, and processed in the United States or any other country where Microsoft or its affiliates maintain facilities. 
 
Privacy Policy: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=507539 
Terms of Use: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/p/?LinkID=246338 

*Requires Microsoft 365 Personal or Family subscription

developerAddress: One Microsoft Way
recentChanges: You can now display your media files on a Chromecast receiver or TV from a compatible device. Look for a Cast icon showing in the top toolbar. We hope you enjoy this top-requested feature!
comments: The storage is large enough for me to store my pictures. However even though my connection is very well, my pictures and videos never load. No matter how good my internet connection is. And I cannot download them back, it always says something like "Unable to download" If I could I would use another cloud app, but I'm unable to do so now, thanks OneDrive

When it uploads from my laptop it's great. When it decides it's not going to upload anymore, it's worthless to me. Not to mention dangerous to the files I need backed up. I followed every instruction I can find to get things to upload without any luck. The last time this happened it just started working again for seemingly no reason at all. Aw, I live for the good old days when you could actually get product support from Microsoft. As it is I need to find another storage solution :/

I've never been one for making an effort to save photographs so going digital was great until I lost all my pics when my phone got damaged. Now I have one drive I have no more problems. every photo saved without having to remember to save. I've made story books, used effects, found photos by time and place. And I can access them on any device any where and send and share. And I feel save having them on one drive. So for me it's fantastic.

Well, it works, I can access my OneDrive. But it sure is a no frills, bargain basement app. No ability to set a uniform default view or a default sorting option across all folders. No option to set folders or documents as favourites for easy access. No option to add a folder or document to the desktop. Basically, the app manages to suck despite the fact it actually works.

I love being able to access my files from anywhere. If you know how to save a file to your computer you can use onedrive. If you have it saved under onedrive on your computer it will be accessible. You can see, and edit your documents right on your app as well. The one thing I don't like is how it saves my pictures. The information it shows is the date when I uploaded it. I want to see when the picture was taken. It is still in the right order, but it is still annoying.

title: Google Slides
description:
Create, edit, and collaborate on presentations from your Android phone or tablet with the Google Slides app. With Slides, you can:

- Create new presentations or edit existing ones
- Share presentations and collaborate in the same presentation at the same time
- Work anywhere, anytime - even offline
- Add and respond to comments
- Add and rearrange slides, format text and shapes, and more
- Present straight from your mobile device
- Never worry about losing your work ‚Äì everything is saved automatically as you type
- Make beautiful slides, instantly - with smart suggestions
- Present slides to video calls - scheduled meetings will automatically appear
- Open, edit, and save PowerPoint files

Google Slides is part of Google Workspace: where teams of any size can chat, create, and collaborate.

Google Workspace subscribers have access to additional Google Slides features, including:
- Collaborating on a single presentation online with your business partner, your whole team, or external contacts. You control who gets permission to edit, view, or just add comments.
- Starting from scratch or expediting the process by choosing a template. You can enhance your presentations with videos, images, drawings, and smooth transitions.
- Working across PCs, Macs, mobiles, and tablets‚ÄîView or even present your slides from your phone or tablet, so you always have the option to practice your presentation up until the last minute.

Learn more about Google Workspace: https://workspace.google.com/products/slides/

Follow us for more:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/googleworkspace
Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/showcase/googleworkspace
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/googleworkspace/

Permissions Notice
Calendar: This is used to join video calls from calendar invites.
Camera: This is used for camera mode in video calls and to insert images taken with the camera.
Contacts: This is used to give suggestions of people to add to files and share with.
Microphone: This is used to transmit audio in video calls.
Storage: This is used to insert images and to open files from USB or SD storage.

comments: Up until a week ago everything was fine. I simply needed to tap on the slide, and it would automatically advance to the next slide. After the update I have to gently, ever so gently swipe left to get it to advance a slide. Not swipe right, not tap, not top on the right side. Swipe left very very carefully. Super annoying

Very good app for the ones who like to make presentations. Drive is not better than this, because in drive it really stuck like if you want to delete a file then it won't be deleted. And will say that something error. But Google Slides is the best app if you want to delete a file then you can delete it easily by not asking that an error occurred. The most awesome app. Thanks Google team!
It is very attractive and easy app it is free but it has some issues like it stops opening and keep loading for hour other gslides is the best app for presentation works .
Although the app is very good and easy to use. But I wish there should be a marker feature while presenting so it would become easy to explain
Clean UI and easy to use. I can't stop laughing on the dark mode, whole Google's dark mode is a joke.

title: Pikmykid Parent
description:
Introducing the new 2021 Pikmykid app!

Manage your kid‚Äôs pick-up from school or child-care center. ‚ÄúAnnounce‚Äù your arrival to pick up your kid, Schedule carpools, Delegate pick-up duties to friends and family, Get real time alerts on bus-riders, after school programs and more‚Ä¶

Pikmykid brings you the power to manage your kid‚Äôs pick-up schedule and talk to your school directly from your App. Listed below are the functionalities:-

Automatically sequence your car in the car arrival queue
‚ÄúAnnounce‚Äù all the kids you are picking up including those delegated to you.
Schedule the dismissal for each school day in a calendar
Schedule and manage car pools 
Get real time status updates on your kid‚Äôs dismissal
Delegate pick up duties to friends & family with time bound authentications
Easy & quick child-care pick-ups
Real time alerts when kid boards the school bus/departs for after-school program
Real time alerts when the bus is running late
Secure mobile authentication protocol for kids safety and security
Last minute change to pick-up mode or early dismissal is easy to manage

Pikmykid is a comprehensive end to end solution for managing the entire student dismissal process in a smart, secure & expeditious manner and provide real time updates and change management options to parents. Ask you school if they are using the Pikmykid application yet?

recentChanges: Usability enhancements and bug fixes
comments: I'd give it 0 stars if I could. Spins and spins, force closes over and over...support within the app doesn't work. Email support told me it looked all set up and linked me to their training videos. Thanks, if your training videos answered my questions and resolved the continuous spinning and force closing, I wouldn't have emailed support in the first place! Not looking forward to using this app this year, nor looking forward to teaching my kids 60-something year old grandparents how to use it.
Deleted my kid after a week when the school switched school years. App has bugs in support pages, so no actual way to have it fixed. Had to uninstall and reinstall app to fix.
Prepare for "the blue wheel of death" with this app. It constantly crashes. How does this app even have 2.3 stars? All I see is one star ratings for all that have reviewed this app.
Effing Useless. 1st day of school, app won't load, just spins, then screens are blank, no idea if it's working,I'd have done better to wave a homemade sign.
TERRIBLE! I hope my kids school did not pay to use this service. If they did they better ask for a refund! Would give 0 stars or negative if I could. Schools looking to use this service DO NOT DO IT!

title: QR & Barcode Reader
description:
QR & Barcode Reader is a modern QR code scanner and barcode scanner with all the features you need.

Scan any QR code or barcode to get additional information including results from popular online services; Amazon, eBay and Google - 100% FREE!

ALL COMMON FORMATS
Scan all common barcode formats: QR, Data Matrix, Aztec, UPC, EAN, Code 39 and many more.

RELEVANT ACTIONS
Open URLs, connect to WiFi hotspots, add calendar events, read VCards, find product and price information, etc.

SECURITY AND PERFORMANCE
Protect yourself from malicious links with Chrome Custom Tabs featuring Google Safe Browsing technology and profit from shorter loading times.

MINIMAL PERMISSIONS
Scan an image without giving access to your device storage. Even share contact data as QR code without giving access to your address book!

SCAN FROM IMAGES
Detect codes within picture files or scan directly using the camera.

FLASHLIGHT AND ZOOM
Activate the flashlight for reliable scans in dark environments and use pinch-to-zoom to read barcodes even from far distances.

CREATE AND SHARE

title: Helium Hotspot
description:
Helium is a secure, smartphone app wallet for onboarding Hotspots, managing your Helium balance, viewing token earnings, and sending Helium tokens quickly between friends. 

An account that is completely yours. Helium accounts are generated with 12 unique words that only you know. This means you are in complete control of who can access your account. 

Set up Hotspots in Minutes
Set up your Hotspot in minutes with Helium. Once you‚Äôve created an account, simply pair your Hotspot with the Helium app, connect to Wi-Fi, and specify your Hotspot location. 

Manage one or many Hotspots 
With the Helium app it doesn‚Äôt matter if you need to manage one or many Hotspots, it can support dozens or even hundreds of Hotspots.

comments: In general, the app is okay from a navigational point of view, but even this is not intuitive and takes some time to get around. What is really troubling, is that the discovery mode has never worked for as long as I have had this from the first version to the current one. Every time I hit the discovery mode button apparently a signal goes out but they're never any hot spots that respond. The number is always zero. When I go to check the witnesses though there is a non-zero number, like 14

Since new update the app has crashed twice. Also terrible new user experience. It went from being great to all over the place. Right-hand use is really bad when trying to scroll down. Always touches the stats bars and takes from 14 day to the accidental day you touched when trying to scroll. When I click on a miner there is so much space left from the top. üëé
Updates have improved the app a lot. Is it possible to choose a preferred currency? Also, after searching for a hotspot name, the selection window won't close and blocks everything under it.
Was enjoying this app as I await my Hotspot until recent updates. The map is worthless now - the streets are all unlabeled lines now and you can't zoom in close enough to discern where you live.

Having issues with the discovery mode stuck on search and never showing results. Someone mentioned reinstalling the app to solve this issue. Now the discovery mode is completely gone.... Any suggestions? App works great other than that.

title: Google Docs
description:
Create, edit, and collaborate with others on documents from your Android phone or tablet with the Google Docs app. With Docs you can:

- Create new documents or edit existing files
- Share documents and collaborate in the same document at the same time.
- Work anywhere, anytime - even offline
- Add and respond to comments.
- Never worry about losing your work ‚Äì everything is saved automatically as you type.
- Search the web and your files in Drive, right from Docs
- Open, edit, and save Word documents and PDFs.

Google Docs is part of Google Workspace: where teams of any size can chat, create, and collaborate.

Google Workspace subscribers have access to additional Google Docs features, including:
- Working in a single document with teammates or people outside your company. See edits as others type, communicate through built-in chat, and leave feedback through comments and suggestions
- Importing your documents to make them instantly editable, including Microsoft¬Æ Word and PDF files. Export your work in .docx, .pdf, .odt, .rtf, .txt or .html format
- Unlimited version history. Track changes made to your documents and undo anything you choose.
- Working across devices, with or without Internet

Learn more about Google Workspace: https://workspace.google.com/products/docs/

Follow us for more:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/googleworkspace
Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/showcase/googleworkspace
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/googleworkspace/

Permissions Notice
Contacts: This is used to give suggestions of people to add to files and share with.
Storage: This is used to save and open files on USB or SD storage.

recentChanges: * Bug fixes and performance improvements
comments: A pretty good word processor for mobile. I enjoy using it for writing, and local saving of documents is helpful. However, it can be a little janky with loading large files, and the italics button (which I use quite often for my creative writing) on Android is now squirreled away in a hard-to-find, unhelpful location, and was replaced with the checklist button. If not for that small gripe, I'd give five stars.

I gave it five stars, because it has made things easier with my disability. However, voice to text seems to fail me often, which isn't exactly the apps issue. I have experienced multiple moments where the app freezes, and won't let me open until connecting to a Wi-Fi network. That is always a bit odd being as my mobile data is available. Not to mention, a bit annoying. There are no ads, but I have it set up this way through my settings.

It's kind of like Google drive was a while ago. It's a great app but it's buggy. As soon as you've got a bit too many files they start to have problems with snycing. As I scroll down they load and glitch out. Sometimes the files don't even show and I have to look for them in the search bar. Now it's worse than it's ever been, files that should be "available online" simply don't open. This didn't use to happen..

This would've been five stars last year, but there are two things that are spoiling my experience. First, when my friend and I update our documents, her updates don't fully load for me unless she opens them a second time. Please fix this. Second, the italics button has been moved from the bottom bar to the much less intuitive top button. These extra steps are unnecessary and annoying. Please put it back where it was.

The offline access problem discussed in the most recent reviews started on 30 June after an update to this app. Prior to that I had no problem accessing offline files. I've reported this bug twice but it still has not been fixed in the latest update today. Very disappointed by Google's lack of response to this bug. Here is the exact error that occurs even after just creating a new offline file: Can't open this document This file isn't currently available offline

title: Cozi Family Organizer
description:
Cozi Family Organizer is the surprisingly simple way to manage everyday family life. With a shared calendar, reminders, grocery list and more, Cozi is a 3-time Mom‚Äôs Choice Award Winner and The TODAY Show ‚Äúmust-have app‚Äù for a better life.

Cozi is free, easy to use, and available from any mobile device or computer.

FAMILY CALENDAR
‚Ä¢ Keep track of everyone‚Äôs schedules in one place with a simple color-coded calendar
‚Ä¢ Set reminders for yourself or others in the family so no one misses practice or an important event
‚Ä¢ Send automated daily or weekly agenda emails to any family member
‚Ä¢ Subscribe to other calendars you use like your work calendar, school calendars, personal calendars, and team schedules.

SHOPPING LISTS & TO DO LISTS
‚Ä¢ Everyone in the family will always know what you need at the grocery store
‚Ä¢ See items added by other family members in real time, and never forget the one thing you really need to make dinner
‚Ä¢ Create to do lists for anything - a shared to do list for the whole family, chore checklists for the kids, a vacation packing checklist.

RECIPE BOX
‚Ä¢ Organize all your recipes in one place that's accessible anytime, anywhere - at home or at the store
‚Ä¢ Add ingredients to your shopping list quickly and schedule meals onto your calendar
‚Ä¢ Cook from your phone with helpful features like the no-dim button that keeps your screen on while you're cooking

WIDGETS
Home screen widgets give you quick access to your family calendar, shopping lists and to do lists. 

MORE ABOUT COZI
‚Ä¢ Your Cozi calendar, shopping lists, to do items, and recipe box are accessible from any mobile device or computer
‚Ä¢ No matter where or how your family signs in to Cozi, everyone will be looking at the same information
‚Ä¢ The whole family shares one account that everyone can access using their own email address (as specified in Settings) and the shared family password
‚Ä¢ International users please note: This is the U.S. version of Cozi Family Organizer and not all features may function as expected. 

COZI GOLD
All the features listed above are free. Cozi also offers an optional ad-free premium subscription called Cozi Gold which gives you additional features like Birthday Tracker, more reminders, mobile month view, change notifications and more. 

NOTE: If you experience any problems with your Cozi app, please don't hesitate to contact us directly at cozi.com/support. We're unable to help if you only leave a comment in the app store. Our support team is top notch and we want to help you!

comments: Great app overall. 3 stars due to a simple yet absent feature: the ability to quickly reorder lists - alphabetising, for example. This would quickly eliminate the issue with duplicate items/having to scroll through the list, over and over, saving much time and frustration. This really should have been introduced along side the ability to make lists in the first place. 5/5 for everything else.

I love this app. Returned 2 would after about a year long high eighties because life got busy hence I realized I needed it again. I use it coordinate schedules from my husband's son and self. I really hate that they took away the journal aspect because it was my means to share share without using social media what was happening with my family with extended family. There are a lot of glitches in which you just have to keep uninstalling and then reinstalling the app. I don't like that you can't s

I use this app solely for recipes and meal planning. It is super easy to save recipes that I find on line. It is also very easy to edit records. The improvements that I would like to see are 1) Being able to make folders so I can easily find recipes for Holidays, soups, vegetarian dishes, etc. 2) Be able to delete an individual item from the calendar, instead of all or nothing. 3) Be able to add recipes to a calendar where you can see what else is on there for the day.

I've used my Cozi app for several years, and had upgraded to the Gold level for the past 2-3 years. Though I used several Lists, To Do's, the Calendar, and Birthdays features... my favorite feature, Journal, is no longer supported and I'm really missing it. Within that feature I stored a wide variety of important information to be accessed wherever I needed it. As my renewal date is approaching, I'm not sure that I'll want to pay the same subscription price and may look elsewhere.

The calendar is strange. I can't sync it with Google . I guess I have outgrown the app because I don't have kids' schedules to juggle plus, my kids, they're not " in " to email it's all about text.I love the grocery list part. Maybe I just need to use it more?.

title: TaskTree by RadCollab
description:
This all started as a comment that lead to a community that lead to a simple but powerful productivity app.

TaskTree allows you to create tasks with icons, time, durations, frequencies, and dates. You sort those into Lists which can be 7 different colors and 3 unique layouts. You can place your Lists into Tabs as well.
Widgets pull data from different lists and fit amongst them. There‚Äôs a customizable pomodoro timer, a mood tracker that compares your mood to your task completions, a incremental tracker, a sticky notepad, and a calendar! Oh, btw, those can all be the same 7 colors and have 3 unique layouts as well.

We‚Äôre just getting started and have a long roadmap that we‚Äôre excited to implement! Join the RadCollab community on TikTok @_radcollab.

So far Im enjoying the app, helps me keep track of my extra shifts, one thing thats missing for me is being able to set the frequency to every second week, to keep track of my work schedule but other than that its so far so good
Love many of the features of the app. Some UX has bad flow with back-button interaction. App askes for money every time it starts; this is simply too far.
Origanal 12/6/21: Doesnt allow me to save tasks, like none of the tasks save Edit 27/7/21: despite them saying it should be fix it still isnt and its really fustrating that it hasnt been fix

It's a beautiful app and I love the concept, but I cannot delete a single task, only the whole list or tab. It's frustrating to have to recreate an entire list because one task needs to be deleted. I also noticed that if you accidentally check of a task, then uncheck, under Data it still counts as done. Also, the button for bug reports or feedback doesn't do anything. Overall, I think it would work well for my ADHD brain, but there are some unexpected frustrations

title: Zillow Rental Manager
description:
Save time with everything you need to fill your vacancy ‚Äî from listing to leasing ‚Äî all in one place. Our easy-to-use tools let you list your property where over 34M visitors search each month. Once you find a renter, you can screen them and collect rent, entirely online.

Key Features:

‚Ä¢ Add, edit and publish your rental listings

‚Ä¢ Set your rent price

‚Ä¢ Add unlimited photos

‚Ä¢ Receive notifications as soon as a renter asks about your property and message them in the app

‚Ä¢ Accept rental applications

‚Ä¢ Get verifiable information about your applicant upfront, such as income and credit score

* Collect online rent payments

summary: Post to Zillow, Trulia and HotPads
developerAddress:
1301 Second Avenue, Floor 31,
Seattle, WA 98101
comments: Best rental app for house owners. Interface is awesome and easy to communicate with potential renters via the app.

Once you set it up I think the problems are minor. I had difficulty with typing description under each photo. The message box there kept disappearing and it would flash with every keystroke. You could type the a whole sentence and it would not appear for a bit. It was very unstable. I was using i a windows laptop. Took forever then the captions are no visible on the phone app. IAlso had problems up loading photos on my Android phone. I could only add 1 picture at a time.very time consuming
great app. I will admit I was taken aback when billing started on listings but I understand; its business

It's a good first start. We have 7 rental homes that we have used Zillow over the last 5 years to find tenants. Not surprised that it moved to a fee based service.. What I like: Screening candidates. Cross advertising (Hotpads...) What I don't like: Very difficult to track who you have contacted No canned responses. Only setup to accept tenants not deny, 90% of our applicants don't meet our minimum requirements. Have to pay for the service Need single point of contact for multiple applicants
Well organized, great features... easy to figure out.

title: ID.me Authenticator
description:
ID.me Authenticator is a simple and free Two Factor Authentication (2FA) solution for your ID.me account. It keeps your online accounts secure on websites that support 2FA. This app generates 6-digit Time-Based One-Time Passwords (TOTP) and PUSH notification based one-touch authentication.

ID.me Authenticator as a TOTP Code Generator: Signing into your account requires your username, password and a verification code that you can generate using this app. Once configured, you can get verification codes without the need for a network or cellular connection when this app is used as a TOTP code generator. You can enroll and connect ID.me Authenticator to your account for 2FA by scanning the QR code at setup time.

ID.me Authenticator for PUSH based authentication: You enter your username and password when signing into your account, then approve the push notification sent to your phone. You will need to enroll and connect ID.me Authenticator to your ID.me account to enable this feature.

comments: Just getting into it but it, seems pretty simple straight forward. No issues or complications. If you only have cell..will need a computer must Scan QR & On other Computer or Tablet must use USB Key Code they give ya. You can apply on phone. Android or Iphone. Just setting up Act. & being Verified It require Phone & Access to Other Device's.

Not only is the app worthless, the customer service is terrible. After multiple attempts to get identified I kept on being rejected and I did not receive the option of the trusted referee as per the website. So I sent an email to contact us. After a couple of days I got a reply with the same instructions I had already tried and never worked. They just insisted to keep trying and wasting my time. HORRIBLE

This site is terrible, I shake from a medical problem so I have difficulty holding my phone steady to take a photo. I tried numerous times only to be timed out once I had finally taken acceptable photos!?!? Very frustrating! I don't want to inconvenience someone else to take time out of their day to come take pictures for me just to check on the status of my advance child tax credit. I try to be as independent as possible but this site is completely preventing that! I'm extremely disappointed!

If I could give a zero star I absolutely would!!!! I have been attempting now for 10 days to verify through the app,it continues to say it can not verify my information. I send a ticket in after multiple times on day one with no reply until a week later, while waiting I tried several more times with no success still. When I finally received a response from someone (after ending up sending three ticket requests in over a period of one week) it was to tell me keep trying üôÑ

ID.me is a piteously poor-quality implementation of an automated facial and ID recognition platform. The text recognition alone is so poor that it failed to recognize my address and birthday in two separate places in two separate ways despite crystal clear digital camera images. It also failed to authenticate one of my documents, and doesn't support Google voice numbers. After misrecognizing text, it does not let you fix their error or modify the information. No reupload. Clunky video chat.

title: CamScanner - PDF Scanner App Free
description:
Looking for a free scanner app?
CamScanner will turn your device into a powerful portable scanner that recognizes text automatically (OCR) , and help you become more productive in your work and daily life. Download this scanner app for free to instantly scan, save, and share any document in PDF, JPG , Word or TXT formats.

Would you like to keep your entire office in your pocket and increase your productivity at work? 
Use CamScanner features to handle your paperwork with ease. Say goodbye to huge and ugly copy machines and get this ultra-fast scanner app for free now.

* CamScanner scanner app installed on over 500 million devices in over 200 countries around the world
* Over 500,000 new registrations per day

FEATURES:

*Quickly Digitize Document
Just use your phone camera to scan and digitize all kinds of paper documents: receipts, notes, invoices, whiteboard discussions, business cards, certificates, etc.

*Optimize Scan Quality
Smart cropping and auto enhancing ensures the texts and graphics in scanned documents are clear and sharp with premium colors and resolutions.

*Extract Texts from Image
OCR (optical character recognition) feature recognizes texts in document images and extract them from images for later searching, editing or sharing. (Premium only)

*Share PDF/JPEG Files
Easily share documents in PDF or JPEG format with friends via various ways: post on social media, send attachment or document download link through email.

*AirPrint & Fax Documents
Instantly print out any documents in CamScanner scanner app with nearby printer via AirPrint; directly select document and fax to over 30 countries from the app.

*Advanced Document Editing
Make annotations on documents with a full set of editing tools. Also adding customized watermarks are made available to mark your own documents.

*Quick Search
When you have plenty of documents, you can use Tags to categorize and easily find them. In addition, OCR for Search helps you find texts inside image and notes. Just enter one keyword, you can quickly find the document you want. (Registrants only)

*Secure Important Documents
If you want to protect confidential contents, you can set passcode for viewing important documents; also, while sending document download link, you can set password to protect others from seeing it.

*Sync across Platforms
Sign up to sync documents on the go. Just sign in to any smartphone, tablet or computer (visit www.camscanner.com ) and you can view, edit and share any document with our scanner app. (Registrants only)

UNLIMITED ACCESS MEMBERSHIP SUBSCRIPTION
* You can subscribe to get unlimited access to all app features
* Subscriptions are billed weekly, monthly, quarterly, or annually at the rate based on the subscription plan
* Payment will be charged to Google Play Store at confirmation of purchase
* Subscription renews automatically unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24 hours before the end of the current period
* Account will be charged for renewal within 24 hours prior to the end of the current period. The cost depends on the selected plan
* Subscriptions may be managed by the user, and auto-renewal may be turned off by going to the user's Account Settings after purchase
* Any unused portion of the free trial will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription

We‚Äôd love to hear your feedback: asupport@intsig.com
Follow us on Twitter: @CamScanner
Like us on Facebook: CamScanner
Follow us on Google+: CamScanner

recentChanges: Bug fixes
comments: Enjoyed the features and found the app very useful. However, lately the app always crashes whenever I type the name of a document in the search box after which everything freezes and I have to close the app. I tried restarting my phone but I'm encountering the same problem. I'll still give it 5 stars because of my past experience.

I have been using CamScanner for a few years now. This app is wonderful and reliable. I use it for my important documents. The features are great. I love how easy it is to save and to send various documents, files, images, etc. The added security options give me a sense of security as well. I recommend this app 100%. I plan on using CamScanner for years to come!

A great portable copier and pdf creator. Update 7/28/21 - The developers have continue to improve this app. For example, they have added new filters in addition to the ones that were already very good. The scan result is very clear even when scanning dingy looking documents.
Easy to use and the water mark, though visible, isn't intrusive. I use this app for anything I need to scan. It does a better job than my desktop scanner.

Best app of it's kind I've used on any platform. It's been a game changer. I was so surprised at it's ability, I immediately subscribed. [tl:dr: A company insisted I use this app and I refused & I proceeded trying all standard ways I've been successful in using previously to provide completed forms to a business. None was acceptable: too dark enough, too light, to muddy, etc. Finally, because they're was thenno room on my Droid downloaded the app to iPhone. Re-photographed documents. Perfect!]

title: ClevCalc - Calculator
description:
This calculator allows you to easily handle all the calculations necessary for everyday life with a single application. A free calculator app with a clean interface and practical functions!


1. Calculator ( + Scientific Calculator )
‚Ä¢ Supports the four fundamental arithmetic operations, square, root, parentheses and percentage operations.
‚Ä¢ Supports scientific operations such as trigonometric, exponential and logarithmic functions.
‚Ä¢ Possible to modify incorrectly entered expressions with a freely movable cursor.
‚Ä¢ Simple and easy.
‚Ä¢ History available.

2. Unit Converter
‚Ä¢ Supports length, weight, width, volume, time, temperature, pressure, speed, fuel efficiency, and the amount of data.
‚Ä¢ Supports all unit conversions commonly used in everyday life.

3. Currency Converter
‚Ä¢ Supports 135 currencies in the world, including dollar, euro, yen, yuan, etc.
‚Ä¢ Automatically calculates using the real time exchange rate.

4. Percentage Calculator
‚Ä¢ You can easily calculate the percentage increase or decrease.
‚Ä¢ You can also calculate what percentage one number is of another.

5. Discount Calculator
‚Ä¢ Get a discount price by entering the original price and the discount rate.

6. Loan Calculator
‚Ä¢ You can calculate the total interest and total payments by entering the loan principal and interest rate.

7. Date Calculator
‚Ä¢ A feature that calculates the specific date or anniversary to be remembered!

8. Health Calculator
‚Ä¢ You can measure the body mass index (BMI) and the basal metabolic rate (BMR).

9. Automobile Fuel Cost Calculator
‚Ä¢ You can calculate the fuel costs required for driving a car or traveling.
‚Ä¢ Enter a distance and a fuel efficiency to get a fuel cost.

10. Fuel Efficiency Calculator
‚Ä¢ Enter the amount of fuel used to get the fuel efficiency.

11. GPA Calculator
‚Ä¢ You can correctly calculate your GPA!

12. Tip Calculator
‚Ä¢ The tip amount to be added will be automatically calculated if you enter the billing amount and tip percentage.
‚Ä¢ There is a function not to calculate tips on tax.
‚Ä¢ You may calculate the amount per person by dividing final amount by the number of people.

13. Sales Tax Calculator
‚Ä¢ Get a total price by entering the original price and the tax rate.

14. Unit Price Calculator
‚Ä¢ Enter the price and the quantity and you will get the unit price.
‚Ä¢ You can compare unit prices of various goods.

15. World Time Converter
‚Ä¢ Transforms the time of 400 or more cities around the world.
‚Ä¢ Daylight savings time will also be reflected in this calculation.

16. Ovulation Calculator
‚Ä¢ Calculates the time of ovulation and fertility using the menstrual cycle!
‚Ä¢ You can also create notes by date.

17. Hexadecimal Converter
‚Ä¢ Converts between decimal and hexadecimal with ease and convenience.

18. Savings Calculator
‚Ä¢ If you enter deposit amount, interest rate and time period, the interest after tax and final savings balance will be calculated.


[ Disclaimer ]
Cleveni Inc. makes no warranty as to the accuracy or reliability or suitability of any calculation results or information provided through the ClevCalc app. Cleveni Inc. is not also responsible for any damages, direct or indirect, which may occur by the calculation results or information provided through the ClevCalc app.

comments: I installed this App today, and I should say it's ok! The layout/design, beautiful themes and many calculators combined in one make it stand out! But the loan calculator seems a bit confusing to me. The 20% of 50,000 should be 10,000, but the calculator said it's 11,074.79. For example, equal total payment for 50,000 @ 20% for 24 weeks should be 60,000 divided by 24 = 2,500 per week, but the calculator said it's 2,544.79. Please is there something I'm missing?

I liked the app on the beginning, however, the number grid and math functions (+,√ó,√∑,=,-,) have since disappeared and has been replace with a top grid of numbers and a side grid of letters (A,B,C,D,E,F) I cannot for the life of me figure out how to get back to original number/function page. So at this point the app sucks big time.

I had a "unit converterr", a "currency calculator", a "loan calculator" and a normal calculator. This app proves that they can all be combined in an intuitive interface, plus some more obscure "calculations". Definitely 5 stars. If anything, the possibility to choose where the exchange rates are updated could be introduced... and a few (very few) details I will inform the developer after some more use. Thank you!

I used to like this calculator, now i have changed the smartphone to a Xiaomi redmi note 10S and it seems that the app just doesn't work anymore. I open it and it closes instantly if i tap a key or just after a few seconds if I don't press anything. I've reinstalled it and still doesn't work. I'd like to use this app if an update will fix this. Thanks!

It is a very good app !!!! It meets all my needs as a calculator !!!!! I don't have anything to complain about on this one. : ) Stephie : ) Ivermectin is pretty much a wonder drug !!! title: Chrome Canary (Unstable)
description:
Welcome to Chrome Canary for Android. 

‚Ä¢  Experimental  - This release has not been tested.  It may be unstable or fail to run at times.  Recommended for developers and advanced users only. 

‚Ä¢  Frequently updated  - Updates may be distributed up to seven times per week, consuming 100MB of bandwidth.  Be careful when updating apps over cellular data. 

‚Ä¢  Give early feedback  - The best way to help make Chrome for Android a better browser. Click "Help & Feedback" from the menu to provide feedback.

comments: ‚ñ† ‚Ä¢ good integration with my pc, regular chrome, my samsung phone, my girl's iphone, and even with edge ‚Ä¢ it seems secure‚Äîalthough i prefer better ads, and couldn't care less about that kind of privacy ‚ñ° ‚Ä¢ google search freezes it‚Äîbut you already knew that ‚Ä¢ playstore won't update it ‚Ä¢ previews of my tabs were shown outside of incognito mode //UPDATE: clearing cach√© enables updates; google search does not freezes it any longer; not sure about the one about the tabs ‚óá ‚Ä¢ now deserving five stars

20210728: Won't open any longer. Crashes 1 second after opening to a screen showing an empty page with an empty url guage. 20210328: Crashes on YouTube, and other sites, after 20+ minutes. The UI becomes unresponsive to touches, phone's gestures freeze, video stutters, then the application crashes to device home screen. 8 GB RAM This started happening for me since yesterday's update.

Usually good, but try to avoid updating it today: they added a bug which'll crash Chrome whenever you try to open it. Wait until tomorrow, by which it should be fixed.. Generally quality, more speed etc. Rarely a breaking bug like this, but be advised.

Since Chrome refused to update on my phone I downloaded this version and it brought back the group tabs feature, so I'm happy with that. Edit: App started crashing upon open. Restarting the phone didn't help. Went back to regular Chrome; group tabs feature works now.
It's a good app but it crashes and sometimes the video does not load in on-site videos. Just the audio goes on...they screen turn blank black.

title: Microsoft OneNote: Save Ideas and Organize Notes
description:
Organize your thoughts, discoveries, and ideas and simplify planning important moments in your life with your digital notepad. Microsoft OneNote lets you take notes on your phone and sync them across all your devices.

With OneNote, you can plan a big event, seize a moment of inspiration to create something new, and track your list of errands that are too important to forget. Take notes, write memos and make a digital sketchbook right on your phone. Capture pictures and add images to your notes.

Sync notes across your devices to access them anytime, anywhere. Save ideas and check your list at home, in the office, or on the go across your devices. Search your notes quickly and effortlessly.

Take notes, share ideas, organize and collaborate when you download Microsoft OneNote today. 

Capture Content And Get Organized
‚Ä¢ Write notes, draw and clip things from the web to get your thoughts down into your notebook.
‚Ä¢ Use OneNote‚Äôs flexible canvas to place content anywhere you want.
‚Ä¢ Scan documents and business cards straight into OneNote.
‚Ä¢ Save pictures and images to your notes.

Take Notes And Achieve More
‚Ä¢ OneNote is a digital notebook that brings 3-ring binders to the digital era. 
‚Ä¢ Organize notes with sections and pages to separate thoughts by theme at school, home or work.
‚Ä¢ Organize your notes using to-do lists, follow up items, marks for what‚Äôs important and custom labels.
‚Ä¢ Use OneNote as a notebook, journal or a notepad.

Save Ideas At The Speed of Light
‚Ä¢ OneNote syncs your notes across all devices and lets multiple people work on the content together, at the same time.
‚Ä¢ Use the notepad to list your thoughts down whenever something crosses your mind.
‚Ä¢ Notepad badge hovers on screen and lets you quickly write your thoughts down any time.
‚Ä¢ Sticky notes are helpful for quick memos.

Collaborate and Share Notes
‚Ä¢ Take meeting notes, brainstorm projects, draw attention to important points and organize key resources.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate in real time to stay in sync and on the same page.
‚Ä¢ Take notes and save ideas across your favorite devices, no matter what device your team likes to use.
‚Ä¢ Take notes during classes or meetings, mixing in text, voice, ink and web clippings.
‚Ä¢ Search your notes with a fast and powerful search function

Better Together With Microsoft Office
‚Ä¢ OneNote is part of the Office family and works great with your favorite apps, such as Excel or Word, to help you do more.

Write notes, save ideas and keep up with your to-do list with Microsoft OneNote.

You can find answers to frequently asked questions about OneNote for Android at http://aka.ms/OnenoteAndroidFAQ

Requirements:
‚Ä¢ Requires Android OS 5.0 or later.
‚Ä¢ A free Microsoft account is required to use OneNote.
‚Ä¢ OneNote opens existing notebooks created in Microsoft OneNote 2010 format or later.
‚Ä¢ To sync your notes to OneDrive for Business, sign in with your organization‚Äôs Office 365 or SharePoint account.

This app is provided either by Microsoft or a third-party app publisher and is subject to a separate privacy statement and terms and conditions. Data provided through the use of this store and this app may be accessible to Microsoft or the third-party app publisher, as applicable, and transferred to, stored and processed in the United States or any other country where Microsoft or the app publisher and their affiliates or service providers maintain facilities.

Please refer to Microsoft‚Äôs End User License Agreement (EULA) for Terms of Service for OneNote on Android. By installing the app, you agree to these terms and conditions: https://support.office.com/legal?llcc=en-us&aid=OneNoteForAndroidLicenseTerms.htm. Microsoft‚Äôs privacy statement is available at https://privacy.microsoft.com/en-us/privacystatement
descriptionHTML:
Organize your thoughts, discoveries, and ideas and simplify planning important moments in your life with your digital notepad. Microsoft OneNote lets you take notes on your phone and sync them across all your devices.

With OneNote, you can plan a big event, seize a moment of inspiration to create something new, and track your list of errands that are too important to forget. Take notes, write memos and make a digital sketchbook right on your phone. Capture pictures and add images to your notes.

Sync notes across your devices to access them anytime, anywhere. Save ideas and check your list at home, in the office, or on the go across your devices. Search your notes quickly and effortlessly.

Take notes, share ideas, organize and collaborate when you download Microsoft OneNote today.

Capture Content And Get Organized
‚Ä¢ Write notes, draw and clip things from the web to get your thoughts down into your notebook.
‚Ä¢ Use OneNote‚Äôs flexible canvas to place content anywhere you want.
‚Ä¢ Scan documents and business cards straight into OneNote.
‚Ä¢ Save pictures and images to your notes.

Take Notes And Achieve More
‚Ä¢ OneNote is a digital notebook that brings 3-ring binders to the digital era.
‚Ä¢ Organize notes with sections and pages to separate thoughts by theme at school, home or work.
‚Ä¢ Organize your notes using to-do lists, follow up items, marks for what‚Äôs important and custom labels.
‚Ä¢ Use OneNote as a notebook, journal or a notepad.

Save Ideas At The Speed of Light
‚Ä¢ OneNote syncs your notes across all devices and lets multiple people work on the content together, at the same time.
‚Ä¢ Use the notepad to list your thoughts down whenever something crosses your mind.
‚Ä¢ Notepad badge hovers on screen and lets you quickly write your thoughts down any time.
‚Ä¢ Sticky notes are helpful for quick memos.

Collaborate and Share Notes
‚Ä¢ Take meeting notes, brainstorm projects, draw attention to important points and organize key resources.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate in real time to stay in sync and on the same page.
‚Ä¢ Take notes and save ideas across your favorite devices, no matter what device your team likes to use.
‚Ä¢ Take notes during classes or meetings, mixing in text, voice, ink and web clippings.
‚Ä¢ Search your notes with a fast and powerful search function

Better Together With Microsoft Office
‚Ä¢ OneNote is part of the Office family and works great with your favorite apps, such as Excel or Word, to help you do more.

Write notes, save ideas and keep up with your to-do list with Microsoft OneNote.

You can find answers to frequently asked questions about OneNote for Android at http://aka.ms/OnenoteAndroidFAQ

Requirements:
‚Ä¢ Requires Android OS 5.0 or later.
‚Ä¢ A free Microsoft account is required to use OneNote.
‚Ä¢ OneNote opens existing notebooks created in Microsoft OneNote 2010 format or later.
‚Ä¢ To sync your notes to OneDrive for Business, sign in with your organization‚Äôs Office 365 or SharePoint account.

This app is provided either by Microsoft or a third-party app publisher and is subject to a separate privacy statement and terms and conditions. Data provided through the use of this store and this app may be accessible to Microsoft or the third-party app publisher, as applicable, and transferred to, stored and processed in the United States or any other country where Microsoft or the app publisher and their affiliates or service providers maintain facilities.

Please refer to Microsoft‚Äôs End User License Agreement (EULA) for Terms of Service for OneNote on Android. By installing the app, you agree to these terms and conditions: https://support.office.com/legal?llcc=en-us&aid=OneNoteForAndroidLicenseTerms.htm. Microsoft‚Äôs privacy statement is available at https://privacy.microsoft.com/en-us/privacystatement
summary: Powerful notepad to capture ideas & save notes. Easily organize & share notes
developerAddress: One Microsoft Way
recentChanges: ÔªøThank you for using OneNote. We regularly update the app with great new features, bug fixes, and performance improvements. Please continue to share your feedback with us right in the app!
comments: I love this app. Ive been looking for a note taking app for a little while. Most of the apps I have used, you can't highlight or strike through. The good thing with OneNote, I can share across my devices.. and I'm able to highlight my notes, edit, add a photo straight from the camera, add an attachment, make Bullet points, add a recording. It's a word processing program for my phone.

Very handy, my new recipe "book". Been using for a couple of year's, with no problem. Easy to make new subcategories, add new recipes. Make "beef" category, put beef recipes for beef in it. When some get big and harder to find recipes, put sub categories in like "steak", "roasts", "hamburger". I us it for shopping list's. Reminders, and any list's that I need. Great app. Sync to my phone,laptop, and computer.

I am Lavanya and I am a 5th grader. I installed Microsoft OneNote because I have heard that we can make notebooks in it and there can be different pages in them as well. I thought this app will help me in organizing my notes. And its true. We can not only make notebooks in this app but we can organize our stuff properly as well. Wherever I travel, now I dont have to carry books and notebooks with me study and I can read my notes anytime, anywhere!

I just try it. It's good, sync well between device. But I hope the eraser feature could work just like the pen feature, to only erase the area that is touch by the cursor. Sometimes I need to write with connected letters. The eraser delete a connected drawing, so when I want to correct something, it would erase all of the letters of the word I've been writing.

Very thing was fine. Just a few suggestions for Microsoft team 1. When we sign out of an account the stops opening or the account isn't signed out. 2.Improvement needed in app opening speed. 3.To get the first issue sorted I had delete the app and install it again and sign out once more to add my other account. Hoping you would take my suggestions into concern. Yours Faithfully, A Regular User

title: StayFree Web - Website Blocker & Stay Focused
description:
StayFree Web - Website Blocker is a website blocking app that blocks distracting websites defined by you! 

It provides the simplest way to remove all distracting and harmful websites from your life by blocking them while you need to stay focused and productive. üí™üèª

Want to know how long you are spending on any website? We‚Äôve got you covered for that too! Just open up our app and you will see a breakdown of all of the websites you have used and you will be able to set up blocks based on usage limits. Block as many distractions as you‚Äôd like, whenever you‚Äôd like, for as long as you'd like!

‚ùóÔ∏èIt will only work if your browser is if Chrome, Mozilla Firefox, or Samsung Internet (more browsers will be supported soon!!)

üì¢ THIS APP USES ACCESSIBILITY SERVICES

The Accessibility Services are used for detecting which website you are on and, in turn, blocking the websites you have requested to block. The Accessibility Services are also used for analyzing sponsored content that appears on social media apps as part of an opt-in service. All information is maintained in accordance with our Privacy Policy and Sensor Tower is using the respective permissions with active consent by the end-user.

Accessibility Services Declared:

Retrieve window content -- allows us to read which website you are actively viewing.

We love to get feedback from our users.üòå

This app is maintained by Sensor Tower.

title: MeetKai VA
description:
Welcome to a preview of our search & AI technology, the first version of MeetKai VA. This app will demonstrate our conversational AI capabilities while you explore Streaming, Restaurants, and Recipes.

¬øWho‚Äôs Kai? 

Kai is an artificial intelligence virtual assistant developed in Los Angeles, CA: the first to offer personalized results, understand negation, and more complex questions as you use your voice and natural tone. Instead of asking "find Chinese restaurants" machine-style, tap on Kai and say "recommend a nearby Chinese restaurant". 

Want to try something more advanced? Kai can also remember the context of your questions to filter or add more information to your original request. Follow-up questions are where MeetKai shines. 

Talking about restaurants, give this a shot: "How about Italian instead?"

Ask MeetKai to:

Search and stream movies or TV shows
"Find me an Emma Watson movie that isn‚Äôt Harry Potter"
"I want to watch a movie with Will Smith"
"What‚Äôs a good action movie?"
"Recommend me a TV series"  

Discover new recipes
"Find me a recipe with fish"
‚ÄúHow about something more sophisticated‚Äù
"I want to cook a 30-minute Italian meal for dinner."
"What‚Äôs a good wine to go with that?"

Find new restaurants
"Show me a good restaurant nearby."
"How about a restaurant with good pizza."
"Where can I get tacos in Marina Del Rey?"
"I want to order sushi."

The more you speak to your voice assistant, the more personalized your results will be as Kai adapts to your vocabulary and preferences. Other domains such as News, Books, and general chit-chat are coming soon! Please focus on the 3 domains above for the best MeetKai experience.

Have fun! and enjoy MeetKai.

comments: MeetKai is definitely the best way to find what is streaming on the different providers. I also love the recipes
MeetKai is a wonderful app to use. An assistant for many things such as finding restaurants, finding movies, to learning how to cook.
Gives really good recommendations, especially for what to watch or where to eat
I love the actual custom responses, much more than your average Google search response
Really useful app with an easy to use interface!

title: Adobe Acrobat Reader: PDF Viewer, Editor & Creator
description:
Do you need to work with documents on the go? Get the Adobe Acrobat Reader mobile app, the world‚Äôs most trusted PDF viewer, with more than 635 million installs. Store your files online and read PDF files anywhere with this leading, free PDF reader and file manager. You can also view, share, annotate, and add e-signatures to PDF documents.

Subscribe to Adobe Acrobat if you need a PDF editor to edit text and images, a PDF converter to export to and from PDF, or more advanced features to create PDFs, combine PDF documents, organize PDFs, and more.

VIEW AND PRINT PDFs
‚Ä¢ Open and view PDFs with the free Adobe PDF viewer app.
‚Ä¢ Choose Single Page or Continuous scroll mode. 
‚Ä¢ Help save battery with dark mode.
‚Ä¢ Print documents directly from your device.

READ PDFs MORE EASILY
‚Ä¢ Get the best PDF reading experience with Liquid Mode. 
‚Ä¢ Content in your PDF document reflows to fit your screen.
‚Ä¢ Use the Liquid Mode outline for quick navigation. 
‚Ä¢ Search to find text fast in your PDF documents. 

SHARE PDFs AND COLLABORATE
‚Ä¢ Share files for commenting or viewing.
‚Ä¢ Collect comments from multiple people in one file online.
‚Ä¢ Speed document reviews by responding to each other‚Äôs comments.
‚Ä¢ Receive activity notifications for files you‚Äôve shared.

ANNOTATE PDFs
‚Ä¢ Add PDF notes and comments, including sticky notes and highlights.
‚Ä¢ Write on PDF documents by adding text or drawings. 
‚Ä¢ Share a file with others to collect all comments in one place. 

EDIT PDFs
‚Ä¢ Subscribe to edit text and images directly in your PDF.
‚Ä¢ Fix a typo or add a paragraph with the paid PDF editor feature. 
‚Ä¢ Add, delete, or rotate an image with your upgraded Acrobat PDF app.

FILL AND SIGN FORMS
‚Ä¢ Easily fill in PDF forms with the form filler feature.
‚Ä¢ E-sign documents using your finger or stylus. 

STORE AND MANAGE FILES
‚Ä¢ Sign in to your free account to store and access files across devices.
‚Ä¢ Access all your files by linking online storage accounts, like Microsoft OneDrive, Dropbox, or Google Drive. 
‚Ä¢ Star files to quickly open your most important or favorite documents. 

CONNECT TO GOOGLE DRIVE
‚Ä¢ Connect your Google Drive account to access PDFs and other files with ease.
‚Ä¢ View, share, and star Google Drive files directly in Acrobat Reader.
‚Ä¢ Create, edit, combine, compress, and export Google Drive files with a subscription.

WORK WITH SCANNED DOCUMENTS
‚Ä¢ Access scanned PDFs that you‚Äôve captured using the free Adobe Scan app. 
‚Ä¢ Open your scans in Adobe Acrobat Reader to fill, sign, comment, and share. 

IN-APP PURCHASE
Subscribe for even more PDF power. Subscriptions work across mobile and web. 
‚Ä¢ Edit text and images right in your PDF document (mobile only).
‚Ä¢ Combine files into one PDF file and organize pages. 
‚Ä¢ Create PDF files from documents or images. 
‚Ä¢ Export PDFs to Microsoft Word, Excel, or PowerPoint.
‚Ä¢ Compress PDF files to reduce file size.
‚Ä¢ Protect PDF documents by adding passwords.

The Acrobat Reader mobile app is designed to work with customers who have Enterprise Mobility Management (EMM) enabled. 

Terms & Conditions: Your use of this application is governed by the Adobe General Terms of Use http://www.adobe.com/go/terms_en and the Adobe Privacy Policy http://www.adobe.com/go/privacy_policy_en. 

Do Not Sell My Personal Information: https://www.adobe.com/privacy/ca-rights.html

The Adobe Acrobat Reader PDF creator and document editor app puts your office in your pocket. View, annotate, fill, sign, and share PDF files with the free Adobe PDF reader. Convert JPG files to PDF format, create and sign fillable PDF forms, and add your e-signature to shared documents. Working with PDF documents has never been so easy.

comments: Had cancelled my subscription because I did not need it. Got charged and have been trying to request my refund. I did not get a response and have been sent back and forth from Google to the adobe website support. The app itself works fine just frustrated with how they handle the situation.

Wonderful app It let's you do anything But I think 70 dollars for a premium is a bit too much. Maybe around 30 dollars is reasonable I know you are going to write to me saying it's worth all the features Well I am perfectly aware of the features you have and I accept its great but if you reduce the price to will have more people buying it Just a tip

Really bad, the Android version does not do anything beyond showing the document. You cannot jump to page 1234, you cannot search for a word or phrase or chapter, you cannot highlight passages. If I was talking about the Windows version I would be really complimentary as it does what it's meant to do.

I will NEVER get this app again. you cant edit your pdfs in any meaningful way. I have NO idea where the files are outside of the adobe app on my chromebook (which i suspect is probably part of the main issue). I cant even rename the Files in acrobat. It's total garbage and they have the gall to make you pay for its services.

I only have one concern.. I can't seem to remember a password I created for one one of my pdf.. I can't figure out where I have a choice for a forgotten password. So I can overridden, and review documents. Then reset the password to protect it. One that's easier for me to remember

title: Notion - Notes, Tasks, Wikis
description:
Notion is a new editor that blends notes, tasks, wikis in one app.


DRAG, DROP, EDIT
Use drag & drop and Force Touch to arrange any content. Great for prioritizing lists and to-dos.

RICH MEDIA
Supports images, to-dos, bookmarks, code snippets and 20+ block types.

SYNC WITH MAC, WINDOWS, AND BROWSER
Download the companion browser and desktop apps. Notion keeps everything in sync.

OFFLINE
Pages you visit online are downloaded for access on the go.

COLLABORATE IN REAL-TIME
Share your pages, and edit together at the same time, @mention, and comments.

FOLDERLESS ORGANIZATION
Organize your content using nested pages. Say goodbye to messy folders.

To download the companion desktop app, please visit:
https://www.notion.so/desktop

summary: The all-in-one workspace
recentChanges:
New on tablets: better Calendar view!

Now you can see detailed information about each of your pages, without having to tap on each individual day. Plus, you can drag & drop items from one day to another ‚Äî just like desktop.
comments: Amazing app on all levels. I did the switch from many other apps and now everything is on Notion. The only killer problem is the Arabic language support! Come on guys! you have millions of Arabic users. Show them some love! There's no right to left text orientation (right alignment). Also once you start mixing Arabic and English words, the text goes to the wrong sides. Please fix it! Millions of users will appreciate it. Thanks

In love with the app! While other apps has a system where you kinda have to work with it's rules and limitations, Notion lets do whatever you want and need to have a system that fits your needs. Also, the templates available gives you a good start when you don't know how to structure the project or schedule you have. And the best of all ( which got me surprised , to be honest ) there's no in-app purchases ! For me, it's the perfect app for everything I need to organize .

I use it Notion on the computer and I wanted it on my phone too, but I don't know why it couldn't work. I log, then have this 4 introducing informations, and after clicking ,,get started" it only get grey from bluy and nothing happen. I tried restart my phone, reinstalled the app but nothing worked. Could someone help me?

I'm not able to see the notion action bar on my mobile app, when I'm typing. I'm not able to create headings, bullets and other things like adding colour to text because of this. It's been happening since the last update. I even restarted my phone, but the issue keeps happening.

I love Notion on desktop - I use it for work every day - but the login is so fragile on my phone (it logs me out all the time) that it's an unworkable flow. When I have a thought I want to get down it's extremely disruptive to have to stop and fuss with email, etc. I appreciate the attention to security and privacy, but the experience is simply too eroded on this platform.

title: Your Phone Companion - Link to Windows
description:
You love your phone. So does your PC. Get instant access to everything you love on your phone, right from your PC. To get started, Install the Your Phone Companion - Link to Windows app on your Android phone and link it with the Your Phone app on your Windows 10 PC.

Link your Android phone and PC to view and reply to text messages,  make and receive calls*, and more - all right on your PC. 

Stay on top of your life as you receive and manage real-time mobile notifications on your PC. 

Make emailing yourself photos a thing of the past as you share your favorite images between your phone and PC. Copy, edit, and even drag and drop photos without ever touching your phone. 

For select** Samsung phones you can also wirelessly drag and drop files from your phone to your PC (and vice versa) and even access your favorite mobile apps on your PC.


Your Phone features:
‚Ä¢ Make and receive calls from your PC*
‚Ä¢ Manage your Android phone's notifications on your PC 
‚Ä¢ Access your favorite mobile apps** on your PC
‚Ä¢ Read and reply to text messages from your PC
‚Ä¢ Drag files between your PC and phone**
‚Ä¢ Copy and paste content between your PC and phone**
‚Ä¢ Instantly access the photos on your phone from your PC
‚Ä¢ Use your PC‚Äôs bigger screen, keyboard, mouse, and touch screen to interact with your phone from your PC.

 Integrated with Surface Duo and select Samsung mobile devices for an even better experience  
‚Ä¢ Surface Duo and select Samsung models have Link to Windows integrated and no additional apps required to be downloaded from the Play Store. See list of supported devices: aka.ms/ypltwdevices
‚Ä¢ Find Link to Windows in the Quick Access tray (drag down from the top of your screen to access it).
‚Ä¢ This integration enables unique features like cross-device copy and paste, Phone screen, file drag-and-drop, and Apps (for a breakdown, see aka.ms/ypltwdevices).


*Calls requires a Windows 10 PC running the May 2019 update or later with Bluetooth capability. 

**Drag and drop, Phone screen and Apps access all require a compatible device (aka.ms/ypltwdevices) and a Windows 10 PC running the May 2019 update or later. The multiple apps experience requires a Windows 10 PC that‚Äôs running the May 2020 Update or later and has at least 8GB of RAM.

By installing this app, you agree to the Microsoft Terms of Use https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=246338 and Privacy Statement https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=248686

Tell us what features you'd like to see next by selecting "Send feedback" in settings in the Your Phone app or the Your Phone Companion app.
