*Calls requires a Windows 10 PC running the May 2019 update or later with Bluetooth capability.

**Drag and drop, Phone screen and Apps access all require a compatible device (aka.ms/ypltwdevices) and a Windows 10 PC running the May 2019 update or later. The multiple apps experience requires a Windows 10 PC that‚Äôs running the May 2020 Update or later and has at least 8GB of RAM.

By installing this app, you agree to the Microsoft Terms of Use https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=246338 and Privacy Statement https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?LinkID=248686

Tell us what features you'd like to see next by selecting "Send feedback" in settings in the Your Phone app or the Your Phone Companion app.
summary: Access your phone‚Äôs notifications, calls, apps, photos & texts on your PC.
developerAddress: One Microsoft Way
comments: EDIT 08/09/22 Moved the rating up to 3 stars. Its gotten better at connecting and staying connected. Wish I didn't need my phone next to me to enter a password, and the amount of data it sucks up is astronomical! Slows my PC noticeably, but it has improved overall. Previous: Connecting is completely frustrating. And when it finally connects, expect no more than 1 minute and it's disconnected again.

I have a Huawei and cannot see messages sent from computer on phone or computer - just appears to be "sending". Have been around so many loops to try and resolve and appears to be no solution. Also, it will intermittently just completely disconnect between phone and computer with no way of coming back and then have to go through a whole process to uninstall on both phone and computer and reconnect. Then invariably whilst doing this it'll get stuck on some page loop trying to reconnect it.

I love the "intended" functionality of the app, it's the delivered functionality that loses a couple of stars for me. I use it all the time and have ever since it came out. But it is SO temperamental. Recently, the problem is that text messaging works just fine...as long as the message is to a single recipient. If there are multiple recipients, it will not send. It'll receive messages from multiples, just won't send. Please fix, otherwise I love the app.

This app is mostly pretty nice, it seems to be about the closest equivalent to the Apple ecosystem that you can get with Android/Windows. It is interesting that for some reason if you use a VPN, you have to enable the ability to sync over mobile data, because for some reason the app will think you're on data even if you're actually connected to wifi. Otherwise this app is amazing.

Was working great for quite a while, I used the Share to Phone Companion/PC quite often, as sharing a link from my phone to my PC would place it in my notifications. That feature is now gone or missing and no way to troubleshoot why it's gone, turn it on or off. Now I have to use my Google mail to share a link to my PC. please bring back the Share to PC/companion!

title: HP Smart
description:
Print, scan, and share files by using HP Smart with your HP Printer. HP Smart makes it easy to get started and keeps you going with features like Print Anywhere or Mobile Fax!
 

¬∑ Start with a hassle-free set up, then print, scan, copy, and share files directly from your mobile device to your friends, co-workers, or a linked cloud account 
¬∑ Manage or print to your printer using any network connection
¬∑ Order supplies, get support, and manage your HP account straight from the app
¬∑ Create high-quality scans with your mobile device‚Äôs camera or import existing files, then preview, edit, and save them as PDFs and JPEGs or send them in your favorite cloud storage account
¬∑ Edit and enhance your photos by adding filters and text, cropping, and adjusting the saturation, contrast, or brightness 
¬∑ It‚Äôs easy to send secure faxes from the app with Mobile Fax
¬∑ Be more productive with Smart Tasks‚Äîcustomizable one-touch shortcuts
¬∑ Access hundreds of printable crafts, cards, and learning activities for free with Printables! Get involved and get your family creating together!
 
Some HP Smart features require a network connection and an HP account for full functionality. Certain features/software are available in English language only. For a full list of supported printers, visit: http://support.hp.com/us-en/document/c03722645?openCLC=true

comments: Love this printer/scanner for home use. You can operate with your phone as well as laptop or tablet, it also has away from home printing features.The price is affordable, setup was easy. It's lightweight and takes up little space. It comes with free instant ink and you can subscribe to have it delivered to your home.

WARNING: Return your printer before it's too late. This app has SO many problems. In order for the printer to even connect to the app, I have to open and close the app 5-6 times while turning off and on the wifi button on the printer. I have to do this almost every time for it to work. HP Smart? More like HP Dumb. I have wasted so much paper and ink because it will not let me print double sided. The only way to do it is through "shortcuts", but it doesnt even work through shortcuts

This is a great app! So why does it only get 3 stars? Well I've installed it on my Android phone and my Android tablet. and its great. 5 stars!! I've also installed it on my Chromebook Absolutly rubbish. I cant get it to print or scan. It just asks me to sign in then hangs up after I put my Username and password.

Still frustrated that even after all these years they still fail to offer the option to select & "print selection" like you can on a laptop. It's so frustrating when you only want to print out a couple of paragraphs or a recipe, that you can't simply highlight what you need, choose print, then have the option to "print selection". Why does this seem to be so hard for the techno guys to do this??? Waste time, ink and paper when using now & often parts of what you need dont even show up in final

If I could give your app zero stars, that would be too much. This is the worst printer app interface I have ever seen in my life, both the app and desktop app are complete garbage. On top of all of that my HP printer is the worst printer I've ever owned. I will never purchase one again and I will discourage all of my colleagues from buying them. I'm debating on throwing my printer out the window so I'm forced to invest in a new brand.

title: QuickLaunch Mobile
description:
QuickLaunch App enables users to securely access organization-wide applications from a mobile device using a single set of credentials, thereby improving the end user experience and enhancing productivity.

Top Features:

Custom Branding: Change theme color and logo to mirror your organisations‚Äô brand image

Single Sign-On to Apps: Access organization-wide applications, from a single screen on a mobile device, using a single set of credentials to all authorized applications

Two-Factor Login: Organization can enable two-factor authentication at the time of login based on predefined policies by the organization 

Get Push Notifications: Users receive push notifications displaying custom alerts and password expiry notifications 

Prevent False Access: Prevent unauthorized access and protect the organization‚Äôs mission-critical applications by verifying identity at the time of login using multiple factors (Security Questions, SMS and Email) 

Biometric App Lock: Lower the risk of unwanted breaches by enabling Face ID or Touch ID as one of the app-locking mechanisms 

Reset Lost/Forgotten Password from Mobile: Reset lost/forgotten passwords using multiple factors (Security Questions, SMS and Email)

Forgot Username: Retrieve lost/forgotten usernames using Mobile app 

First-Time User Registration: New users to the organization can set up their password instantly 


To learn more, visit - https://quicklaunch.io/mobile/

title: Free WiFi Passwords & Hotspots by Instabridge
description:
The Wifi Hunt is over!


We‚Äôve all been there: you‚Äôre in a rush or not sure which place has free wifi and you don‚Äôt want to go on a scavenger hunt throughout the city every time you need to connect! Instabridge is here to save you the hassle of asking for the wifi password everywhere you go. The offline map makes it the perfect travel app. With over 20 million hotspots added to our database, Instabridge is like a master key that can help you connect when and where you want.

Instabridge is a worldwide community of people who share WiFi passwords. We‚Äôve collected over 20 million passwords and hotspots, and this number is growing every day! It‚Äôs totally free, saves you money on data usage, and helps others who can‚Äôt afford wifi connect when they need to. The more people that add WiFi, the closer we are to making WiFi free and accessible for everyone! 

Just download the app >> Automatically connect to WiFi >> Join our community

With millions of secure, up-to-date WiFi hotspots, Instabridge is the simplest way to surf the Internet for free. Instabridge's Wifi finder knows which Wi-Fi networks work and automatically keeps you off those that don't. No setup required. It just works! With our beautifully integrated travel map and detailed statistics on every network in our database, you won‚Äôt ever have to worry about how and where you can connect.

FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Get free Wi-Fi Internet connections in all major cities
‚Ä¢ Data saving web browser with 10x better compression than the competition
‚Ä¢ No data limitation, no cost
‚Ä¢ Auto-connect to Wi-Fi as soon as it‚Äôs available (perfect on airports). Get free Internet automatically!
‚Ä¢ Useful stats (like speed, popularity and data usage) on any password or hotspot in our database.
‚Ä¢ Offline maps included so you can find hotspots even when you‚Äôre roaming or low on data! The perfect app when travelling! 
‚Ä¢ Supports WEP, WPA, WPA2 and WPA3.
‚Ä¢ Easier to use than WPS.
‚Ä¢ Easy to use speed tests.


Help us make WiFi accessible to everyone! When you join our community, you‚Äôre paving the way for the millions of people worldwide who can‚Äôt afford WiFi at home.


What others are saying about Instabridge:
""Instabridge is a Swedish company that‚Äôs invented something so simple, and so awesome, that you‚Äôve got to wonder what took this industry so long!""
Android Authority

‚ÄúToday‚Äôs application is, simply, exceptional. It's a brilliant idea, an excellent solution and executed perfectly. I'm in love.‚Äù
El Android Libre

""Instabridge is an elegant solution""
Lifehacker

""A simple interface allows friends to get access without having to type in a convoluted string of numbers and letters from a scrap of paper.""
The Economist



*****
Important Note: Instabridge is not for Wi-Fi tethering nor is it a Wi-Fi hacker tool and cannot be used for Wi-Fi hacking in any way. Instabridge syncs wifi passwords between your own devices and to people you have chosen to trust.

comments: Free share WiFi. When I first download the app I thought it was just search free Wi-Fi. I can see a lot of people in the reviews don't understand this app works . First you download the app create a profile. And you share your own lock Wi-Fi with your own password so other people can use your network. Only with the password. Basically You're allowing people to use your network only if they download and connect to the app with your Wi-Fi password.

This app is very nice because we can see password of WiFi without connected. But it not show our neighborhood wifi... We can only see others WiFi who is far from us. I think developer has to fix this problem as soon.
most McDonald's has free wifi. I think this option is fantastic for people who need that service. some shut down wifi early evening but most have it available 24 hrs a day.
Seems to be working just fine..given me passwords to networks I didn't know existed.
Am giving this app 2 Star because it unlocks only a few WiFi networks most are not unlocked and also it shows the password of WiFi networks which are 5-6 kilometres far..............!!!

title: MEGA
description:
MEGA provides user-controlled encrypted cloud storage and chat through standard web browsers, together with dedicated apps for mobile devices. Unlike other cloud storage providers, your data is encrypted and decrypted by your client devices only and never by us.

Upload your files from your smartphone or tablet then search, store, download, stream, view, share, rename or delete your files any time, from any device, anywhere. Share folders with your contacts and see their updates in real time. The encryption process means we cannot access or reset your password so you MUST remember it (unless you have your Recovery Key backed up) or you will lose access to your stored files.

End-to-end user-encrypted MEGA video chat allows for total privacy, and has been available through the browser since 2016. It has been extended to our mobile app, with chat history accessible across multiple devices. Users can also easily add files to a chat from their MEGA cloud drive.

MEGA offers a generous 20 GB free storage for all registered users with bonus achievements, and offers paid plans with much higher limits: 

PRO LITE subscription: 4.99 ‚Ç¨ per month or 49.99 ‚Ç¨ per year gives you 400 GB of storage space and 1 TB of transfer quota per month.
PRO I subscription: 9.99 ‚Ç¨ per month or 99.99 ‚Ç¨ per year gives you 2 TB of storage space and 2 TB of transfer quota per month.
PRO II subscription: 19.99 ‚Ç¨ per month or 199.99 ‚Ç¨ per year gives you 8 TB of storage space and 8 TB of transfer quota per month.
PRO III subscription: 29.99 ‚Ç¨ per month or 299.99 ‚Ç¨ per year gives you 16 TB of storage space and 16 TB of transfer quota per month.

Subscriptions are renewed automatically for successive subscription periods of the same duration and at the same price as the initial period chosen. To manage your subscriptions, simply click on the Play Store icon on your handset, sign in with your Google ID (if you haven't already done so) and then click on the MEGA app. You'll be able to manage your subscription there.

App Permissions:
WRITE_EXTERNAL_STORAGE -> Download your files from MEGA to your device and upload files from your device to MEGA
CAMERA -> Take a picture and upload your photos to MEGA
READ_CONTACTS -> Easily add contacts from your device as MEGA contacts
RECORD_AUDIO & CAPTURE_VIDEO_OUTPUT (mic and camera) -> MEGA provides for end-to-end encrypted audio/video calls 

To enhance users' confidence in the MEGA system, all of the client-side code is published, so interested security researchers can evaluate the encryption process. The code of our mobile app is located on: https://github.com/meganz/android

For more info, please check our website:
See https://mega.nz/terms 

Desktop - https://mega.nz/

comments: Perfect for saving videos and audio. Though this is a bit of a "first world problem" request, it would be nice to have a speed option on videos and audio. It gets sometimes irritating that I have to constantly download and then upload them when dealing with speed issues. Other than that, very nice app. I prefer it more than the desktop one for it's simplicity.

it's a great cloud storage, for me bettee that google drive where you are bound by unnecessary rules. only one complain: their is a daily transfer limit for free users,, if it was only limited storage then I could rate it 5 stars. bit sometimes I have to download a very important file and the app says I'm over my limit,, that's a little irritating for me. but I can understand, It's business after all.

I appreciate mega, however it is very slow and choppy and it's not like I have a weak device. Whenever I upload something, the estimated uploaded data in the notification bar is not correct nor do I have the faintest idea of how many of my files have been uploaded. It might show that there are 58.8MBs uploaded, then go back to 54MBs.

Hello, i would like to report an issue: when a download is completed, the downloading notification still remains at a 100% and not "complete", which unables me from swiping the notification off, resulting me to end up turning MEGA's notifications off and on again to get it removed, please fix it, it keeps bugging me.

I've been using it for a couple of weeks for saving pictures and movies. For movies you may need to download it first so there won't be any buffering throughout the movies. Saving pictures here is üëç

title: Padlet
description:
What is Padlet?
Padlet is like paper for your screen. Start with an empty page and then put whatever you like on it. Upload a video, record an interview, snap a selfie, write your own text posts or upload some documents, and watch your padlet come to life. Once others add to it, the page will update in real time.

Used by teachers, students, professionals, and individuals of all ages, all around the world, the Padlet app is the easiest way to create and collaborate wherever you are. Padlet supports any file type you can imagine, from Spotify Playlists to Excel Spreadsheets. Upload a link and watch a detailed preview appear. Organize the content in any format you like - whether you prefer an grid of images or a chronological scroll.

The Padlet app makes it easy to collaborate in any setting. With views tailored for smaller devices and easy-to-use editor buttons, you can change how your padlet looks with a quick double tap. Add photos from your camera roll, or take a video and upload it instantly. Use our QR reader to access a shared padlet. Share across social platforms like Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, and LinkedIn. 

If you are using Padlet for school or work, you might want to consider our Backpack and Briefcase plans. Visit https://padlet.com/premium.

Organize the content in any format you like - whether you prefer an grid of images or a chronological scroll.

The Padlet app makes it easy to collaborate in any setting. With views tailored for smaller devices and easy-to-use editor buttons, you can change how your padlet looks with a quick double tap. Add photos from your camera roll, or take a video and upload it instantly. Use our QR reader to access a shared padlet. Share across social platforms like Facebook, Twitter, Pinterest, and LinkedIn.

If you are using Padlet for school or work, you might want to consider our Backpack and Briefcase plans. Visit https://padlet.com/premium.

title: Moon Writer
descriptionHTML:
Moon Writer is a minimalistic and functional text editor with Markdown support.

This app allows you to easily write articles, books, keep diaries and take notes.

Sort your documents into folders in order to maintain order. Auto-naming helps you make quick notes, a detailed file name, including date, time, and year, will help you return to editing the document later, without unnecessary searches.

The editor and the viewing mode individually remember where, you have finished reading and editing the document.

The main rule of this app is to prevent data loss. After each character entered, the editor saves a file with text.

Moon Writer supports automatic scheduled backup to Google Drive and DropBox with the ability to protect the zip archive with a password.

The text editor has a minimalist design that eliminates various distractions while working.

Moon Writer supports Markdown, with the help of it you can achieve better text formatting and visually evaluate the work done in viewing mode.

The following are the other features of this app:
‚Ä¢ Automatic and manual change of the theme Day / Night;
‚Ä¢ Ability to enable minimalistic icons;
‚Ä¢ Ability to change the font in the entire app;
‚Ä¢ Ability to enable a simplified formatting panel in the text editor;
‚Ä¢ Ability to disable Markdown;
‚Ä¢ Ability to change the order of buttons on the formatting panel;
‚Ä¢ Ability to change line spacing;
‚Ä¢ Ability to change the font size.
‚Ä¢ Ability to change the formatting symbols for bold and italics during editing (long press on the italic or bold icon on the formatting panel).
summary: Moon Writer is a minimalistic and functional text editor with Markdown support.
recentChanges: ‚ûï New font JetBrainsMono
comments: This is an amazing app. The only problem is is that I have no way to sign in so I fear if I write a story or take down some notes. Then I transfer the app to another device. I fear that my files in the app will not come with the app. If there was some way to sign in to the app I would be more comfortable using it.

I love this! No matter what everyone else says, I think this is a brilliant and simple app to use. The text editing bar is easy to use and you have easy access to all your documents! My only issue is that you can't add pictures (at least I don't know how to anyway) so it would be cool if you could add that. I would definately recommend installing this immediately.
I love it really helped me when I'm writing .I use this app a lot when writing (When I don't want to use Google docs) I really love this app .Good appüòåüíï

Works well and is quite convinient. However, order of the buttons cannot be changed as designed, button for preview is not shown at all. But good averal. Hope author will correct those glitches. Sorry, it was my misunderstanding. It, actually works well. Though, it may be useful for the future to give more detailed information about all the functions. Updating to 5 stars.

Lovely minimalist text editor, perfect for writing! My only complaint is that it doesn't seem to process line breaks properly, so that tends to be a problem when I'm writing poetry on this app. Also, cloud sync is Pro only, but I wish at least I can make my own backups (non-automatic sync, basically). EDIT: Thanks for the quick response from the developer! That's usually a good sign.

title: PSG Official Keyboard

The official, tailor-made PSG keyboard is just what you need to keep the red and blue flag flying high!
 
A smart, all-inclusive keyboard introducing astonishing features such as the PSG  look and feel, an extensive news feed bringing you the most accurate and up-to-date information about your beloved team,and much more. Plus, new and exciting features such as Emoji‚Äôs and many more coming up in the near future!

The PSG official keyboard allows you to enjoy all these special features: 
 
1. An automatic spelling and style checker, protecting you from embarrassing mistakes.
2. An extremely convenient layout, making commonly used keys more accessible than on other keyboards.
3.  Automatic word completion and correction, using a sophisticated algorithm that adapts suggestions to your vocabulary and style.
4. Next-word prediction that learns your vocabulary and style as you type.
5. A fantastic store which allows you to change your keyboard design from a large collection of themes and allows you to enjoy many features  and other cool stuff coming up in the future such as stickers!   

Your privacy is important to us, and we at PSG keyboard have chosen to undertake strict safeguards to protect your privacy. Please note we don't save any credit card information or passwords keep that in mind when you receive the notification from android regarding privacy. We also strive to meet and exceed industry standards.

View all your documents in your mobile with all document Viewer or document reader. View file of any formats like PDF, word, excel and power point easily on your mobile screens. Read PDF and share document directly when you want to. All document viewer app is an easy file viewer that give you view of all formats at one place. Now no need to install multiple apps for each format when you have this document viewer where you can open all formats

This document viewer or file reader app is easy to use and gives you freedom to read all your documents without wasting your time. Whether you have Excel sheet, any presentation on PPT format, PDF file or doc format, you can access all these files here in this file opener and document viewer in one go. title: First 5
description:
Transform your time with God using the First 5 app, developed by Proverbs 31 Ministries. We believe in giving the Lord our firsts! So it only makes sense for us to give Him our first thoughts of each day. First 5 was specifically designed to greet you with a short teaching in God‚Äôs Word first, before you get distracted by social media and everything else screaming for your attention. It will equip you to better study and know the Word of God.

Features
‚Ä¢ One Chapter a Day: We unpack books of the bible, focusing on one passage of scripture per day. So, instead of your daily scripture being random, First 5 will help you start to sense real progress in your understanding of the Bible.

‚Ä¢ Reminder Functionality: Set up a reminder in the app and choose a custom message to bring you into the Word.

‚Ä¢ Daily Scriptural Teaching: When you turn off your First 5 reminder, you‚Äôll go straight to a daily Teaching.

comments: Had just started my journey with this app. Sound doctrine, balanced teachings on the bible with erudite commentaries and podcasts. My pastor only preaches grace repetitively, without delving into other aspects of the bible. It's cloying, akin to having only desserts without solid meals. First 5 is so refreshing! Thank u.

I have only had this app a few days. I was so excited to have finally found an app that has a real devotional bible study that I deleted all my other apps. Then today, only my 4th day on the app, it has completely stopped working. I logged in and only receive a plain white screen. So sad it didn't pan out to be what I hoped it was.

This app is AMAZING!!! It is so helpful for growing in your faith. You can even start a group with people you know to work on abibke study together! They have a bible study for almost any book of the bible! I cannot recall ever being given an ad either! This app is really amazing and I recommend it to anyone who would like to grow in their faith and look at some AMAZING bible studies!!

I LOVE HOW THEY HAVE LECTURE PODCASTS . I ALSO LOVE THAT THEY FINISH ONE WHOLE BOOK FROM THE BIBLE ü•∫ I understand more of the context, How God is moving how characters are responding. It is very practical to apply in my daily life. I love all the content writing per devotionals Ithis is FAITH CHANGING

I love this app. I have been using it for 5+/- years. Since I use it regularly with other online bible, at times I get behind and want to jump in where I left off. Is there a way to "bookmark" in a study without having to go to plans then scroll down and locate my next personal read. I love what you have done bookmarking the particular study for the current day but I'm not always up to date. Thank you again for five writers and staff you are doing a great job! God Bless!

title: PDF Document Scanner
description:
PDF Document Scanner
Turn your phone into a portable document scanner with the best PDF scanner app!
"üèÜ PDF Document Scanner is the Fastest and Safest mobile scan app in the google play store. Create quickly, high-quality PDF scans or JPG scans with your mobile in just one tap. It is an essential app for every Android device. Download it for Free!

‚≠ê Features:
*Quickly scan the document
We offer single and batch mode, just use your phone camera to scan kinds of paper documents, for example, certificates, business contracts, receipts, notes, etc.

*High-quality scanner
Automatic cropping helps increase productivity, filters ensure that the text and graphics in the scanned document are clear and crisp. You can even apply the filter effect to all pages with one click

*Share PDF/JPEG Files
Easily share documents in PDF or JPG format with friends in a variety of ways. You can use email to quickly post to social networks, or save pictures in albums.

*Quick search
When you have a large number of documents, you can easily find them using keywords.

üëâPermission Overview:
1. Storage: PDF Document Scanner needs permission to store documents on your phone.
2. Album; To get your photo when you need to choose pictures from it.
3. Camera: To use the camera to scan documents requires permission.

Subscription:
Subscriptions provided in PDF are updated regularly, and you can enjoy the full content during the lifetime of your subscription. This is an auto-renewal subscription that automatically renews after a 3-day free trial. If you subscribe to PDF, we will charge your Google Play account and charge your account for renewals within 24 hours of the end of the current period. descriptionHTML:
PDF Document Scanner
Turn your phone into a portable document scanner with the best PDF scanner app!
"üèÜ PDF Document Scanner is the Fastest and Safest mobile scan app in the google play store. Create quickly, high-quality PDF scans or JPG scans with your mobile in just one tap. It is an essential app for every Android device. Download it for Free!

‚≠ê Features:
*Quickly scan the document
We offer single and batch mode, just use your phone camera to scan kinds of paper documents, for example, certificates, business contracts, receipts, notes, etc.

*High-quality scanner
Automatic cropping helps increase productivity, filters ensure that the text and graphics in the scanned document are clear and crisp. You can even apply the filter effect to all pages with one click

*Share PDF/JPEG Files
Easily share documents in PDF or JPG format with friends in a variety of ways. You can use email to quickly post to social networks, or save pictures in albums.

*Quick search
When you have a large number of documents, you can easily find them using keywords.

üëâPermission Overview:
1. Storage: PDF Document Scanner needs permission to store documents on your phone.
2. Album; To get your photo when you need to choose pictures from it.
3. Camera: To use the camera to scan documents requires permission.

Subscriptions provided in PDF are updated regularly, and you can enjoy the full content during the lifetime of your subscription. comments: Garbage. The magnifying crop feature is cool until it fails to crop every time. But I'm sure you already know that. Yet you want a $70 subscription for something that isn't even a solid program. The crop feature keeps cutting off a good half inch from the right side of my document. Assuming there's no immediate fix for this, I'm not impressed and need something that works right this moment and your software didn't make the cut. Pun intended.

It's a terrible app, it says after 3 days it is gonna automatically cut a yearly fee. There is no unsubscribe option. Also it doesn't work. For some important work, I hurriedly downloaded this app, but my work got delayed, I couldn't submit my documents in time. It doesn't work.

It's true that whenever you crop it, it zooms on the top of the sheet. You can try this app but I think you won't like it . I would recommend the app makers to take care of that. BTW it makes PDF you can crop the photo in the gallery before making pdf..

If you are reading this please dont install or pay for this app. This scanning app is the worst. It has wasted me more than 30 minutes of my life. When I crop the document it will zoom on the top of the page for no reason and i paid 28$ for this? I want a refund. If u want a working scanning app better do it yourself on your phone camera than using this app because this app will not only waste your time over sth that it cant do properly but will also ask you to subscribe.

Hello Mr. Brown, I downloaded the PDF scanner to use for some classes this past week and I was charged a $75.00 yearly subscription fee. I never planned and buying a yearly subscription and that is way too expensive for me to pay.  I had no notification or anything that told me that I would be charged. Can you please give me a refund or at least give me a discount for how much I've used? I am not trying to get away with anything, I just can't pay $75 for something I only planned on using 3 times

title: QuickBooks Time Tracker
description:
QuickBooks Time Tracker (formerly TSheets Time Tracker) is a cloud-based time tracking and employee scheduling app that allows your employees to clock in and out from the job site with the devices they‚Äôve already got in their pockets.
 
Accurate, electronic time data replaces paper timesheets and makes payroll and invoicing faster and less costly. QuickBooks Time Tracker also accurately tracks time and GPS points (even without cell or internet service), then automatically syncs when back in service, making it a better (and cheaper) alternative to geo-fencing.
 
With a ‚ÄúWho‚Äôs Working‚Äù feature, it‚Äôs easy to track your employees‚Äô location and see who‚Äôs working on what in real time. QuickBooks Time Tracker also features in-app scheduling that allows you to manage drag and drop shifts, assign jobs, see who‚Äôs working at a glance, and send alerts to managers if employees haven‚Äôt clocked in for a job or shift as scheduled.
  
GAME CHANGING FEATURES
‚Ä¢ Mobile app time tracking for employees on the move: clock in/out, change job codes, edit and calculate timesheets, see work schedule changes, and add notes on the go
‚Ä¢ QuickBooks, Square, and Gusto integrations (and more!) to simplify your back office
‚Ä¢ In-app scheduling lets employees easily clock in and clock out of assigned jobs or shifts
‚Ä¢ On-the-clock GPS tracking, even when employees are out-of-service (cost-effective alternative to geofencing!)
‚Ä¢ Push, text & email alerts that are triggered if employees don‚Äôt clock in as scheduled, or approach overtime limits
‚Ä¢ Save 2-8% on gross payroll costs & eliminate hours of manual data entry
 
ALSO INCLUDED
‚Ä¢ Seamless integration with QuickBooks Online & QuickBooks for PC (Pro, Premier, & Enterprise)
‚Ä¢ Integrations with popular payroll, accounting, invoicing software
‚Ä¢ Powerful, real-time reports in multiple formats (PDF, CSV, online, HTML)
‚Ä¢ Safe data storage and detailed time log to protect you against labor disputes and audits
‚Ä¢ Configurations for DCAA/DOL compliance
‚Ä¢ Developer open API
 
THERE'S MORE TO LOVE...
 
TRACK TIME ‚è≤Ô∏è
‚Ä¢ Track employee hours accurately with a real-time virtual time clock
‚Ä¢ Easily switch between job codes, pause time recording, or take a break
‚Ä¢ Employees clock in to new shifts and jobs right from the schedule
‚Ä¢ Track work time against multi-level job codes, projects, locations, clients, and more
‚Ä¢ See where your employees are located on one map view, with GPS tracking (Continued use of GPS running in the background can dramatically decrease battery life.)

 
SCHEDULE ANYWHERE ‚è≤Ô∏è
‚Ä¢ Schedule work hours by job or by shift with our easy-to-use schedule builder
‚Ä¢ Easily create or modify a schedule with drag-and-drop shifts
‚Ä¢ Sync work schedules with Apple iCal, Microsoft Outlook or Google Calendar.
‚Ä¢ Notifications let employees know when a new schedule is published or if there are shift changes.
‚Ä¢ Get notifications if employees don‚Äôt clock in to a job or shift as scheduled
 
MANAGE TIME ‚è≤Ô∏è
‚Ä¢ Edit, delete, or approve timesheets with a click
‚Ä¢ Set overtime alerts to notify employees and managers as work time limits approach
‚Ä¢ See who‚Äôs working and where, even on the go, from one dashboard
‚Ä¢ Track PTO, sick day, holiday, or vacation time accruals for employees
 
REPORT TIME ‚è≤Ô∏è
‚Ä¢ See work day and week totals at a glance
‚Ä¢ Easily access a breakdown of employee hours by employee, job, customer, or location
‚Ä¢ View timer history with map 
‚Ä¢ Keep a black-box history of all edits and deletions, in case of an audit
 
PLUS, using the web dashboard, managers can:
‚Ä¢ Manage PTO, leave, holiday & vacation time
‚Ä¢ Schedule overtime alerts
‚Ä¢ Set up custom approvals

SUPPORT, CUSTOMER RATED  ‚≠ê ‚≠ê ‚≠ê ‚≠ê ‚≠ê
QuickBooks Time Tracker offers free unlimited phone, email, and chat support to all of our customers. Have a question? We‚Äôre always happy to help!
 
Phone: 888.836.2720
Email: qbtimehelp@intuit.com

recentChanges:
What‚Äôs improved
Having battery optimization turned on used to make our location feature a little lazy. It‚Äôs more accurate now while you‚Äôre saving that precious power.
comments: This app is flawed in at least two critical ways: It often lost timecard notes that I saved, which contained info about my workday. My boss spent a long time on the phone with customer support and still got nowhere. And, after setting up fingerprint lock to log in, then having my phone's fingerprint sensor malfunction, the app did not allow me the option of logging in with my password. Needless to say, we quit using it after a month, and the information on the notes is lost forever. Intuit blows

New QuickBooks GPS tracking is extremely inaccurate & faulty compared to the previous TSheets version. "Notes" is a good feature but items written in this section, even after saving, will disappear. Have also had many occasions where Notes that were successfully saved disappeared 3-4 days later. Did not have these issues with TSheets. "Take a Break" is inconveniently placed & when accidentally started there is no way to stop it until the 30 minutes are up.

Works pretty well but make sure that you have your notes filled in or it won't clock you out. I wish there was an audible alarm when this happens because it's easy to not notice when you are busy and find out hours later you are still on the clock. also, if I add notes immediately upon signing in they don't always get saved.

I was a Tshhets customer before the sold to Intuit and integrated it into QBO. I used to love this app. Ever since giving it over to Intuit, it is absolutely disfuctional. The mobile. app doesn't even let you log in. The Web app constantly logs you out then mixes up it's log in with QBO. I have to try log in 2-3 times before it goes to tsheets. Yesterday I had to log back in 6 times, essentially everytime I need to log out of a client for break or switch clients, I get kicked all the way out.

hard to share hours if people don't connect properly, should also add in a note function for dates or extra expenses to be shared with an employer so receipts could be added by picture and logged and paid put with ease. also if there was a way to flag days paid ? so it looks cleaner and is clear which dates were being used for a pay period that would make it alot more user friendly. otherwise I really like this app just would love to see some additional functions

title: Alarm Clock for Me free
description:
Alarm Clock for Me turns your Android device into an alarm clock that plays your favorite tunes, a bedside clock with gorgeous themes, and a reliable daily helper perfect for every timing situation.

Main features:

‚Ä¢  Alarm clock: wake up to your favorite music and decorate your home screen with beautiful alarm clock widgets
‚Ä¢  Sleep Timer: fall asleep to your favorite songs or sounds from our collection;
‚Ä¢  Current temperature: check it in the morning to pick out a perfect outfit for your day;
‚Ä¢ Unlimited support: set as many alarms you need ‚Äî  and you‚Äôll never oversleep or miss an important event; 
‚Ä¢  Nightstand mode: see what the time is at night while your Android is charging;
‚Ä¢  Background support: alarm will go off even if the app is not running;
‚Ä¢ Two new ways to turn off an alarm: math alarm clock to kick-start your brain or shake alarm option to wake up your body;
‚Ä¢  Vibrate / Fade in / Snooze options for making your awakening more gentle.

Other features enhancing the overall experience:

‚Ä¢ Use the customizable clock widgets on your Home screen.
‚Ä¢ Adjust the screen brightness so that it doesn‚Äôt blind you after a good night‚Äôs sleep.
‚Ä¢ Take advantage of Perfect Bedtime Reminder to go to sleep at the right time in the evening.
‚Ä¢ Enable Gentle PreAlarm to enjoy easy and gentle awakening in the morning.
‚Ä¢ Use the shortcut on the main screen to go directly to the app‚Äôs settings and all active alarms.
‚Ä¢ You can also choose between vertical and horizontal modes, or prevent the main screen from auto-rotation by fixing the position of the clock on your screen.

Enjoy a perfect balance of beauty and functionality with this beautiful and reliable alarm clock app!

Privacy Policy: http://apalon.com/privacy_policy.html
California Privacy Notice:¬†https://apalon.com/privacy_policy.html#h
EULA: http://www.apalon.com/terms_of_use.html
AdChoices: http://www.apalon.com/privacy_policy.html#4

Performance improvements you won't necessarily notice but definitely enhancing your experience with the app.
We continue working on the app and are always open to your ideas and feedback at support@apalon.com
comments: This WAS a great app, but now I am on the verge of Uninstaller it. Loud ads KILL this app!!!! It is so annoying to have the alarm go off and then have to wait 5 or 10 seconds through an annoying ad before I can shut that off. It especially sucks if you have someone else in the bed with you who gets up later. Yeah, the wife gets pissed off because it wakes her up completely. "Sorry honey, just waot for the annoying ad with the jackhammer sound then go back to sleep." Yeah right. Silent ads are ok

The add keeps fading in contrast until you can't see anything except a dark screen. It also locks your ability to change the contrast settings. Very strange and frustrating. Will be deleting this app. I will say the ability to set multiple alarms was nice.

Customer service was fast and good to work with. Still a great program. Thanks for all the help. Dean Love the program. I purchased it a while back and all was good until just recently. It now has ads. The problem is I have 3 Google accounts for different emails and it is looking at 1 that I didn't use to purchase it with. If I delete the account it shows paid. If I add it back it has ads. It didn't use to do this. Any help would be great.

very flexible alarm. Different alarms, many different ways to be woken.This is the only alarm that actually works well with Google. I use the solve the math expression way they provide.. I just wish the display wasn't so dark- its very slow to brighten up by sliding fingers up and down. Just wish there were a light theme or factory theme choice. Max brightness is what I want. Especially during the day . Please fix this issue. thanx.

ngl this app is pretty wonky. It auto adjusts everything to the max so I'm here in bed trying to set up my alarm for tomorrow morning and I'm being blinded with max brightness and deafened with max volume, both of which are locked. Looks like a good company, but a buggy product.

title: Camera Scanner - Document & PDF Scanner
description:
Camera Scanner is a PDF document scanner application that turns your phone into a portable scanner. you can scan documents, photos, receipts, reports, or just about anything. The scan will be saved to the device in image or PDF format. 

Scan PDF app is professionally designed with a modern, clean and very easy to use interface. Along with it is the advanced technology applied to help you quickly optimize PDF scanning and export high-quality PDF. 

‚û°Ô∏è Document detect and adjustment:
‚úì Scanner app allows to adjust the documents after scanning by the crop feature, image rotation, and color filters. 
‚úì Besides, the cam scanner smart crop feature automatically recognizes your document to crop the image at the perfect ratio

‚û°Ô∏è Sort and export as pdf/image jpg:
‚úì Sort files by name, file size, or file creation date according to the user's needs.
‚úì All files exported by photoscan has extremely high quality. Users free pdf scanner app can choose to export a PDF file or a JPG image file.

‚û°Ô∏è Easy to share or viewer:
‚úì Easily share documents in PDF or JPEG format with friends or colleagues via various ways: post on social media, send attachment or document through email. 
‚úì Also, you can save the document scanned in mobile storage as pdf/jpg and easy to preview it in the app.

Camera Scanner - Document & PDF Scanner - Want an attractive camera scanner? Camera Scanner helps you extract PDFs anytime, anywhere. Try now!

title: Challenges Alarm Clock - Wake up Puzzles (Free)
description:
Challenges Alarm Clock is the best alarm clock for people how can't get out of bed with the simple idea, been as annoying and hard to ignore as he can. This app has been designed to be simple to set up but also powerful enough so you can have a smart alarm clock that can do amazing things like recognizing simple objects like toothbrush, shoes, animals, and smiles on a picture so you have to wake to laugh, even by force, or simply solving puzzles like math equations, memory, and sequence games to stop the alarm.

Features:
‚òÖ Challenges and Games (Math, Memory, Sequence, Retype, Picture, Smile, and Pose)
‚òÖ Disable/limit number of snoozes
‚òÖ Multiple media (Ringtone, Alarm songs, or music)
‚òÖ Dark theme for the app
‚òÖ Prevent user from turn off the phone or uninstall the alarm
‚òÖ Smooth increase volume
‚òÖ Extra loud volume


You can customize this alarm clock anyway you like:

Adding Challenges
This alarm clock comes with a lot of challenges (like a puzzle, games, taking pictures) that gives you tasks so you can't dismiss the alarm and go back sleep.

You can also add multiples challenges to your alarm. That way, when the alarm starts, random challenges will be assigned to the alarm and you never get bored.

Some of the tasks to the alarm are:

Picture Challenge
Using some AI stuff, the app can recognize a pre-select list of objects and can't turn off the alarm until you take pictures of pre-chosen objects or animals.

For example, always forget to drink water? Add a challenge to take a picture of a cup when it triggers so when it starts you have to stand up and drink water.

Smile Challenge
Simple like that, you have to wake up with a big smile, a huge one, and take a selfie. If you don't show all of your teeth to the camera, the alarm will never go out. Jokes book is recommended for this challenge

Memory Game
The classic memory game. Configure the board with the number of cards you want and, when the alarm starts, match the pairs on the board until you find out all the couples.

Math Challenge
If you think wake up early is annoying, imagine waking up early having to solve a math problem. Happily, that is the case üòÅ. Choose between levels of a math problem to solve when the alarm goes off and fry your brain out, trying to find out the correct number.

Retype Game
The app shows a list of characters at random and you have to write it in the exact order. Seems simple, but try to do that as soon as you wake up and see

Sequence Game
Complete this puzzle by tapping the shapes at the same order as it shines. Don't worry if you don't remember all at first, the alarm can repeat the sequence as many times you want.

Pose Challenge
Put the camera in a good place and do some pose, like yoga, to the camera.

Snooze
Disable snooze or limit it, so you have to complete the challenges, or change the snooze duration to a tiny one, so you don't have any time to rest.

Vibrate
Don't like your phone vibrating like crazy when waking up? Me neither, that's why you have the option to disable it from the alarm and just listen to the beautiful song.

Media
Choose between your favorite music, your phone ringtones, or no sound at all to wake up and configure the volume you want the media.

Soft wake
The media you choose will increase the volume gently until the sound you configured.

Dark mode
Change the theme of the app between light and dark mode any way you like.

Smooth increase volume
The volume of the alarm increases gradually until max, so you wake up gracefully

Extra loud volume
It will override the phone volume, increase it, and lock to its max.

Annoying mode
This option will not let you uninstall the app or turn off the phone. The only way to be free of the alarm is to complete the challenges

recentChanges: * Ads no longer showing for paying users
comments: I don't rate often, but I'm a heavy sleeper, and this app is great! I used to use an alarm clock, which woke me, but I'd half-sleepily turn it off before I was fully concious. This app is consistently getting me pilot of bed in the morning, now at 6:15 every morning I wake up to Jimi Hendrix's "All Along The Watchtower" play three mini-games and I'm up! 5/5, Bravo, developers; a fantastic innovation, Bravo!

This app is amazing! If you're the person that can't get up in the morning this app is for you. You can set time for the alarm, days of the week, the music for the alarm and the best part challenges for the alarm. You can add a challenge to take a picture of something, solve a math problem, shape sequence (simon says), memory, smile to selfie, retype words, and make a pose. But the only bad thing i have is the ads. They pop up every time you save.

It was great, the picture challenge helped me a lot as someone who struggles with hitting snooze a million times. Having said that, he ads have gotten out of control. Unskippable 5s ads, I close one and another one shows up, some of the ads have fake X's in the top corner. On top of that the ads show up seemingly every 2 or 3 clicks. To the point it ended up taking me 10 minutes to set 1 new alarm with a custom sound... So frustrating. I'm looking for a new alarm app for sure

I am not a morning person, usually my mother spends alot of time to wake me up. Believe it or not this app can wake me up easily. With the traditional phone alarms I can easily disable them. But for this one I have to get up to solve questions or go outside to take a picture, else it just won't stop!!!!. While going through this motion I am fully awake.üòÖ

Really awesome app, works as described. Only issue is even if you pay to remove adds the app occasionally glitches out and forgets you did this and displays pop up ads with timers and ad banners at the bottom of the screen... A good restart of the app fixes it but it really shouldnt happen in the first place. Update in June says this was fixed, I can confirm it's not entirely as I got the app a few days ago.

title: Any.do - To do list, planner & calendar
description:
ü•á "#1 to do list app out there‚Äù - WSJ
üèÜ Editor's Choice by Google

Over 30M people rely on Any.do to stay organized and get more done.
It's a simple to do list app with reminders, planner & calendar - all in one.

ü•á "A MUST HAVE APP" (Lifehacker, NYTimes, USA TODAY).

Any.do is a free to-do list, planner & calendar app for managing and organizing your daily tasks, to-do lists, notes, reminders, checklists, calendar events, grocery lists, and more.

Organize your tasks & to-do list

‚Ä¢ ADVANCED CALENDAR & DAILY PLANNER - Keep your to-do list and calendar events always at hand with our calendar widget. Any.do to-do list & planner support daily calendar view, 3-day Calendar view, Weekly calendar view & agenda view, with built-in reminders. Review and organize your calendar events and to do list side by side.

‚Ä¢ SYNCS SEAMLESSLY - Keeps all your to do list, tasks, reminders, notes, calendar & agenda always in sync so you‚Äôll never forget a thing. Sync your phone‚Äôs calendar, google calendar, Facebook events, outlook calendar, or any other calendar so you don‚Äôt forget an important event. Even on your Wear OS device.

‚Ä¢ SET REMINDERS - One-time reminders, recurring reminders, Location reminders & voice reminders. NEW! Easily create tasks and get reminders in WhatsApp.

‚Ä¢ WORK TOGETHER - Share your to do list and assign tasks with your friends, family & colleagues from your task list to collaborate and get more done. 

---

ALL-IN-ONE PLANNER & CALENDAR APP FOR GETTING THINGS DONE
Create and set reminders with voice to your to do list. 
For better task management flow we added a calendar integration to keep your agenda always up to date. 
For better productivity, we added recurring reminders, location reminders, one-time reminder, sub-tasks, notes & file attachments. 
To keep your to do list up to date, we‚Äôve added a daily planner and focus mode.

INTEGRATIONS
Any.do To do list, Calendar, planner & Reminders Integrates with Google Calendar, Outlook, WhatsApp, Slack, Gmail, Google Tasks, Evernote, Trello, Wunderlist, Todoist, Zapier, Asana, Microsoft to-do, Salesforce, OneNote, Google Assistant, Amazon Alexa, Office 365, Exchange, Jira & More.

TO DO LIST, CALENDAR, PLANNER & REMINDERS MADE SIMPLE
Designed to keep you on top of your to do list, tasks and calendar events with no hassle. With intuitive drag and drop of tasks, swiping to mark to-do's as complete, and shaking your device to remove completed from your to do list - you can stay organized and enjoy every minute of it.

POWERFUL TO DO LIST TASK MANAGEMENT
Add a to do list item straight from your email / Gmail / Outlook inbox by forwarding do@Any.do. Attach files from your computer, Dropbox, or Google Drive to your to- tasks.

DAILY PLANNER & LIFE ORGANIZER
Any.do is a to do list, a calendar, an inbox, a notepad, a checklist, task list, a board for post its or sticky notes, a task & project management tool, a reminder app, a daily planner, a family organizer, an agenda, a bill planner and overall the simplest productivity tool you will ever have. 

SHARE LISTS, ASSIGN & ORGANIZE TASKS
Planning & organizing projects has never been easier. Now you can share lists between family members, assign tasks to each other, chat and much more. Any.do will help you and the people around you stay in-sync and get reminders so that you can focus on what matters, knowing you had a productive day and crossed off your to do list.

GROCERY LIST & SHOPPING LIST
Any.do task list, calendar, agenda, reminders & planner is also great for shopping lists at the grocery store. Simply create a list on Any.do, share it with your loved ones and see them adding their shopping items in real-time.

Any.do Inc.

156 Begin St. 22nd floor, Tel Aviv, Israel
recentChanges:
- Dark mode is finally here, hooray!
- Recurring reminders issue was fixed
- We added a save button to the task details screen
- Filter your tasks for today, the next 7 days, and all tasks
- Universal search with tasks, events, sub-tasks, notes, lists & tags
- Keep track of how many tasks you‚Äôve completed with Any.do
- Upgraded sorting by time (the 2nd most requested feature!)
- New and stunning reminders & snoozing redesign
- Import tasks into Any.do from your clipboard
comments: This app is really cool. one feature I would really appreciate is if you could allow events to be completed, or allow tasks to have durations/end times. A common problem I have is a task has a specific time and duration, but sometimes I don't get around to it at the exact time so I would like it to only be completed when I actually manually mark it off.

you speak your list of errands, schedule, set alarms, connect an app for messaging your tasks at hand, sets up your calendar, reminds you on time, and it is a very easy application to use...especially settings for different types of notifications, you can customize notification sounds according to topic of interest also. highly reccomend

The user interface is horrible. The way the tasks show up is very difficult to see and read at a glance, and the font in most places is so small it's not even readable. There are only five predefined color schemes for themes, none of them are at all attractive or easy to read. I set a reminder, and it didn't even go off. For an app this expensive, I would expect much more. There are a ton of free apps that are so much better than this one.

Anydo is great, but... - 1star for no account free option. I value privacy more than cross-platform. - 1 star for upgrade requiring yearly payments. I understand that $3/mo doesn't seem like much to developers, but for people who have many apps and limited funds, subscriptionware adds up. (And we don't hit a coffee shop more than a couple times a year, so swallow the urge to make that comparison) Anydo is simple to use and has a clean, clear interface. Too bad there's no simple upgrade.

Almost. As in good integration with other apps and intuitive. But, the deal breaker for me as mentioned by others was the nagging to get you to upgrade to premium subscription. Yaaa, No! Uninstalled. To the developers. Especially the one who wrote the snooty response to that guy Jacob: Here's a clue, that is your notice to fix the "bug" Update:7/19/21 And here they gave a carbon copy response to me as well. Ha!

title: Pointagon - Custom Accountability Challenges
description:
Pointagon is a productivity app designed make achieving goals easier. Whether those goals are big or small, this app helps you strive harder to overcome. There is a greater sense of commitment to a goal when a competition is involved. Also, having accountability will keep you on track. Log points daily and build lasting habits!

What is a challenge?

In Pointagon, a challenge consists of a set of rules you strive to complete each day. The rules can be anything you want. They have a point value associated with them and you can specific whether they can happen more than once a day. To start a challenge in the app, you fill out a simple form, and invite your friends and family. After that, you log your points earned each day. The person with the most points at the end of the challenge wins!

What kind of things can I create a challenge for?

Anything you want!

Want to lose weight or eat healthier? Create a challenge that involves making healthier food choices and exercising!

Want to make progress on your endless list of projects? Create a challenge that motivates you to make progress slowly each day!

Are you too busy and can't seem to find time to relax? Create a challenge that forces you to take breaks and time for yourself!

Want to get your finances under control? Make challenges that reduce spending and promote smarter financial choices!

Are you having a hard time keeping up with your spiritual health? Make a challenge that reminds you to read and pray daily!

The possibilities are endless!

What are challenge stats and badges?

As you finish challenges, your Pointagon Score increases. The amount it increases by depends on your place in the challenge, how long the challenge lasted,  and how many people were in the challenge. In addition to your score increasing, you also earn badges as you compete! See your stats and the badges in the settings page and compare them with your friends and family!

How does Pointagon build lasting habits?

Habits form through repetition. The act of committing to a challenge, and repeating the challenge over and over will build habits over time. If you want to eat healthier, create a weekly challenge involving calorie logging and choosing healthier foods. If you want to be more active or productive, create challenges for getting things done. The key is repetition and inviting friends and family to keep you accountable!

Share your creative challenge ideas with our Template Community! Gain access to the creativity of our users. Search for challenges by category, rate other's posts, and share your experience! 

Try something new and interesting. Play our challenge roulette game and get a different challenge every time! Pick the type of challenge you want or just leave it to chance! If you have ideas for more roulette challenges, please send them to us!

So, try Pointagon now for Free! There is no sign up required to compete in solo challenges. Sign up with Google, Facebook, or email to get online features! Invite your friends and family and start competing!

Follow our social media at:
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/pointagon
Twitter: https://twitter.com/pointagon
Reddit: https://www.reddit.com/r/pointagon

Find info and other apps by Swanscript at our website:
https://swanscript.net

Contact us:
support@swanscript.net

Now with an improved look and added features, this new version provides SSS members and employers with a more convenient way of transacting with SSS using their mobile device.

Members:
Generate/edit and inquire Payment Reference Number for contribution and pay online

title: School Event Tickets Scanner
description:
School Event Tickets Scanner App a handful Android application for event organizers - to let them stay organized and check in attendees faster at event with. Now available on Android phone and tablet device! Event organizers can scan tickets or look up names on the guestlist, and use multiple devices without worrying about the same ticket being used twice.
All check-ins are synced with our servers, so you can use more than one Android or iOS device at different points of entry.

Using School Event Tickets Scanner App app you can:
- Look up and check in attendees off a list
- Easily validate attendee barcodes or QR codes using the camera-based scanner
- Check in attendees using multiple devices at the same time
- Analyze your attendance data online after the event

Permanently deleted app scrolled down found a similar app, installed it and removed ads for $1.00 also able to customize the new app with some rather inventive features. Bottom line purchase a different app.
I use it in the evening while takingbmy dogs for a walk. It does a good job, illuminating the path. thanks
1 star for ads. Ridiculous.

Updating my review b/c after a couple years or so of this being a reliable way for me to access light immediately & in emergency situations I now have to wait for an advertisement to play before I can use the light. I ended up tripping & falling down the other night b/c this app decided to play an ad before allowing me to use it. When you're use to having instant light & then suddenly it's not there it can be a real bummer. I get that you need to make $ but geeesh!

Edited my original review. It used to be a great app. Now I get ads popping up all the time. They pop up and turn the torch off whilst I am using it and everytimw I turn it off. It's very frustrating and makes the app pointless. I have uninstalled it now and I will just use the build in torch setting.

title: Microsoft Outlook: Secure email, calendars & files
description:
Microsoft Outlook keeps you connected and protected, with your email, calendar and files all in one app. With intelligent email, calendar reminders and contacts, Outlook for Android lets you do more from one powerful inbox. Connect. Organize. Get things done.

Email friends, family and colleagues from multiple accounts on one app and see what matters most first with the Focused Inbox that keeps the important messages on top. Switch between your emails and calendar to schedule your next meeting or share your availability with anyone with just a few taps. Email a document from your Files list or a photo from your Gallery and attach it easily.

Microsoft Outlook provides secure and seamless inbox management that enables you to stay connected on the go. Outlook includes Office, Word, Excel, PowerPoint and OneDrive integrations to help you manage and send files and connects with Teams, Zoom and other video calling providers without hassle.

Customize email and calendars so you can stay on top of your busy day. Listen to what‚Äôs new in your inbox, organize schedules and more. Find what you need with Search- it‚Äôs only a tap away or you can use your voice and ask for what you need with language you use every day.

Outlook for Android works with Microsoft Exchange, Microsoft 365, Outlook.com, Gmail and Yahoo Mail.

MICROSOFT OUTLOOK FEATURES:

Secure Email, Calendar, Contacts & Files ‚Äì All In One Place
‚Ä¢ Email, calendar, contacts and files are all together in one place.
‚Ä¢ Calendar and file access right from your inbox.
‚Ä¢ Connected experiences with Office, Word, Excel, PowerPoint and OneNote.
‚Ä¢ Microsoft Office documents are accessible from Outlook, stored locally, or on OneDrive or other cloud storage.
‚Ä¢ Create and join your online video calls and meetings with Teams, Zoom, BlueJeans and Webex.

Email & Day Planner Management ‚Äì Everything Organized
‚Ä¢ Outlook helps you stay on top of your day with customized calendar and email capabilities.
‚Ä¢ Know what‚Äôs Up Next in your day from your calendar with a glance at your inbox.
‚Ä¢ Email inbox management displays your most important messages first and enables swipe gestures and smart filters.
‚Ä¢ Use as an organizer & share calendars to easily coordinate schedules.
‚Ä¢ RSVP to invitations from your inbox and send a personalized comment too.
‚Ä¢ Add schedules from Facebook or of your favorite sports & TV shows through Bing calendars.

Calendar & Inbox Organizer ‚Äì Intelligence Everywhere
‚Ä¢ Outlook provides helpful ways for you to stay focused.
‚Ä¢ Use your voice to find people, contacts, emails, events and attachments with Search.
‚Ä¢ Use suggested replies instead of typing out your message responses to get things done faster.
‚Ä¢ Email manager highlights actions for you through @mentions.
‚Ä¢ Calendar automatically updates with travel and delivery information.
‚Ä¢ Focused Inbox keeps important emails and conversations front and center.
‚Ä¢ Email organizer groups same subject emails and conversations for easier tracking.
‚Ä¢ Listen to your emails with Play My Emails in English and catch up hands-free to get time back in your day.

Email Management & Spam Protection ‚Äì Safe & Secure
‚Ä¢ Microsoft Outlook protects your information with security you can trust.
‚Ä¢ Simple, secure sign-on to authenticate and protect your identity.
‚Ä¢ Email management with built-in protection against viruses and spam.
‚Ä¢ Advanced protection to keep your messages safe from phishing attacks and other online threats.
‚Ä¢ Microsoft security and privacy keeps your email, calendar, contacts and files safe.

Get management for contacts, email, work schedule, files and more with Microsoft Outlook today.

summary: Connect & protect your inbox, schedules and contacts. Easily organized together.
developerAddress: One Microsoft Way
recentChanges: When adding a recipient to an email, tap "X" to remove unwanted people suggestions. When you remove a suggested person, you will not see it appear on other Outlook apps either.
comments: I used Android Outlook for a long time and it was great but, for several months now, it's become painfully slow, it takes several minutes, or app restart, to send a simple 200 word email, unacceptable! Also, often it takes a day or more to receive any email and you can't even print or change the priority of the message, terrible! What happened Microsoft? Do something about it! Other than these issues, works like a desktop version. Unfortunately, no better app is available to download. Meh üòí

I have been using Outlook for around 20 years and while it has gone through many changes I find it current incarnation to be satisfying and easy to use. It provides everything needed to manage emails without confusing extras. My one gripe is how hard it is to do multiple deletion of emails as I can only select a few emails together making the process time consuming. Apart from that Outlook is Outstanding!

When you have a fresh install, it will use your default browser. HOWEVER, after a certain amount of time, with all updates and WiFi turned OFF, the "use default browser" option will mysteriously appear in settings and will be greyed out and forced to use this app's internal browser. (What is it? A timed setting in the code!?!)

Horribly buggy. Can't delete all messages -- after you do, they all come right back. Another one: recently, my 'other' messages disappeared for no reason, and when I click 'load more messages' nothing happens. Another: sometimes, one of my accounts won't work, but there's no notification saying it's not working, so you can miss important messages. There are more bugs too. The only good thing about this app is the nice uncluttered design. A pity, because I really wanted to like it.

I have loved Microsoft Outlook on my Android app until recently. Something is broken in it. For some reason my "other" mail would show up in my focused inbox but I couldn't click on it, it would just say "error loading message". So, I decided to try and uninstall it, which I cannot do even if I have the administrator privileges of the app turned off. So, I factory reseted it, and well it is trying to reinstall it just flips back and forth between a black screen and an icon screen.

title: Quick VPN
description:
Quick VPN is the ultimate Android VPN. Quick VPN is a 100% unlimited VPN that does not require any type of registration.

Quick VPN gives you the freedom to be completely anonymous. All of your traffic is encrypted while Quick VPN is on.

Quick VPN protects your privacy and identity and allows you to browse the web anonymously without fear of being tracked.‚Ä®‚Ä®

Quick VPN encrypts your data and safely connects you to any web site or mobile app. Quick VPN keeps you safe by directing your data traffic through our secure servers. Your personal IP address is hidden so that you are free to browse the internet without revealing your location to anyone without permission.

title: Hive Work
description:
Join our team as a data labeling expert. We offer competitive compensation, flexible hours, and the ability to work anywhere you choose. Start earning today!

Simple tasks. Real money.

Hive Work allows talented, hard-working people to make extra money through small jobs that can be done from anywhere in the world at any time. Start earning from home today.

Stable & Secure

Over 2 million people around the world trust us to provide a steady source of income.
$1M+ earned
Billions of tasks labeled

A Community

Join a vibrant community of moderators who are using Hive Work to improve their lives.

30+ Countries

summary: A Data Labeling Agency
recentChanges:
- Added two new languages: German and Traditional Chinese.
- Added demographic info for better job search
- Bug fixes and performance improvement.
comments: I don't know what to say. Hive is an EXCELLENT service, but the mobile app is trash. it doesn't show you the full selection of jobs (only a small fraction of them and mostly the ones that pay less than 1 dollar), and I've got stuck a few times on qualifier tests (the app just freezes on the loading screen between pages, leaving you with no option other than restarting it). just use the service through your browser

I have some good and bad experience. I can do the task which is simple and easy but at the same time when I do mistakes on some task and no clear instructions in some cases, there should be the notification of the task that i did wrong so that I can improve, not just the plain notification like you are temporarily or permanently banned.
Work testing is very fast and after complete test real work is very slow load its take 10 our 15 min for 1task. Time wasting work
Have been work with this app for more a year now and they are very good. Jobs are always available anytime, and payment always send every week.

Worst experience after recently worked hard, while they keep failing up your payments and now they don't even bother replying back. It's good when you work hard & get paid.. Now problems occurring with unable to link paypal error authentication & it's getting worse than ever.

title: Microsoft Word: Write, Edit & Share Docs on the Go
description:
Microsoft Word is the document editor that you can take with you on the go.

Writing and collaborating with your team doesn't have to be confined to the office.  Edit docs and collaborate on shared projects in real time on your mobile device with the help of Microsoft Word. Documents have never been easier to create, read, edit, and share. DOCX files, PDFs and everything else ‚Äî regardless of the format, Microsoft Word has you covered.

Access files and make edits with ease while using the Word app. Read documents and open attachments with the built-in docs viewer or edit a PDF with the help of Word‚Äôs file conversion. Once you‚Äôre done editing, share the file in the format you‚Äôd like. Create documents and more on the go and allow Microsoft to polish them off for you with expert editing tools.  

Resume templates, newsletters, brochures and more are all accessible within the template gallery, simply select the documents you would like and get started.  

Never miss out on an opportunity, all the writing tools you may need are now on-hand. Write letters or draft your resume today with the help of an intelligent word processor.

The writing app is as handy as you want it to be. Blogger, writer, journalist, columnist, student, or project manager: Your office moves with you with Microsoft Word.

Write a letter, create templates, read Word documents, edit docs and collaborate with your team anywhere with Microsoft Word.

Create Documents
‚Ä¢ Create docs, assignments, letters, blogs, scripts, notes, resumes and more with beautifully designed modern templates.
‚Ä¢ Editing with rich formatting and layout.
‚Ä¢ Document editor keeps formats and layouts looking great.
‚Ä¢ Docs app with templates for resumes, forms and more.

Read, Write, and Edit
‚Ä¢ Read docs, letters, PDFs, scripts, and more on your device with Reading View.
‚Ä¢ Edit documents from PDFs by converting to and from Word documents.
‚Ä¢ PDF file conversion: save as PDF after editing and share your PDF file easily.

Collaborate and Share With Anyone, Anywhere
‚Ä¢ Collaborate by commenting in your document right next to the text.
‚Ä¢ View any document with the help of built-in docs viewer.
‚Ä¢ Read & edit documents as a team and stay on top of changes to the text, layout, and formatting.
‚Ä¢ Editor version history lets you revert to view earlier drafts to edit docs.
 
Sharing is simplified
‚Ä¢ Share files and collaborate with a few taps.
‚Ä¢ File & document permission management that lets you see who is working on them.
‚Ä¢ Copy files directly into the body of an email message with its format intact or attach your PDFs and docs to an email.

Download Microsoft Word now and edit documents anywhere.

REQUIREMENTS
‚Ä¢  1 GB RAM or above

To create or edit documents, sign in with a free Microsoft account on devices with a screen size smaller than 10.1 inches.

Unlock the full Microsoft experience with a qualifying Microsoft 365 subscription for your phone, tablet, PC, and Mac.

Microsoft 365 subscriptions purchased from the app will be charged to your Play Store account and will automatically renew within 24 hours prior to the end of the current subscription period, unless auto-renewal is disabled beforehand. You can manage your subscriptions in your Play Store account settings. A subscription cannot be cancelled during the active subscription period.

This app is provided by either Microsoft or a third-party app publisher and is subject to a separate privacy statement and terms and conditions. Data provided through the use of this store and this app may be accessible to Microsoft or the third-party app publisher, as applicable, and transferred to, stored, and processed in the United States or any other country where Microsoft or the app publisher and their affiliates or service providers maintain facilities.

Please refer to Microsoft's EULA for Terms of Service for Microsoft 365 on Android. By installing the app, you agree to these terms and conditions: http://aka.ms/eula
