summary: Powerful mobile writing app. Use Office to easily create, share & edit documents
developerAddress: One Microsoft Way
recentChanges:
ÔªøThank you for using Word.

We regularly release updates to the app, which include great new features, as well as improvements for speed and reliability.

Did you know that with a Microsoft 365 subscription, you can unlock the full power of Office across all of your devices? Find special offers in the app.
comments: Perfect, has it all and much more! Even has a resume, brochures, travel journaling to include pictures. I just use 3 layouts for writing stuff down and there's like 15 unique layouts. You can save your papers anywhere you prefer and it has auto save by default. Bold, underline, italic, color, emotes and a bunch of other stuff I don't use. Thats what makes products special, having everything plus more. I don't have microsoft word on computer, always had to use colorless text documents. Love this!

Easy to use and navigate, with a clean, uncluttered look. I like being able to change the layout from Print view to Mobile view, it's very helpful if you're on the move. I don't like having to convert a pdf to a docx file, then make a copy to edit. This is an extremely irritating feature. Surely the original pdf could be opened as a docx file, if that's what users want? Just a simple question when a user is opening a pdf. "Would you like to open and edit your pdf √¨n docx format" would be good.

The only issues that i have with this is that a underline appears seemingly randomly every page or so. Though it isn't recognized as an underline, and when I highlight it, underline it, then get rid of the manual underline, the automatic underline is still there. When I erase it, and the entire sentence, and retype it, it is still in the exact location. No spelling or grammar correction needed, but for some reason it will not go away, other than that no issues

Very useful for reading PDF files on my phone, and any other related files. Don't use it for creating documents - prefer to use Word on our main desktop computer, or perhaps on my tablet with a Bluetooth keyboard (purely personal preference). Very easy to use. Started using to create a simple check list - not bad really. Always easy to use to read documents, both Word and PDF.

The icon to switch to the dictate keyboard is always in the way. It really makes an otherwise pretty good experience VERY annoying. I never use that icon. I want to be able to turn it off or even move it away from the exact place where the text I'm typing is showing up as I type it. I have no idea how any UI/UX professional could remotely have thought that would be a good place for that icon to be.

title: Microsoft Office: Word, Excel, PowerPoint & More
description:
Microsoft Office brings you Word, Excel, and PowerPoint all in one app. Take advantage of a seamless experience with Microsoft tools on the go with the Office app, the simple solution for productivity.

Scan PDF files, create spreadsheets, or draft up documents anytime and anywhere by accessing integrated Office features through your mobile device. Using Office can complete your workflows, no matter where you are, even if your network connection is temporarily interrupted. From Word documents, PowerPoint presentations or Excel files, the Office app provides you with one seamless experience.

With intelligent cloud services and trusted security, the Office app will help maximize your productivity in both work and life.

Office Features

Word, Excel, and PowerPoint Combined:
‚Ä¢ Widely used tools now accessible within a single application, the go-to app for productivity.
‚Ä¢ Store and access Word, Excel, and PowerPoint files using the cloud-based storage.
‚Ä¢ Word documents can be created and collaborated on with others in real-time.
‚Ä¢ Edit slides from PowerPoint or practice your presentation with Presenter Coach.
‚Ä¢ Worksheets on Excel can be created using one of the many templates available in-app.
‚Ä¢ Shared view makes it easy to access files shared with you directly or via Outlook and Teams.

PDF Scanning & Editing Capabilities:
‚Ä¢ Scan PDF files and convert them into Word documents and vice versa, instantaneously.
‚Ä¢ Edit PDF files on your device quickly and easily while on the go.
‚Ä¢ PDF Reader allows you to access and sign PDFs.

Transform Pictures and Documents:
‚Ä¢ Create docs by snapping a picture or uploading a photo from your camera roll.
‚Ä¢ Transform a photo of a table into a usable Excel spreadsheet to work with the data.
‚Ä¢ Enhance digital images of whiteboards and documents using the Office Lens features.

Unique Office Mobile Functions:
‚Ä¢ Quickly jot down thoughts and ideas, and then save or share them via Sticky Notes.
‚Ä¢ QR Scanner enables your device to scan QR codes and open attached links.
‚Ä¢ Documents and spreadsheets can be transferred between your phone and computer or shared instantly with nearby mobile devices.

Anyone can download the Office app for free and start using it right away. Access and save documents to the cloud by connecting with a Microsoft Account (for OneDrive or SharePoint) or by connecting to a third-party cloud storage provider. L Logging in with a personal Microsoft account or a work or school account connected to a Microsoft 365 subscription will unlock premium features within the app.

Achieve more while on the go with the help of Microsoft Office.

Requirements:
OS version: Last 4 major versions of Android running an ARM-based or Intel x86 processor
1 GB RAM or above

This app is provided by either Microsoft or a third-party app publisher and is subject to a separate privacy statement and terms and conditions. Data provided through the use of this store and this app may be accessible to Microsoft or the third-party app publisher, as applicable, and transferred to, stored and processed in the United States or any other country where Microsoft or the app publisher and their affiliates or service providers maintain facilities.

Please refer to Microsoft's EULA for Terms of Service for Office on Android. By installing the app, you agree to these terms and conditions: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=519111

‚Ä¢ Documents and spreadsheets can be transferred between your phone and computer or shared instantly with nearby mobile devices.

Anyone can download the Office app for free and start using it right away. L Logging in with a personal Microsoft account or a work or school account connected to a Microsoft 365 subscription will unlock premium features within the app.

Achieve more while on the go with the help of Microsoft Office.

Requirements:
OS version: Last 4 major versions of Android running an ARM-based or Intel x86 processor
1 GB RAM or above

This app is provided by either Microsoft or a third-party app publisher and is subject to a separate privacy statement and terms and conditions. Data provided through the use of this store and this app may be accessible to Microsoft or the third-party app publisher, as applicable, and transferred to, stored and processed in the United States or any other country where Microsoft or the app publisher and their affiliates or service providers maintain facilities.

recentChanges:
Thank you for using Office.

We regularly release updates to the app, which include great new features, as well as improvements for speed and reliability.
comments: The app was working very well in my earlier use but lately there have been many bugs. For instance, recently it automatically deleted all notes and PDFs, document files...I am a student so I have to keep up a lot stuff here. When 1 day during a assignment submission I opened the app, everything just disappeared! Just blank! If it wasn't for a backup on other app I would have failed 2 submit my assignment! It has been more than 2 wks & everyday I keep trying 2 get back my notes but nothing works!

Everything in the app is excellent except a few things: The app doesn't have dark mode. Please add a feature that allows us to invert Documents (.docx, .doc, .pdf, etc) that is Most Documents(.docx, .doc, .pdf, etc) have a white background with black text By inverting I mean to change "black to white" and "white to black" Only invert the text and background by default. Allow the user to choose which things they want to invert(text, background, images, charts, etc) Please. Finally thank you!

One app for documents, spreadsheets, presentations, PDFs, & more Microsoft Office brings you Word, Excel, and PowerPoint all in one app. Take advantage of a seamless experience with Microsoft tools on the go with the Office app, the simple solution for productivity. Scan PDF files, create spreadsheets, or draft up documents anytime and anywhere by accessing integrated Office features through your mobile device. Using Office can complete your workflows, no matter where you are, even if your net

Good, but expecting for more ease in editing XL and word documents, always opens in read-only mode, not so easy to edit, needs to save a copy before editing, which is not convenient. Instead of read-only mode on giving password should be able to edit immediately.

Could there be a better one? This all in one app with sleek user interface, cloud sync, and multiple accounts integration has solved all my work needs. I have now uninstalled individual office apps like Word, Lens, and PowerPoint. For anyone who cares about productivity and convenience, I recommend getting this app and saving it on your home page. (Ideally, you should have Microsoft 365 subscription too. I have it.) üëçüèΩ

title: HabitHub - Habit tracker & Goal tracker motivation
description:
‚ÄúMotivation is what gets you started. Habit is what keeps you going.‚Äù - Jim Ryun.

"The HabitHub" is a powerful app that can be used to track habits, accomplish your goals and finally rewire yourself.

‚Ä¢ Streaks
HabitHub is based on Seinfeld's productivity secret, which involves building long streaks of days. These streaks that you build will motivate you to keep moving forward.

‚Ä¢ Themes
HabitHub comes with four beautiful prebuilt themes.

‚Ä¢ Calendars
HabitHub comes with a full-featured calendar view for every habit to track and visualize your chains.

‚Ä¢ Reminders
Do you keep on forgetting that habit of yours? No worries !! HabitHub comes with a powerful reminder system that will help you stay on top of all your habits.

‚Ä¢ Ready for Smartwatches
HabitHub sends out the reminders directly to your smartwatch allowing you to mark the days directly from the watch.

‚Ä¢ Notes
Want to keep a journal? How about keeping track of your daily achievements !! With HabitHub you can add notes to any day you want and even read all the notes sorted by the last week, month or even year !!

‚Ä¢ Flexible goals
Do you want flexibility in your habits? Do you want to go jogging just on the weekends or hit the gym 4 times every week? HabitHub comes with a very sophisticated scheduling system that can track any habit you can imagine.

‚Ä¢ Category
HabitHub comes with the ability to categorize habits according to various aspects of your life to keep you sane and focused !!

‚Ä¢ Widgets
Track your habits and goals right from the home screen with SIX beautiful widgets for FREE !!

‚Ä¢ Graphs
Want to know how you have been doing with those goals/habits? See the big picture with the help of graphs. Gain insights into what's working for you and what's not working. Get a break down of all the successful and failed days by weeks, months or years.

‚Ä¢ Backup
Automatically backup your data to external storage providers.

‚Ä¢ Import
Already using other apps ? Import your tracking data from apps like habits streak with just a click.

How it works ? 
1. Setup your habit
2. Mark the days on calendar every time you perform the habit.
3. Soon you will build a chain.
4. Don't Break the chain !!


Your life is essentially the sum of your habits. What you repeatedly do is ultimately the person you become. Big goals are never reached by big leaps, but by many small steps. HabitHub help's you in taking these small steps and ultimately reaching these goals.

To help you reach these goals HabitHub lets you set daily reminders and even provides with graphs that help you stay motivated along your journey. On top of this every morning when you wake up, HabitHub sends you nice little motivational quote :)

With HabitHub your task is to build a long streak of days for the habit you are working. The longer your streak, the better it is !! It will take a couple of months to build a solid habit, but don't give up, stay at it !! Be consistent and it will work.

comments: Very good app for productivity. Allows you to track what you need to do in a day quite easily. Would definely recomend for routine building. But there are some things that could be improved. 1) Theres not much to track your daily progress. A percentage bar to tell you if you've done everything would be helpful. Adding to this, something to tell you if you've completed all habits in a category. 2) A hexadecimal system for choosing the colours on habits. So you don't have to eyeball custom colour.

Love it üôÇ! I tried out tons of habit apps but this was the best. The more affordable one-time fee was a big reason, but it also met all my needs and I like using it. Categories are a must. I haven't used the rewards part yet, but that is an extra many other apps don't have. I also love that it has dark mode, I can disable all notifications, and it doesn't make sounds.

I would give 4.5 Stars actually for such a Great, useful app. On a smaller aspect The reward section needs to be more consider. And it would be a real winner of you could have a more collaborative aspect. with the habits
Great app, pretty simple to use and some nice widgets for the home screen. Only four stars because the app doesn't sync everything across my phone and tablet on the fly. Otherwise really great.
Love it. It has the best widget's of any habit tracker. The app could be more beautiful, but that doesnt effect functionality. This is one of few apps I have paid for premium.

title: Pocket Points: Student Rewards
description:
Are you in college, broke, and addicted to your phone? Pocket Points incentivises you to put your phone away and stay focused with coupons at local merchants and big online brands. Get your school work done, pay attention in class, and be rewarded for it. 

Earn points! Use our timer to track how long you‚Äôre not using your phone. For every minute you‚Äôre not using your phone, you‚Äôll earn points. Get the most points you can and spend them on awesome student discounts. We‚Äôll help you put your focus on your studies so you can be more productive and feel more accomplished. 

Now take those points and shop on our marketplace of gifts and treat yourself to student coupons and discounts for food, apparel, accessories, and much more. Students get updates on new coupons. Never miss a good deal, because every penny counts. Students spend more money on food than anything else, so check out our food deals or suggest deals you want to see in your college town.

The leaderboards and achievements for students who stay focused the most create a competitive atmosphere in class. Are you staying focused more? Find out how you rank against other students at your school and students across the nation. Save money, stay focused with Pocket Points.

Features
> Timer: Stay focused and earn points
> Marketplace: Spend points on student coupons and rewards
> Leaderboard: See where you stack up on the leaderboard
> Achievements: Get achievements for hitting goals

Tweet us @PocketPoints or email us at team@pocketpoints.com for suggestions or support.

comments: App won't let me find local stores. My friend has an old version that lets him search stores, find local stores, and all of that. I can't find anything near me and even stores that he has won't show up in search. Terrible app. Every update makes it worse and breaks something

Update 5/20/21 -- Out of date deals. Not worth having. App is broken. Can't send feedback. Looked like a fool at the restaurant. ---- This app used to be great when it first came out! Now it is frustrating with less places accepting it and the app won't even open when I try to launch it after this latest update. :(

Does not work on Android. Iphone only. Opens but does not show nearby deals. Can't send feedback. Can't change to a new phone with same # and keep your account. This has been consistent on all android devices. Dont even offer it to android if it won't work!

Had an account back in the day, downloaded the app again. Put in all my details it says it can't create an account for me, I need to log in. There's literally no option to log in to an existing account. Do developers test their apps anymore or is it all just rolling beta?

I wish there was the ability to get points for those of us attending online classes. This app really helps me stay off my phone, but now that I am pursuing a degree from home, i feel it isn't as incentivising. Please add "off-campus" compatibility that works the same as on campus does!!!

title: Tap Counter
description:
Have you always wanted to count random things? This is the app for you. Tap anywhere on your phone screen and counter gets incremented. 

**Control your phone's brightness from the app to save the battery while counting.**

Great for chanting "Mantras"! and keep track of your mantra counts.
Great for keeping track of how many people come to your church, shop, or your business.
Really good for keep track for your sit ups and other exercises. 
This app is Ads free, no annoying advertisements!

Features:

* Increment and decrement counter value.
* Counter will be saved for the next time.
* Reset the counter to start over again.
* Lock the screen to pause the counter.
* Brightness settings available, you can decrease the phone brightness to save your phone's battery while counting. [Note: We are asking permission to change your Phone's brightness settings to save a battery]

comments: Very helpful app. I used this app to count survey form details. Only problem is some taps are not recognised by device (may be display issue) so please add a sound and vibration feedback features so that I can count without even looking at screen. Thank you.

Used this to count the 700 measures in the first movement of Tchaikovsky's Symphony No. 1 Mvmt 1 and it worked perfectly. Didn't need to keep track of a number or do math. Just tap, write, repeat. Fantastic.
A great app, does exactly what it claims to. I used it count how many runs of a farm until i got a drop (256 for those wondering, rng hates me) overall, a great app.

Simple app, does what it claims to do. I use this app to record the number of finished rows for craft projects. A tip for other users: LOCK your tap to make sure you dont accidentally double tap when waking up your screen. OR set display on all time to avoid double count/tap.
love this. small size app and battery friendly. useful app for Dhikr.

recentChanges: We have added manual recording feature. You can start recording by tapping on the floating widget or by double-clicking the volume up button during the call.
comments: Working good in samsung S20 ultra, but need more improved in increasing sound level and option to auto adding names of callers in listing, also ignore recording unansweredcalls ... thanks for developer.

Doesn't work on Moto G8. it records my side of the conversation only but it is terribly distorted and the other person is inaudible. I have not found any call recorder that works on this phone, even aps that worked on older phones don't on this one, not sure if that's the phone or android version. Still, what can I do but offer 1 star for effort. Devs, if you find a solution and update the app let me know and I'd be happy to try again. Meanwhile, uninstalling to try others instead.

This worked for 5 phone calls, then quit recording anything. The playback of the recordings don't produce any sound, so, I've become deaf, and don't know it, or the playback is in a sound frequency only dogs can hear. "Bark! Bark!", says my dog, Fido. Yep, that must be it. Updated 7-24-21: I re-download the app 10 days ago. The app records about 15 conversations, then stops. The app shows its recording, but there's no sound on playback. I've deleted the app, and will try again. Repeated.

I have noticed that after the recording it titles the recordings as private and I have to manually go in and select who the initial caller was. The user interface is pretty friendly and intuitive and I really don't have any complaints about this app. It works as is intended and I'd like to thank the developers for making this app. I was using another one from China which was suspect and I had a technical issue and they did not respond to my request for help so I found this one. I have Moto e.

At first I was very excited about this app and purchase the premium version. It worked and I entrusted it to record my most important calls. What a huge letdown. I show I have recordings from each of my phone calls, which was why I trusted it, but there is no audio when I play them back. Why? If the developers are reading this, get back to me and let's work this out.

title: All My Stuff - Home Inventory App
description:
All My Stuff App helps you with your home organization by taken care of the tedious labor of remembering all the details of your stuff.
This Home Inventory App with its intuitive and organized interface will guide you in the task of build a home inventory taken into account how things are kept in real life.
Here is how it works.
Create places where you can store your different elements, for example you can have your Home Place and aside your Office Place, even your Vacations Summer Home or any other place you need.
Once located in a place create rooms to localize your stuff the same way you do in real life, add your Living Room, Dormitory, Bathroom, Parking, even the dog¬¥s house or the cats box.
In Full Version Customize your categories as you wanted, name them add assosiate them with an icon that way it will be easy and recognizable.
Then start to add your stuff, app will requere a category, a room and a name for the curren Item although you can fill in the other details for a better experience, add a photo of your item could be very helpfull.
As your home inventory grows you may need to relocate your stuff in other rooms or places, then you can use the move button on each element to locate them in a very easy way, items that work as containers and have items asociated inside of them are moved all togheter with one click.
Use the search page to locate your stuff by name in just a couple of clicks.
Consider to get the full version to get access to unlimited resources and customizable categories.
Enjoy your experience.

recentChanges: edit bug fixed, add elements from container button added
comments: I think this is the coolest and most unique app idea ever. I personally room mate with ppl and I always had stuff coming up missing and couldn't remember what it was untill I seen it on them or in their stuff but this app lets me keep inventory of my stuff even tho tht sounds horrible lol but I think it's great. Best idea yet. Love the appp!!! I'm sooo ocd so it's perfect!!

Just downloaded. Seems very intuitive. So far super happy with the FULL Version! For me the free seems very limited, but it is free! Certainly no complaints. Picture function is gone. Help. Pictures still broken after months. Please restore picture function.

Paid version: - It does not make sense that you cannot create elements inside the items, which are containers. I had to create storage elements as "rooms", to have the items in them. (One should be able to place boxes in cupboards or presses and add items in the boxes if you want to have it properly.) - When trying to edit an element: You click on the one element that you want to edit and the app it jumps and edits only the very first element added in the app. You cannot change quantity or edit any details of any other element. The only positive thing compared to the other similar apps, that you can buy with a single payment, you do not have to subscribe and pay monthly or annually... what it worth Although I bought this app, I have just uninstalled it. Using an Excel file is simpler and more versatile than this app ;)
Easy to remember small claims and restraining orders not on the list .
not terribly intuitive, I was looking for a way to itemize our stuff for renters insurance.

title: Grammarly - Grammar Keyboard
description:
Edit and correct your grammar, spelling, punctuation, and more with your personal writing assistant, grammar checker, and editor.

The Grammarly Keyboard and proofreader allows you to write clearly, confidently, and mistake-free in all your apps. Advanced features such as the synonyms tool help you enhance your vocabulary, spell check words and improve your writing - from emails to social media posts.

Grammarly grammar checker and editor - how does it work?

1. Simply download the Grammarly app and enable Grammarly in your Keyboard settings.
2. You can adjust the look of your Keyboard for a customized experience‚Äîchoose light or dark, key borders, the number row, and more.
3. You‚Äôre now good to go! Simply start typing in any app. Grammarly will check each word, your grammar, spelling, and punctuation, suggest synonyms, and help you improve your communication skills.

Whether you‚Äôre typing emails on the go, editing an important LinkedIn post, sending a text message, or composing an essential tweet, the Grammarly writing assistant and grammar checker lets you spell check, correct, edit and perfect your message from your mobile device with confidence.

The Grammarly Keyboard also supports swipe typing, so you can compose quality writing without slowing down.

Edit, spell check and correct your writing in real time

‚Äì Grammar checker: Know your grammar is always mistake-free.
‚Äì Spelling checker and proofreader: Easily avoid common typos.
‚Äì Advanced punctuation correction: Take the guesswork out of punctuation.
‚Äì Synonyms and editor: See better word choices and select synonyms as you‚Äôre typing.

Writing assistant and proofreader: Improve your communication skills

‚Äì Receive short, clear explanations for every correction.
‚Äì Understand your mistakes and avoid them in the future.

Customizable for your needs

‚Äì Dialect settings (American, Canadian, British, and Australian English)
‚Äì Light and dark themes
‚Äì Personal dictionary: Easily add your own vocabulary to your dictionary

*** Uplevel Your Communication Skills With Premium ***

Take your writing and communication skills from good to great with our advanced features and suggestions.

Grammarly Premium helps you strike the right tone, gives you real-time feedback, and helps you broaden your vocabulary by suggesting impactful, vivid words to help your message, social media post, or email come to life.

Premium features include:

‚úì Vocabulary enhancement
‚úì Clarity improvements
‚úì Tone adjustments
‚úì Word choice
‚úì Formality level
‚úì Fluency

****************

We designed the Grammarly Keyboard to be a writing assistant that works anywhere you write‚Äîno copying or pasting required, no proofreader needed.

Grammarly always keeps your writing safe and private. See our User Trust Guidelines for details: https://www.grammarly.com/trust

By installing the Keyboard, you agree to Grammarly‚Äôs Terms and Conditions (www.grammarly.com/terms) and acknowledge that you have read Grammarly‚Äôs Privacy Policy (https://www.grammarly.com/privacy-policy). California residents, please see the California Privacy Notice (https://www.grammarly.com/privacy-policy#for-california-users).

‚Ä¢ Significant improvements in text processing quality.
comments: Great app, but, there are a two things that I would change or add to makes this application deserving of 5 stars. 1. This app has no adjustable "alternate key adjustment setting". I find that holding down a key to activate the alternate function of that key requires too long of a delay and breaks the cadence of my writing. This results in a loss of productivity and efficiency. 2. You can not use a long press on the spacebar to move the cursor. Instead a long press changes the input method.

Overall, okay. Its emoji support is really poor. It does fix your Grammar, but it doesn't learn when it ignores grammar rules like changing "I'll" to "I'll" or "i" to "I". I wanted to try the premium, but there was no free trial, and the one month trial was $30! I'll just go back to GBoard. Downloaded again, to give it try, and there's still no full emoji support. This can't be too difficult to support.

This is the best grammar and word correction app in the world! The only problem is the lack of a delete button. I can fix it ignore. My cursor will be at the right place until my keyboard pops up, then my cursor returns to the last place I typed instead. When I've written a lot, it's hard to find the word I need to delete. Please create simple delete button. I'll totally pay for it. Thanks guys, you're all awesome.

I have mixed feelings about this app which I have had for 2 years. It is extremely helpful with appropriate grammar and clarity. It also will suggest optional ways to rephrase your words. However, it does require a learning curve and does not conform to basic standard Microsoft functions such as cut and paste. I have lost important work in the effort to learn this app. I will probably continue to use it unless google or Microsoft develop something similar.

I noticed that the app takes quite the memory when being used for too long. As someone who makes stories and needs to use it continuously, I find it difficult to type when the keyboard starts lagging and I have to force stop it to prevent it from lagging so much. It also gives out the wrong results when it corrects a word and it even duplicates the word or characters it is trying to correct. It also doesn't detect errors in a sentence sometimes. I hope you can fix this.

title: Army MobileConnect
description:
Instant, secure logins to EAMS-A using your personal mobile device. 

Protect your Army EAMS-A account by adding second factor authentication with Army Mobile Connect. After logging in to EAMS-A as you normally would, MobileConnect will send a notification to your device, asking you to approve the login, or will generate a one-time passcode to use instead.

‚óèAdds security to username/password logins
‚óèPerfect for personnel without a CAC
‚óèWorks anywhere, with or without internet connectivity on your device

Soon, Army MobileConnect will provide access to systems and content that will not be available with username/password alone.

Note: This app requires a US Army EAMS-A account and registration for the MobileConnect service. Simple instructions are provided in the app.

comments: Did a simple test run on logging in via ACT and works flawlessly. Obviously with limited access using a login rather a CAC is annoying, but I can see this being used more often for NG/Reserve Units over Active Duty if they don't their cards with them(not sure why they wouldn't.) But it begs to question on "Why" it exist when the CAC is basically a second form, if not, a main reliable source of identification for your person. Its somewhat pointless in a sense. But hey, you do you buttercups.
Adds that extra layer of security for logins.
Very informativeinformation

title: Grocery King- Shopping Lists, Recipes & Meal Plans
description:
Grocery King is an app that helps you and your family to easily create Grocery shopping lists and instantly share them with each other for a truly coordinated shopping experience. Grocery King also includes a very sophisticated Recipe Organizer and Meal Planner with the ability to import recipes from hundreds of popular recipe websites.

Grocery King app is available for all your devices - Windows, Mac, iPad, Android Tablets, Android phones & Apple iPhone.

===========

FEATURES

===========


 LISTS 


‚úîÔ∏è 2000+ everyday grocery items neatly categorized & ready for you to use with built-in photos, just tap to add items to your lists

‚úîÔ∏è Search & Lookup grocery items using tags, categories, and types.

‚úîÔ∏è Easily create new shopping lists and add your favorites from the catalog. Your past grocery shopping items are fully saved making it easy to add those items back to your new list week after week.

‚úîÔ∏è Check off items from your lists and when you are ready to checkout, see exactly how much it will cost you for the purchase.

‚úîÔ∏è Attach and save your grocery receipts after every checkout for easy returns in the future.

‚úîÔ∏è (US Only) Use our brand new Shopping assistant feature to shop at more than 30 Major US retailers. Convert your existing lists to real cart items that you can either have them delivered or pick them up from curbside.

‚úîÔ∏è Smart list sorting automatically sorts your list items based off the same order in which you regularly shop at a retailer. The more you use the app the better the app gets at sorting the list. 

‚úîÔ∏è Attach item photos from your camera or search the web to look up billions of common items that match the name.

‚úîÔ∏è Scan item barcode to add/remove items from your list.

‚úîÔ∏è Advanced list customization and catalog grouping to create fully custom lists. 

‚úîÔ∏è Set list item notes, taxes, prices, coupons, and item priorities.

‚úîÔ∏è Sort your list items based on the order of the Aisles at your store.

‚úîÔ∏è Send your shopping list as an e-mail or Text(SMS) message.

‚úîÔ∏è Ability to see items from all your separate lists as one single list so as not to lose track of items.


 RECIPES & MEAL PLANS 


‚òÖ Import & download millions of recipes from the most popular recipe websites around. When your recipe is imported, you get access to all the ingredients, directions, and photos all neatly organized and grouped.

‚òÖ When you are ready to prepare a meal from a recipe, you can quickly add recipe ingredients to a shopping list that you created earlier.

‚òÖ Add your own recipes through an intuitive interface with photos, ingredients, and directions.

‚òÖ Search for recipes by name, ingredient or category.

‚òÖ Add a recipe to a weekly Meal Plan with one tap.

‚òÖ All recipes and meal plans are accessible offline.


 SHARING, SYNCING & APPLICATION BACKUP 

‚òÖ With Grocery King premium you can instantly sync and share your lists, Recipes and Meal Plans with your family. Any changes you make on one device is instantly available on any other device that is part of Grocery King online account.

‚òÖ All your lists, recipes and meal plans are securely backed up in the cloud as part of Grocery King account. When you get a new device, just sign-in with the Grocery King account to retrieve your data.


 CONTACT US 

support@groceryking.com

developerAddress: 77 Chariot Ct, Piscataway NJ 08502
recentChanges:
Exciting news! You can now save your reward/loyalty cards within Grocery King and use them at checkout with just a tap.
- Final price which includes taxes and coupons is now automatically calculated and displayed for each item in a list.
- Size, quantity, and prices are now represented in an easy-to-read format.
- Order of Shopping Lists can now be changed by Drag and drop.
- Order of Recipe Directions, Ingredients, List Categories, and Subcategories can also be rearranged by drag and drop.
comments: After 2 years of development, it's still half-baked. - You can have a max of 7 (seven) items in the shopping list, which is ridiculous. So basically you have to buy a subscription to use the app... - Where do checked out items go?? - Also, a big part is missing: the Stock section!! How do I know what I need? How do I manage my stock the way it is possible in the old version? - Price: the old version costs a one time $7.99 (but premium features don't work). This one is at best $44.88 per year!! That said, I am excited that it has a meal planning feature, and the possibility to sync across platforms! So, I'll check again in a few months if it has improved.
Hands down the best shopping list, thanks for bringing this back

I LOVE it! It makes a big difference having the cards IN the list and not having to back out and go to a different screen. THANK YOU! This new format and the new capabilities are GREAT! Additional note: GK has gotten super responsive to questions and feedback!

title: SecureW2 JoinNow
description:
You can securely access your organization's wireless network after easy configuration using the SecureW2 JoinNow app. JoinNow only needs to be run once, then you'll be able to connect to your organization's secure Wi-Fi network. 

How does it work? There are two steps that occur when you do the one-time setup:

The app will automatically download your organization's Wi-fi configuration settings and install them on your device.

Your device will connect to the network through a secure, encrypted connection.

From there on, you don't need to do anything beyond leaving JoinNow on your device. You'll be able to effortlessly connect to your network.

Please note:

Deleting the app (or deactivating it through an "app sleep" feature, as seen on Samsung devices) will remove the Wi-Fi configuration settings, interrupting your Wi-Fi connection. 

Google's Android device policy is the reason why you are required to set a screen PIN lock once your device is configured for connection to secure wireless networks. This is not a SecureW2 JoinNow policy. Your screen PIN lock must be enabled, otherwise you may experience issues with connectivity.
 
If you have any questions or issues with the app, be sure to check out our Android Common Issues page here: 

https://cloud.securew2.com/public/guides/android/

You may also read our Privacy policy here: https://cloud.securew2.com/public/general/privacy-policy.html


To learn more about SecureW2 and the services we offer, you can visit our site: https://www.securew2.com/

title: Google Calendar
description:
Get the official Google Calendar app, part of Google Workspace, for your Android phone and tablet to save time and make the most of every day.

‚Ä¢ Different ways to view your calendar - Quickly switch between month, week, and day view.
‚Ä¢ Events from Gmail - Flight, hotel, concert, restaurant reservations, and more are added to your calendar automatically.
‚Ä¢ Tasks - Create, manage, and view your tasks alongside your events in Calendar
‚Ä¢ All your calendars in one place - Google Calendar works with all calendars on your phone, including Exchange.

Google Calendar is part of Google Workspace. With Google Workspace, you and your team can:
‚Ä¢ Schedule meetings quickly by checking coworkers' availability or layering their calendars in a single view
‚Ä¢ See if meeting rooms or shared resources are free
‚Ä¢ Share calendars so people see full event details or just if you are free
‚Ä¢ Access from your laptop, tablet or phone
‚Ä¢ Publish calendars on the web

Learn more about Google Workspace: https://workspace.google.com/products/calendar/

comments: I have used this app for a long time and have told others to use it and how easy it is to use. Since the update it appears to be black background and I am not able to see the calendar as well as before. I also love color coding my events to know whos event it is and now I am unable to do this!!! Before the update I would have given five stars and now....please help!!

I have been using this app for years but now you suddenly can't colour code the different appointments as you save them. I used to have a different colour for grandchildren, one for the dogs, red for all doctors or dentists appointments and purple for all the birthdays. Now any that are set stay that colour but all new ones are blue. I can't see at a glance what I'm doing now. It's sooo disappointing. I'm going to have to look for a different one to help me remember everything.

Wish I could provide a higher score but I need to stop using Google Calendar. The calendar widget no longer displays in Light Theme while the system is in Night Mode. This despite the Calendar app itself displaying in Light Theme quite happily while the system is in Night Mode. The widget displaying like this has become unusable so I need to find a replacement app. Good times, Google Calendar. Good times. If only the widget respected the settings of the Calendar app itself, I'd be able to keep using you. Too bad because the app itself has been quite useful.

Used to be a great app but i have suddenly developed a prob with icon intermittently floating about in front of other apps. Tried restarting phone and uninstalling & redownloading the app but problem keeps recurring. Will be playing a game and the icon will suddenly appear on screen. Since I reinstalled I have this same problem with losing colours that others have had. Tried to use help and report to let Google know but the advice on how to do it just links back round on itself.

One important feature has been ignored and it should be included. For example, if you want to check the calender for 1975 or a specific date in 1975, you have to scroll through each month from present date till you get to 1975, and this is cumbersome. The user should be able to JUMP TO A DATE FORWARD OR BACKWARD without having to scroll through for a long time.

comments: Great start Idrive! Add these features and you'll have won me over. 1) make search real. Right now it's just a filtered for photos vs videos, not actually a search. 2) add image recognition + metadata recognition capability so we can start searching for people, places, things. 3) help us clear space on our phones by enabling local file deletion once backed up..... And that's it. Impressed for a first launch. Excited to see what's coming up.

Free unlimited storage for 10$/year is a great deal. I would like to see an option to select only certain folders or just videos or just pictures, not jut to Backup everything. Aside from that the app works shamelessly and has good upload speed. Not many options, but it is a backup tool.

Cant upload photos using desktop and cant upload selective folders. This is a downside for this plan being so cheap. Its a total steal deal if you only use your phone to upload photos. Also Please enable users to upload photos using desktop.
This is seriously some next level stuff. If I would've known that it has unlimited storage capacity at rates much lower than other apps, I would've used it sooner and saved so much money.
Hey guys, Idrive Photos is not automatically backing up new photos instantly. I presume it has got to do with the app not always running in the background. Any ideas?

title: Dropbox Passwords - Secure Password Manager
description:
Dropbox Passwords provides secure password storage and syncs your passwords with all your devices. It autofills usernames and passwords so you can instantly sign in to websites and apps‚Äîall while keeping your data secure. You can easily create and store unique, secure account passwords as you sign up on new apps and websites. 

Features:
‚Ä¢ Sign in to apps and websites with one click
‚Ä¢ Store passwords as you sign in to apps and websites
‚Ä¢ Access your passwords from anywhere with automatic syncing to all your devices

Never get locked out of your accounts again. This new password manager from Dropbox helps you sign in to your favorite e-commerce, streaming, and banking sites and apps quickly and securely.

Passwords secures your credentials with zero-knowledge encryption, so your passwords are only accessible to you and not Dropbox. This extra layer of password security safeguards your logins and helps keep hackers out. 

Dropbox is trusted by more than 14 million paid users‚Äîlet Passwords become your go-to Android password manager. Get peace of mind with the backing of a trusted leader in secure cloud solutions.

It stores my passwords and is usable. However, I can't connect my desktop version, so my passwords are out of sync indefinitely. I've tried contacting them through the app store, but no response, so here we are with a 2 star rating.

title: Password Manager SafeInCloud
description:
SafeInCloud Password Manager allows you to keep your logins, passwords, and other private info safe and secure in an encrypted database. You can synchronize your data with another phone, tablet, Mac or PC via your own cloud account.

All Pro features are free for two weeks, then you can unlock the full application functionality with a single in-app purchase. No subscriptions, no monthly fees!

KEY FEATURES
‚óÜ Easy to Use
‚óÜ Material Design
‚óÜ Black Theme
‚óÜ Strong Encryption (256-bit Advanced Encryption Standard)
‚óÜ Cloud Synchronization (Google Drive, Dropbox, OneDrive, NAS, ownCloud, WebDAV)
‚óÜ Login with Fingerprint, Face, Retina
‚óÜ Autofill in Apps (Android 8+)
‚óÜ Browser Integration
‚óÜ Android Wear App
‚óÜ Password Strength Analysis
‚óÜ Password Generator
‚óÜ Free Desktop App (Windows, Mac)
‚óÜ Automatic Data Import
‚óÜ Cross-Platform

EASY TO USE
Try it yourself and enjoy an easy-to-use yet powerful user interface.

MATERIAL DESIGN
SafeInCloud was completely redesigned to match new Material Design user interface language by Google. In addition to the standard Light theme SafeInCloud also has a Dark theme option to help you saving a significant amount of battery life.

STRONG ENCRYPTION
Your data is always encrypted on a device and in a cloud with a strong 256-bit Advanced Encryption Standard (AES). This algorithm is used by the U.S. Government for protection of a top secret information. AES is also widely adopted worldwide and became the de facto encryption standard.

CLOUD SYNCHRONIZATION
Your database is automatically synchronized with your own cloud account (Google Drive, Dropbox, OneDrive, Yandex Disk, NAS, ownCloud, WebDAV). Thus you can easily restore your entire database from a cloud to a new phone or computer (in case of a loss or an upgrade). Your phone, tablet and computer are also automatically synchronized between each other via a cloud.

LOGIN WITH FINGERPRINT
You can instantly unlock SafeInCloud with a fingerprint on devices with a fingerprint sensor. This feature is available on all Samsung devices. Devices from other manufacturers should have Android 6.0 or higher.

AUTOFILL IN APPS (Android 8+)
You can autofill login and password fields into any app on your phone directly from SafeInCloud. You don't need to copy and paste them manually.

ANDROID WEAR APP
You can put some selected cards on your wrist to easily access them on the run. These could be your credit card PINs, door and locker codes.

PASSWORD STRENGTH ANALYSIS
SafeInCloud analyses your password strengths and shows a strength indicator next to each password. The strength indicator displays an estimated crack time for a password. All cards with weak passwords are marked with a red sign.

PASSWORD GENERATOR
The password generator helps you generating random and secure passwords. There is also an option to generate memorable, but still strong passwords.

FREE DESKTOP APP
Download a free Desktop application for Windows or Mac OS from www.safe-in-cloud.com to be able access your database on your computer. The Desktop application also makes data entry and editing fast and easy using a hardware keyboard.

AUTOMATIC DATA IMPORT
The Desktop application can automatically import your data from another password manager. You don't need to manually reenter all your passwords.

CROSS PLATFORM
SafeInCloud is available on the following platforms: Mac (OS X), iOS (iPhone and iPad), Windows, and Android.
descriptionHTML:
SafeInCloud Password Manager allows you to keep your logins, passwords, and other private info safe and secure in an encrypted database. You can synchronize your data with another phone, tablet, Mac or PC via your own cloud account.

All Pro features are free for two weeks, then you can unlock the full application functionality with a single in-app purchase. No subscriptions, no monthly fees!

KEY FEATURES
‚óÜ Easy to Use
‚óÜ Material Design
‚óÜ Black Theme
‚óÜ Strong Encryption (256-bit Advanced Encryption Standard)
‚óÜ Cloud Synchronization (Google Drive, Dropbox, OneDrive, NAS, ownCloud, WebDAV)
‚óÜ Login with Fingerprint, Face, Retina
‚óÜ Autofill in Apps (Android 8+)
‚óÜ Browser Integration
‚óÜ Android Wear App
‚óÜ Password Strength Analysis
‚óÜ Password Generator
‚óÜ Free Desktop App (Windows, Mac)
‚óÜ Automatic Data Import
‚óÜ Cross-Platform

EASY TO USE
Try it yourself and enjoy an easy-to-use yet powerful user interface.

MATERIAL DESIGN
SafeInCloud was completely redesigned to match new Material Design user interface language by Google. In addition to the standard Light theme SafeInCloud also has a Dark theme option to help you saving a significant amount of battery life.

STRONG ENCRYPTION
Your data is always encrypted on a device and in a cloud with a strong 256-bit Advanced Encryption Standard (AES). This algorithm is used by the U.S. Government for protection of a top secret information. AES is also widely adopted worldwide and became the de facto encryption standard.

CLOUD SYNCHRONIZATION
Your database is automatically synchronized with your own cloud account (Google Drive, Dropbox, OneDrive, Yandex Disk, NAS, ownCloud, WebDAV). Thus you can easily restore your entire database from a cloud to a new phone or computer (in case of a loss or an upgrade). Your phone, tablet and computer are also automatically synchronized between each other via a cloud.

LOGIN WITH FINGERPRINT
You can instantly unlock SafeInCloud with a fingerprint on devices with a fingerprint sensor. This feature is available on all Samsung devices. Devices from other manufacturers should have Android 6.0 or higher.

AUTOFILL IN APPS (Android 8+)
You can autofill login and password fields into any app on your phone directly from SafeInCloud. You don't need to copy and paste them manually.

ANDROID WEAR APP
You can put some selected cards on your wrist to easily access them on the run. These could be your credit card PINs, door and locker codes.

PASSWORD STRENGTH ANALYSIS
SafeInCloud analyses your password strengths and shows a strength indicator next to each password. The strength indicator displays an estimated crack time for a password. All cards with weak passwords are marked with a red sign.

PASSWORD GENERATOR
The password generator helps you generating random and secure passwords. There is also an option to generate memorable, but still strong passwords.

FREE DESKTOP APP
Download a free Desktop application for Windows or Mac OS from www.safe-in-cloud.com to be able access your database on your computer. The Desktop application also makes data entry and editing fast and easy using a hardware keyboard.

AUTOMATIC DATA IMPORT
The Desktop application can automatically import your data from another password manager. You don't need to manually reenter all your passwords.

CROSS PLATFORM
SafeInCloud is available on the following platforms: Mac (OS X), iOS (iPhone and iPad), Windows, and Android.
summary: The best cross-platform Password Manager with cloud sync and free Desktop app.
developerAddress: 5th Voykovskiy Proezd 16, Moscow, Russia, 125171
recentChanges:
‚óÜ Sorting cards by name, date of creation, modification, size
‚óÜ Automatic backup (see Settings)
‚óÜ Search by label names
‚óÜ Check for compromised passwords using haveibeenpwned.com
‚óÜ Context menu command: Merge selected cards
‚óÜ New labels: Passwords, Credit Cards Notes, Images, Files
‚óÜ Improvements and bug fixes
If you have questions, suggestions or problems, please contact support@safe-in-cloud.com.
If you like SafeInCloud, please leave a nice review at the store.
comments: Supports autofill only in Chrome browser. In Android 7 it doesn't support autofill in applications and other webview based browsers. And there is no "add new" option in autofill window.

I have used this app for a while now. It is great as I can use on several devices (PC, android phone and Chromebook) and simply share the passwords in a simple and easy way. Works very well - really happy.

Needs to auto sync with cloud. I thought it was doing that until my phone needed to be reset to replace a faulty battery. After restoring my phone, I learned that a bunch of passwords were gone. Nowadays everything has auto back up, but I guess with this you have to remember to back up regularly. To top it all off, just tried to export CSV file using pixelbook and it says I need a desktop app to do that. This app was great at one point, but there are better options.

This app has vastly improved in Android. On Windows 10 the entry/edit window doesn't stay open long enough for me to add stuff, but I have no problem on Android. I need a password/data vault app that I can use on multiple platforms reliably, so I look forward to testing it out when I switch to iPhone & iPad. Have to use it on Mac, yet. Won't import passwords from any browser (though it advertises that it will), and I did follow the instructions. So, hand importing via copy & paste from Lockrz.

Really pleased with this app. Having tried another password manager that drove me to distraction trying to auto fill passwords it didn't know, I tentatively tried this app instead and have been pleasantly surprised. It is simple to use, creates passwords for you if you want (a feature I particularly wanted), and isn't invasive. Recommended!

title: Wondr Note - Pretty notes, lists, countdown & more
description:
Wondr Note is a creative & unique take on notes & lists. We asked ourselves, "Why can't notes be pretty & useful?". And so we created Wondr Note in the hopes of providing ultimate convenience, productivity & visual appeal. 

From poems to shopping lists to travel expenses to errands checklist. Plan/add errands and todo lists to your day. Countdown to a big event or build an inspiration board for your next project. Keep your notes, lists, mood boards & accounts here. Easily categorize and search through titles and items. Add items to your agendas & customize the app with themes. We try our best to keep it simple, clean & pretty.


‚ñåSTUFF YOU COULD DO ON WONDR NOTE

‚úì¬†Make a shopping list for tomorrow
‚úì¬†Add widgets of your important lists, agendas or countdowns

comments: I have used Color Note since 2017 and this is so much better. It's cuter and a lot more functional, and you can add tags to keep up with everything, kind of like hashtags. You can add pictures, agendas, lists, and even keep track of finances, as well as a lot of customization features at your disposal. I had it crash on me but support was responsive, however I recommend to people to back up often just in case it crashes. The customer service is awesome, and I will recommend this app to my folks!

I honestly don't usually write reviews but the latest update was so good that I have to sing it's praises. The slicker UI makes navigating the app, which already was good, a breeze. The new agenda features which let me plan ahead, as well as the UI making it a pleasure to use, has made me switch to using this as my main ToDo list. Fantastic! I applaud the team behind such a wonderful app. Keep up the good work!

it could be a really great app, but honestly extremely lacking in features. the premium version really wasnt worth it, even if its only $3. it lacks basic features, cant even implement bullet points. would love to see where it goes in the future but for now this is all i can give it üíú

title: HP Print Service Plugin
description:
The HP Print Service Plugin is the only print driver that you'll need to easily print documents, emails and pictures from print-supported applications to a variety of HP Printers, including HP OfficeJet, HP LaserJet, HP DesignJet, HP Photosmart, HP DeskJet and HP Envy.

You can discover and print to HP printers that are:
‚Ä¢ Connected to the same network as your mobile device
‚Ä¢ Broadcasting a Wi-Fi Direct network
‚Ä¢ Connected to the mobile device via a USB On-the-Go cable

Just select Print or Share to PSP when you need to print. Just tap the menu button to reveal the print option. Location of menu button may vary depending on your model of Android‚Ñ¢ device. 

The HP Print Service Plugin simplifies printing on your Android‚Ñ¢ Lollipop‚Ñ¢ (v5.0) and newer devices. If you use Android 6 (Marshmallow) or earlier, you might need to enable the HP Print Service Plugin in your device's settings

For more information on using the HP Print Service Plugin or details on supported HP Printers, go to:
https://support.hp.com/us-en/document/c04024231/?openCLC=true

For more information on Mobile Printing in general, go to:
https://www.hp.com/go/mobileprinting

comments: Works perfect for my Envy 7858 Still works perfect in 2021. It's fast, user friendly, and if ever I do have a problem connecting to the printer/wifi/wifi direct, it fixes itself quickly or I am able to manually fix it quickly with the app. I know a lot of this comes from the app having been around for so long and devs being able to work out all of the kinks over the years, but it shows that they really put in the effort to making it work properly. I do wish I could set B&W to default though.

This app after updating acts as though I have never used it and wants me to start from scratch. It says my printer is unavailable. I'm giving it 1 star now. I had to download another HP app to print so I'm guessing that this app no longer works at all. Below was my last rating with 5 stars. Prints great from all of my devices. I couldn't be happier.

This is not good. Constantly need to reinstall the app each time I want to print, which is crackers. Once reinstalled it works okay, but the interface is not clear, many settings are hard to find (such as duplexing/two-sided printing options) and reconnecting to a network is convoluted; on two ocassions, it has meant yet another uninstall and reinstall process, then adding the printer as a new printer again. Why?

I love everything about it! Easy and user friendly even if not experienced with printing and copying. Lots of online help when needed. I love the convenience of having cartridges delivered to my home always knowing I have enough. Love the option they give to send back free empty cartridges to reduce waste. I have been using this service for about a year now and I just don't know why I didn't know about it earlier! Thank you HP for making printing and scanning so easy and affordable!

2* Slow and frustrating. Very slow to connect and load. If I didn't need this to do my job, I wouldn't even give it a second try. This was my old review. 2021 and this is now such a delight to have. It is instant and works every time. We sail southern California full time and evey time we need to print documents or our cruising friends need to print documents, this little printer comes to the party. We recomend this to all our friends. The cheapest printer at wall mart and it works like a charm.

title: GigSpot
description:
What is GigSpot?

GigSpot connects you with mystery shopping and market research companies. GigSpot is the place where these companies compete for your service, offering you tens of thousands of job opportunities. You decide which jobs you want, where, and when.


Get Paid to Shop and Eat? Really?

Yes, each listed job is a paying opportunity. Payment is handled by the mystery shopping or market research company posting the job. GigSpot lists the information you need to take or apply for the opportunity, including:

* Compensation and Reimbursement
* Start and End Date
* Distance


Already a Mystery Shopper? You should sign up with GigSpot!

* One simple signup gives you access to thousands of mystery shopping jobs from dozens of mystery shopping provider companies
* Manage one profile across all companies
* Easily get more jobs than ever
* Receive push notifications for new jobs - fewer emails!
* Complete certifications directly on your mobile device

title: Nighthawk Setup App
description:
Setup Netgear router app is a guide to setup different routers and extenders.  User can go to routerlogin.net and follow the instructions there as well. This app contains a graphical representation of setup any router or extender.

Few Guidelines to setup router or extender:
1.	Make sure your device is plugged in
2.	 Connect Ethernet cable between router and modem.
3.	Restart your modem as well
4.	Connect an Ethernet cable to computer as well.
5.	Now it's ready to set up.

comments: I got my new nighthawk router and hooked it up. Tried to connected through this app and every time I tried it stops at 73 percent. An error code pops up and tells you to call tech support. I call and get suspicious immediately when I heard the guy with a bad connection and microphone. He walked through the steps and he finally gets to the error code screen and told me I had a virus in my internet connection and said he could fix it for $420. I told him I would call him back. This is a scam app.

This App is a deception to separate you from your money. When running the app, it never completes the setup of netgear products, and tells you to call support They inform you your computer has issues and needs repair at a cost They claim to repair and will handle your product install They make small talk asking your age and occupation, thought that was odd When they completed, I ran the install app and got the same error to call support Contacted netgear directly Scam Filed with Attorney General

Don't touch it! It is a scam! They will request you to download apps that allow them to diagnose the connection problem which you will have so that they can look at everything on your phone and then tell you you have compromised cyberidentity which will cost you a minimum $150 up to $250 to fix. I only hope there will be no further compromise of my phone having removed these apps.

I made a mistake downloading this app instead of netgear app. I tried to install my new router, it gave me an error, so I called the number. The rep walked me through the steps, but I had to share my laptop screen with him. It was my biggest mistake. He said my network not protected and tried to sell me the PROTECTION for my devices. I refused but he already got access to my network. It's a scam.

This app is FAKE! It is NOT the legitimate NIGHTHAWK App! It said that it couldn't connect to my brand new router, and directed me to call a support number. They told me that my network was infected, and it could only be fixed by paying them $500.00 to install an app to clean up my network! DO! NOT! INSTALL! THIS!!!!!

title: Line2 - Second Phone Number
description:
Line2 is your complete business phone system for your Android device. Give your customers a professional call experience no matter where you are and keep your personal and business lines separate.

Multiple phone numbers: Add multiple virtual business phone numbers to your device and receive or make calls from anywhere.

Local and toll-free numbers: Go local with your business with localized numbers or give your customers toll-free numbers to call. You can also port your existing phone number to Line2.

Unlimited call and text: Get unlimited Voice over IP calls and texting across the United States and Canada. Also, get free calls and messaging between other Line2 users. 

Auto-attendant: Guide your customers to right call queues like sales and support using the auto-attendant feature, along with on-hold music and pre-recorded call greetings. 

No cellular data needed: Make and receive calls or texts using VoIP technology. No need for expensive cellular plans or hardware. 

Call features: Screen and block unwanted calls with call screening and call blocking. 

Designed for mobile business professionals, freelancers, and entrepreneurs, Line2 lets you keep your business and personal communications separate and eliminates the need to purchase and carry a second mobile phone.

More powerful features:

‚Ä¢ Use your Line2 number across your smartphone, computers, and tablets.
‚Ä¢ Share media with MMS and group messages with anyone in the U.S. and Canada.
‚Ä¢ Quick and easy setup with no additional hardware required.

Questions or comments? We‚Äôre here to help, 7 days a week at http://help.line2.com or tap Settings -> Help from within the app.

Note: Your cellular provider may prohibit or restrict VoIP (Voice over Internet Protocol) on their network. It‚Äôs your responsibility to check with your cellular provider about their VoIP functionality, and any additional charges it may incur.

comments: I would give customer service a ZERO star raring if possible... This whole nightmare started after a customer service rep suggested to add a local number to my existing 888 number to send and receive MMS messages, as I was suddenly unable to send images via desktop app. I have successfully used this service for EIGHT years with no issues. Suddenly I have been without phone service for my small business for two weeks and customer service is absolutely clueless in regards to a solution.
Since update won't open. Crashes constantly

This app keeps crashing and saying not connected to internet when I am. I am trying to make a time sensitive call and this is something i should not experience especially when it is not a free service. I too do not receive incoming calls. Yet i am notified immediately after that a call was missed. I have uninstalled and reinstalled several different occasions. Enough is enough as I typically NEVER write a review. So fix this our lose your customers. I will be first in line.

It works but there is an annoying bug. Every time after a phone call, it tends to mess with my music/video audio. For example, after the phone call, all of the audio plays from my phone speaker that is only used for phone calls. Same with my car audio, it thinks I am in a phone call. The only way to fix it is by closing the app from my multi-task viewer. Hope you can fix it soon because it is annoying.

Terrible!! Awful!! Horrendous! Don't get this app!! It has many, many flaws! 1. Doesn't ring on your phone. You will only get a notification after the caller has hung up. 2. You can't hear when people speak. 3. When you call back sounds like you're calling back from the middle of nowhere. 4. No tech support whatsoever. 5. Waste of money!

FEATURES

* Text translate

* Camera translator: capture, select and translate 
* Object translation
* Photo translate: direct image translation
* PDF Scanner for the image to text, image to pdf, and text to pdf
* Baby translator
* Pet translator
* Voice-to-voice conversations: Speak and translate via voice typing all language
* Speech to text or text to speech translation with accurate voice recognition
* Auto language detection
* Offline translation to use without internet

Photo scanner provides the best features such as perspective correction, smart page detection, and various enhancements of high-quality scans.


Baby Language Translator

The baby translator identifies baby cries automatically, filtering out all other sounds. When the baby translator detects a cry, it analyzes it in a matter of seconds. The cry is translated, and the result is displayed on the phone screen.

Pet Translator

This animal translator uses machine learning to decode your cat or dog language. It then translates them into the human language.

The pet translator of this app translates all the woofs, meows, neighs, oinks, and more sounds you have wanted to understand for a long time.


You don‚Äôt actually need to be multilingual when using this handy translation app that can help you read, speak and understand the local language wherever you travel.

If you come across an unknown phrase in another app, a website, or a message, you can copy and paste it into the Leo Translator.

Leo Translate: Voice Translator app helps break down language barriers and even can translate offline when you don‚Äôt have internet access.

Want a bigger vocabulary? Try Leo Translate: Voice Translator App that will grow your vocabulary in a minute or two a day. This app makes learning new words painless or even fun.


Leo Translate: Voice Translator is a popular, simple, efficient, and free translator app to make the communication process much more enjoyable. Feel free to download it on your phone right now to discover its opportunities.

comments: One of the few apps that scan on the go! Had a lot of trouble with those that need pictures taken cos of a bug, but this app makes scanning seamless and fast. I love how shadows eg of my phone are immediately removed too, unlike some of the other apps where the shadow stays. Worth the price imo.

When you first use the app it all works fine, but after the trial and when you purchase the subscription it stops working. Absolutely appalling app with no way to contact anyone to try and get it fixed. Changed to adobe scan and no problems at all.
This app is outstanding. It's a mobile office. I confidently engage in all document activity when it occurs.

I love this app and the yearly subscription is totally worth it. I have a critique: you should be able to share/email multiple files at once, that would greatly improve my productivity with this app! Love the app thanks for making it.

I will give it one star because of one important and annoying issue. I have tried twice and you people declined my subscription. I want to use the app fully but because of failure to subscribe I can only scan. Infact it only photocopies because I see all documents coming in black and white.

title: Digital Secure
description:
Digital Secure is a one-stop suite of privacy and security tools for your mobile devices and computers. Protect your devices from online threats, connect to public Wi-Fi with a secure VPN, take control with always-on dark web monitoring, and get guidance on online security from security experts. 

Peace of mind. 24/7.

Here‚Äôs what you‚Äôll get with Digital Secure.

Free security and privacy tools, plus advanced protection for as low as $5 per month. 

1. Security and Privacy (Free)
Protect your device from online threats. Get warnings when connecting to unprotected networks, visiting risky websites or attempting dangerous downloads.

2. Safe Wi-Fi (Paid)
Protect your personal data and online activities on public Wi-Fi networks with a secure VPN connection. So you can connect to any Wi-Fi with confidence. 

3. Identity Theft Protection (Paid)
Take control with always-on dark web monitoring, social media monitoring, and lost wallet guidance. Get theft and breach alerts, and guidance from recovery specialists if essential items such as credit cards and IDs are lost.

4. Security Advisor (Paid)
Get one-click access to security experts. Security Advisors are just a chat away to help answer questions or provide guidance on online security. You can also get tips and solutions on how to take your online security even further with articles, guides and videos from Security Center.

It's your online world. Keep it that way with Digital Secure.

Get your first month on us*.

For a detailed list of features, visit: https://www.verizon.com/digital-secure

*First month free for new customers. Thereafter, you will be billed $5 per month per line or $10 per month per account unless you cancel before promo period ends. Cancel anytime in My Verizon.

comments: Navigating logically back & forth among featured selections:it seems to attempt to anticipate your need only leading to forcing you to start over,wasting time or/and blowing an opportunity window to get something beneficial done conveniently.

Worst ever, crashes daily, lets unidentified networks on! I don't recommend! Every time I send to support they shut it it off for me to turn on again!!! I have gone to support site for help, thats what they are telling everyone to do and I get not help. They tell me I don't see you have digital secure, well then what am I paying $10 a month for called digital secure? Oh yes there it is, you do. I have security issues so this needs to be fixed. I thought Verizon was best I am starting to wonder.

Unable to experience full features of digital secure. This is due to being unable to allow permission needed to phone. For some reasons phone has denied itself access to digital secure app. I've screenshot the problem. I've reset the app, cleared the cache, unistalled and re-installed and updated the app all with no success.

Edit: I have emailed them on multiple occasions and have received no answer. I'm experiencing almost the same thing every other customer is experiencing I open it up and it says it's setting things up. I have a notification but when I open the notifications up there's nothing there. Been on the phone with customer service multiple times. I've tried to clear the cache and the data but the data will not clear.

Only Partially Functioning. Unable to set up "Identity Theft Protection" or "Protect Other Devices" because it gives me an error every time. No description explaining the error so I know what went wrong, just a code. Security report says "5 Threats Found So Far", but provides no information detailing what the threats were or whether or not they've been resolved. Lastly, this app is driven by McAfee¬Æ, a company founded by a criminal. John McAfee himself denounced McAfee¬Æ as bloatware.

title: Dropbox: Cloud Storage & Drive, Doc & Photo Backup
description:
Dropbox lets anyone upload and transfer files to the cloud, and share them with anyone. Back up and sync docs, photos, videos, and other files to cloud storage and access them from any device, no matter where you are. And with advanced sharing features, it‚Äôs easy to share docs and send files‚Äîlarge or small‚Äîto family, friends, and co-workers.

Features:
‚Ä¢ Automatically upload videos and photos from your camera roll to cloud photo storage‚Äîall in the background‚Äîfor easy video sharing and photo sharing. 
‚Ä¢ Access any file in your account‚Äîeven offline‚Äîand preview over 175 different file types with no special software required.
‚Ä¢ Easily send large files by copying and pasting a link you can give to anyone, even if they don‚Äôt have a Dropbox account. 
‚Ä¢ Scan documents, receipts, IDs, photos, and more using your mobile device and transform them into high-quality PDFs, so you can view and send anywhere.
‚Ä¢ Sync folders on your PC or Mac to Dropbox with computer backup, and recover older versions or restore deleted files with version history and file recovery. 

Sign up now for your free Dropbox Plus trial. You‚Äôll get 2 TB (2,000 GB) of storage space‚Äîthat‚Äôs enough room to save files from all your linked devices. We‚Äôve also introduced some new features as part of your Plus plan: Dropbox Passwords to store and sync passwords across all your devices and Dropbox Vault to secure and organize your most sensitive documents. And with Dropbox Rewind, you can roll back any file, folder, or your entire account, up to 30 days.

Existing Plus customers can upgrade to Dropbox Professional. With 3 TB (3,000GB), you can store all your stuff‚Äîfrom work projects to personal photos‚Äîand have space to spare. You and your clients can comment on most file types without leaving Dropbox. And you can protect your work with a watermark, add shared link controls, or rewind your account up to 180 days.

Before completing payment, you‚Äôll see the plan price. This amount will be charged to your Google Play account and will vary by plan and country. Dropbox subscriptions purchased in app renew monthly or yearly, depending on your plan. To avoid auto-renewal, turn it off in at least 24 hours before your subscription renews. You can turn off auto-renewal anytime from your Google Play account settings.

Dropbox is a secure cloud solutions leader trusted by Fortune 500 companies for their most sensitive data. Over 14 million paid users choose Dropbox because they know they can count on a company that‚Äôs also dedicated to their security and privacy‚Äîno matter what they do or where they are. Let Dropbox be your all-in-one file storage, file organizer, file transfer, and file sharing solution for all your devices‚Äîfrom Android to iPhone and Mac to PC.

We‚Äôd love to hear from you! Join the Dropbox community: https://www.dropboxforum.com
Terms of Service: https://www.dropbox.com/terms
Privacy Policy: https://www.dropbox.com/privacy
