comments: Everyday I find something irksome with this app. The Dropbox service is great, but this app is full of problems. It takes years to upload things - if they upload at all, spontaneous "storage full or unavailable" errors when trying to download, syncing issues, issues moving files, issues renaming files, issues exporting files. It never ends. You're better off just going to the website and working with your files there.

Simply the best cloud storage app in the world and I thank you sincerely for all your amazing work. It is simple, fast, convenient, good looking, functional, adaptive, and works very well. üåü I love to use Dropbox and the use of it helped me many times not only to backup what I wanted, but also to upload files from Dropbox into where I wanted, and that helped me many times. However, I want to have a choice for a small paid plan such as maybe 10GB to 20GB for a personal use.

Can't get real help. In the past I was able, when first accessing a document, to 'pre-view' an entire document before clicking on it to edit it. Recently, the 'pre-view' page is very slow to load and when it does load only a small portion of the document appears before it either goes back to the file page or the app stops.

I'm extremely unimpressed by Dropbox. It begins by desiring access to things it shouldn't need, with no way of letting you deny it if you need the app. Then it gives you a small amount of space for free, too small for the one thing I needed to download. WORST OF ALL: I can't even see how to delete my account. It only let's me log out. I'd give it a lower rating if I was allowed.

Really disappointed with dropbox. i have used the app on my phone for years, unfortunately my phone was lost was lost whilst being abroad. i am desperately trying to log into Dropbox on my laptop to get access to my files, this includes travel documents to enable me to travel home. i have logged a ticket for support and tried to contact the dropbox team on twitter also-getting nowhere and need help urgently!

title: ShowingTime
description:
ShowingTime provides residential real estate agents, offices, associations and MLSs with tools to manage showings and feedback, plus analytics and reporting tools to gain valuable market insights. A market and technology leader in real estate, ShowingTime products - accessible via its mobile app - are used in more than 250 MLSs across North America representing more than 750,000 members, helping them schedule 3 million showings per month.

Benefits for real estate professionals:
-Schedule showings and view instructions on the go
-Access important details any time with the new offline mode
-Set font sizes in the app to match your viewing preferences on mobile devices
-Search for listings available to show near your location
-Share listing activity with your clients
-Manage feedback for your listings; give feedback on your recent showings
-Notify sellers when you have completed the showing
-Sync appointment activity with your personal calendar

comments: In the last 3 months this app has continuously froze up upon the login process. I've reinstall the app and replaced phones with no success. This has become a massive concern as it' a major tool in our region to show houses. I expect it to be replaced if things don't get addressed. I'm questioning if it's primarily an Android issue (Note 20). The company that acquired showingtime shows little respect for Android on it's major platform, letting video tours only work for its IOS users

App is absolutely terrible. It worked up until about a month ago. Now it just sits frozen after It logs me in. Can't leave any feedback from it. I'm going to get rid of it again off my phone and not re-install. I'll just schedule showings a different way.

It seems like ever since the update the app stopped working. It just stays stuck in the blue screen. Tried reinstalling and reaching out to technical support and they said it's system wide but my business partner can use his. If it's system wide why wasn't an email or notification sent out to all accounts? The issue has still not been resolved and I still can not book showings for all of my clients.

The latest update now has a Location Option. So every time I open the app I have to skip Location, because I do not need or want the location "tracking". It would be nice if there was an option in our settings to not use the Location feature. Is there a way that we can permanently opt out of this instead of having to go through this every time we open the app?

Doesn't work anymore. When I login it just turns blue and nothing happens. It's completely useless! I had to do the system update on my phone a week or so ago. Not sure if that's causing the issue but this is the only app that's not working. I've tried uninstalling and reinstalling.

comments: I tried this app for functionality because it was the closest to ES File Explorer since they took down the app. Tried it, became a paid subscriber in two days. Very convenient UI. I had an issue with file transfer to cloud but the developers corrected it quickly. I would highly recommend RS File : File Manager & Explorer to anyone looking for the convenience of a desktop folder manager.

Amazing app. Best for file exploring. I have enocountered a small bug however. The app cannot handle 1tb or higher. When I plug my 1tb flash drive in it says 999.97 gb but when I anyalize the size rolls over to the negative integer limit. Otherwise, perfect app 10/10

17.99 per year subscription for this clone File Explorer. I cannot stand piece of garbage developers who think they can add subscriptions to apps like they are Netflix or something. You my friend are a piece of garbage developer if you could even be called that. CX file explorer is the exact same thing without the subscriptions
Constantly trying to assert itself as default browser for URLs even when I keep saying always use Chrome. I haven't used the app in ages. Time to uninstall.

Want to get 5 stars? I use this app daily and the free version works for me for what I do, please fix the update so it stops crashing. New downloads today on the play store crash every 10 seconds (Multiple devices,. emulator setting)

title: Arabic Voice typing keyboard- Speech to text app
description:
Arabic voice typing keyboard allows you to type messages through voice typing. In Arabic voice Keyboard you only have to speak In Arabic and it will convert the voice text in to Arabic text. Now no need to use typing keyboard any more, just use this audio to text converter and write text through voice typing keyboard. Arabic speak to text keyboard will make your life much easier you just have to dictate your text and it will convert it automatically. Arabic voice typing keyboard is highly optimized speech to text app that uses voice recognition technology to detect your voice and provide your voice in text form for text, messages or any other social app. Arabic audio to text converter app is the easiest voice typing keyboard to write Arabic text through voice.

Arabic voice typing keyboard is simple application with user friendly interface. Using speech to text online you can send long texts to your friends with easy text copy option. In Arabic voice typing keyboard the text will appear after you stop speaking and it will take a while to convert your text but once it gets the regularity then it will convert the text instantly. Just talk and get text in return just like a magic. Using Arabic voice typing keyboard, you can share your text file with all the supported application on your phone. You can copy the text and send as a message/text form to your contacts.

Using Speech to Text online, you can share your text with all the supported messaging application on your phone.

title: ICA UAE Smart
description:
This application allows locals, residents, and visitors of the United Arab Emirates to benefit from the services of the Federal Authority for Identity and Citizenship like visas, residencies, payment of fines, printing the family book, renewal of passport for the citizens and many other services.
Summary of the services:
Apply for a residence entry permit for your family members. Apply for new residence for your family members. Renew residence permits for your family members Apply for cancelling resident for any sponsored under your sponsorship Apply for a visit visa for your relatives You can generate the travel status report and the list of people you sponsor . Check your residence and entry permit status Request a new or renew your UAE passport Print the family book for locals Extend your on arrival visa Pay fines of visas and residencies.

One of the most useful and resourceful app of UAE. However on arrival request few things as below are not working 1.gender 2. passport type 3. Mobile number country code dropdown menu is not working. I guess few backend work needs to be done. Wish you best of luck in helping UAE citizen and residents.

Very critical option isn't working register arrival is mandatory required on airport however option is not working showing empty drop down for gender nationality passport type and so on this needs to be fixed ASAP without this cant travel Amazed that how could such critical thing is uploaded without testing

‚Ä¢ Manage your fax contact lists

comments: Fantastic app for both smartphones and on the web and great service. Started using this from back in 2013. Though there was a gap in between of my usage, then again started using again and I love their service.

How is it a "FREE TRIAL" if you're putting a HOLD on someone's credit card IMMEDIATELY? It's meant to mislead people. You sign up, they have your personal info to sale. They'll take the funds they claim they're holding. Legitimate companies that aren't running a scam don't put a hold on your card during the free trial. It's boarder line false advertising. They don't take the funds immediately, but you don't have access to those funds either because they're "holding" them. DON'T FALL FOR IT!

Absolutely stay away from this company. Free trial is a scam. They won't let you cancel until you pay them a fee. It's a joke. You can not get a real person to speak to, they hide behind the layers of internet. I never once logged onto their system, never used a single function, and canceled 3 days after sign up for free trial. They won't let me cancel until I pay an erroneous $29 for nothing. They keep trying to charge my cc every other day. I have had to cancel my cc and report to fcc, ftc. Bb
Amazing App and Service. A++
This is the Best Faxing app out their! Been using it for several years and had No Problem at all! It's simply and affordably does what it says it does.

title: S‚Äômore - Earn Cash Rewards
description:
PLEASE NOTE: THIS APP IS FOR THE USE OF CUSTOMERS IN THE UNITED STATES ONLY

S'more is a lockscreen rewards app that allows you to earn points in exchange for us placing ads and content on your lockscreen. Every day we'll give you points in exchange for having the S'more lockscreen installed, and regardless of how many times you see it, you'll have points added to your account. Just use your phone normally, and get paid. Want to earn even more? You can also complete offers, play games and use the refer a friend feature to get more points. Once you've earned points you'll be able to redeem them for gift cards from retailers including Amazon, Walmart, Target, CVS, GameStop, Starbucks and more.¬†Last step? Spend that lockscreen cash!




Here's how it Works:


Earn Points
‚Ä¢We'll show you relevant content and ads on your lockscreen.
‚Ä¢To dismiss the ad and access your phone, simply swipe up. To learn more, tap the ad.
‚Ä¢You earn points every day regardless of the number of ads you see or click on.
‚Ä¢Redeem your points for gift cards from retailers, then spend that lockscreen cash!


Bonus Offers
‚Ä¢Offers include free trials, app downloads and videos.
‚Ä¢Complete offers in order to earn points.


Refer and Earn
‚Ä¢Use the refer a friend feature to get additional points by sharing a referral link and code.
‚Ä¢When your friends and family sign up, they receive an additional point bonus.
‚Ä¢After they‚Äôve used S'more for 10 days and are eligible to redeem their own points, you'll receive a 25 point bonus!
‚Ä¢You can refer as many friends and family members as you like.


We're working hard to be the easiest lockscreen rewards program. We'll give you points every single day that you have our app installed. That's it, no catch. As long as you use S'more, you¬†WILL¬†get points that you can redeem for gift cards.¬†


To earn points, you DO NOT need to learn more about every ad or try to see as many ads as you can. Continue to use your lockscreen the way you normally do. You won't earn more for viewing as many ads as you can. Our sponsors and advertisers like it this way and we hope that you do too.


The App thay Pays You
To sum it all up, S'more is a way to get paid for something you're already doing: unlocking your phone. We reward you for allowing us to show you relevant content and ads on your lockscreen, making S'more the easiest way to make money using your phone. So if you're looking for a way to get free cash, look no further.




FAQs
Will this app drain my battery?
Nope, we've optimized the app so that it will use the least amount of battery possible.
How do I get paid?
When you redeem, we'll send you an email with a redemption code for your gift card. No waiting for the mail.
When will I be able to redeem points for gift cards?
For your first redemption, you'll need to wait 10 days after installing, but after that you'll be able to redeem anytime you have enough points for a reward.
What Gift Cards are Available?
Gift Cards are available for Amazon.com, AMC Theaters, Applebee‚Äôs, Best Buy, CVS, Domino's Pizza, GameStop, Starbucks, Target and more!.


Emoji icons provided free by EmojiOne

Every day we'll give you points in exchange for having the S'more lockscreen installed, and regardless of how many times you see it, you'll have points added to your account. Just use your phone normally, and get paid. Want to earn even more? You can also complete offers, play games and use the refer a friend feature to get more points. Once you've earned points you'll be able to redeem them for gift cards from retailers including Amazon, Walmart, Target, CVS, GameStop, Starbucks and more.¬†Last step? Spend that lockscreen cash!




Here's how it Works:


Earn Points
‚Ä¢We'll show you relevant content and ads on your lockscreen.
‚Ä¢To dismiss the ad and access your phone, simply swipe up. To learn more, tap the ad.
‚Ä¢You earn points every day regardless of the number of ads you see or click on.
‚Ä¢Redeem your points for gift cards from retailers, then spend that lockscreen cash!


Bonus Offers
‚Ä¢Offers include free trials, app downloads and videos.
‚Ä¢Complete offers in order to earn points.


Refer and Earn
‚Ä¢Use the refer a friend feature to get additional points by sharing a referral link and code.
‚Ä¢When your friends and family sign up, they receive an additional point bonus.
‚Ä¢After they‚Äôve used S'more for 10 days and are eligible to redeem their own points, you'll receive a 25 point bonus!
‚Ä¢You can refer as many friends and family members as you like.


We're working hard to be the easiest lockscreen rewards program. We'll give you points every single day that you have our app installed. That's it, no catch. As long as you use S'more, you¬†WILL¬†get points that you can redeem for gift cards.¬†


To earn points, you DO NOT need to learn more about every ad or try to see as many ads as you can. Continue to use your lockscreen the way you normally do. You won't earn more for viewing as many ads as you can. Our sponsors and advertisers like it this way and we hope that you do too.


The App thay Pays You
To sum it all up, S'more is a way to get paid for something you're already doing: unlocking your phone. We reward you for allowing us to show you relevant content and ads on your lockscreen, making S'more the easiest way to make money using your phone. So if you're looking for a way to get free cash, look no further.




FAQs
Will this app drain my battery?
Nope, we've optimized the app so that it will use the least amount of battery possible.
How do I get paid?
When you redeem, we'll send you an email with a redemption code for your gift card. No waiting for the mail.
When will I be able to redeem points for gift cards?
For your first redemption, you'll need to wait 10 days after installing, but after that you'll be able to redeem anytime you have enough points for a reward.
What Gift Cards are Available?
Gift Cards are available for Amazon.com, AMC Theaters, Applebee‚Äôs, Best Buy, CVS, Domino's Pizza, GameStop, Starbucks, Target and more!.


Emoji icons provided free by EmojiOne
summary: Get paid every day to put ads & content on your lock screen. That's it, no catch

title: Easy Voice Recorder
description:
Easy Voice Recorder is your everyday companion to record important moments. Capture meetings, personal notes, classes, songs, and much more, without time limits!

For students

Record classes and lectures with clear quality, even when the teacher is not right in front of you. Listen to these recordings as many times as you want to help you study for that next exam. 

With no time limits and the option to choose a compressed format, it's easy to record the longest classes and lectures.

For business

Capture interviews and meetings from your phone, tablet, or smart watch, then share them with your colleagues through email or your favourite messaging app. Take advantage of powerful widgets and shortcuts to start a new recording right from the home screen.

For musicians and for everyone

With many options to fine-tune the recording, the app is great for rehearsals and for capturing melodies that pop into your head. Try new ideas fast, hear the results and make adjustments on a new take.

Quickly switch between voice notes, meetings & lectures, and music & raw sound with easy to use settings and presets.

Here is what you get:

‚òÖ Record to high-quality PCM and MP4, or use AMR to save space.
‚òÖ Quickly start a new recording with widgets and shortcuts, and record in the background.
‚òÖ Share recordings easily through email or your favourite app, or set one of them as a ringtone.
‚òÖ Android Wear support - record from your smartwatch.
‚òÖ Light and dark themes, and many other cool features.

Want more?

The Pro version also includes the following features (available on supported devices):

- Upload new recordings automatically to your Google Drive or Dropbox.
- Record to MP3 and AAC, in addition to all the formats available in the free version.
- Record using a Bluetooth microphone.
- Trim recordings and remove unwanted sections with Edit mode.
- Manage and organize your recordings with folders, and save recordings to your SD card.
- Control the recorder from anywhere using the notifications bar, or through our Tasker and Locale plugins.
- Bonus features: record in stereo, import files, skip silence, volume boost, custom bitrates, and more.

Easy Voice Recorder is exactly what the name says: an easy to use audio recorder and sound recorder. Reliable, fast and flexible, it adapts to your needs.

Need help?

Please note that Easy Voice Recorder is not a call recorder and can‚Äôt record phone calls on most phones. If there are any problems, please contact us at support@digipom.com. We are always happy to assist you.

Terms of Use

Terms of Use: http://www.digipom.com/end-user-license-agreement-for-applications/
Privacy Policy: http://www.digipom.com/privacy-policy-for-applications/

Permission details

Photos/Media/Files - Save recordings to your external storage.
Microphone - Record audio from your microphone.

comments: This is one of the absolute best apps I have ever downloaded. Whenever I have a thought or want to record something for posterity this does the trick. Sound quality is exceptional. The process to record and save is so simple and it keeps a record of each recording by date. Is easy to retrieve each recording and listen back to it along with the option of saving again or deleting. It's so nice to have an app that is effective and simple but so valuable. 10 stars.

Great app! Nearly everything about this app is perfect. Not taking anything away, its just that I have not yet learned all. Even the page that pops up and asks for a rating is very pleasant which willingly carried me here.. This should be the app that comes with android. Nice work!

I'm a journalist, and this is the only recording app thus far that doesn't spontaneously delete my recordings. Saves audio automatically, and tells you how much recordable time you have left, which is a huge plus especially when I have a long event. Plus, it's free and ads don't play as soon as you stop recording. Love this app, I've recommended it to everyone I work with. Great job.

I've recently picked up my guitar, again, after a stroke a few years ago. I'm struggling (well, it feels like a struggle to me...) to find my singing voice again. Recording as I practice lets me see/hear that it's going better than I thought! The app is easy to use, which is important. Lets me concentrate on what I'm doing, rather than on figuring out how to opperate and record. Really glad I blundered into it!

I haven't listened to all of my possible legal recordings yet, but I have tested things prior, and everything seemed good. Free and very handy when in sticky situations. 1+ months in using this app, so far so good. A minor few glitches when recording, but phone notification dings when there's an issue, not a big deal as long as you hear the notification and restart the recording. Easy to backup with phone cable to computer (just copy/cut and paste)! 12:55am July 25, 2021.

title: Google Sheets
description:
Create, edit, and collaborate on spreadsheets from your Android phone or tablet with the Google Sheets app. With Sheets, you can:

- Create new spreadsheets or edit existing files
- Share spreadsheets and collaborate in the same spreadsheet at the same time.
- Work anywhere, anytime - even offline
- Add and respond to comments
- Format cells, enter or sort data, view charts, insert formulas, use find/replace, and more
- Never worry about losing your work ‚Äì everything is saved automatically as you type
- Quickly get insights, insert charts, and apply formatting with smart suggestions
- Open, edit, and save Excel files.

Google Sheets is part of Google Workspace: where teams of any size can chat, create, and collaborate.

Google Workspace subscribers have access to additional Google Sheets features, including:
- Easily add collaborators to projects, see changes as they occur, receive notifications for edits that happen while you‚Äôre away, and chat with colleagues in the same spreadsheet. All changes are automatically saved as you make them. And with offline access, you can create, view, and edit files wherever and whenever
- Get insights fast, powered by Google AI
- Work seamlessly across Sheets and Excel
- Maintain control with enterprise-grade security
- Analyze data from other business-critical tools
- Build custom solutions

Learn more about Google Workspace: https://workspace.google.com/products/sheets/

Follow us for more:
Twitter: https://twitter.com/googleworkspace
Linkedin: https://www.linkedin.com/showcase/googleworkspace
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/googleworkspace/

Permissions Notice
Contacts: This is used to give suggestions of people to add to files and share with.
Storage: This is used to save and open files on USB or SD storage.

comments: It has many problems: 1. Sheet get closed itself when i am working on it . 2. Sheets which is owned by me sometimes i am not able to work on it , its shows you dont have acess in sheet even though i am owner 3. When i am typing in a particular cell and then mooves my cursor to some other place the content i have written gets disappered itself even dont come back on clicking undo option . 4. Its hangs a lot

Trash. You can't even edit text in a cell without having to use the "formula" bar... Which when using the app is ridiculous, you can't barely read what your entering or edit what's in the cell. Trying to insert a paragraph is non existent... It's 2021, there's no excuse.

If our permissions are changed, we can't see the sheet anymore. For ex: I was the editor of a sheet, and some days later I changed my access level to view only. Now It doesn't show any changes made after I was made a viewer. Keeps saying "your permissions have changed - Reload" . Even after reloading, it shows the same message

I like this app, I use mostly to update sheets that I already made at my computer. But these days I'm unable to use because it keeps crashing and closing, I came to playstore hoping for any updates. Plese fix that

Whenever a sheet with dynamic values is opened, it shows cached values and takes two minutes to load the real-time values. I've setup Google script APIs to update values every minute but it doesn't update until I open my sheet and wait for a minute.

title: Gov2Go
description:
Your Personal Assistant for Government

Gov2Go is the easiest way to keep up with your government to-do list ‚Äî property taxes, car tags, voting, and more. It‚Äôs a smart app that reminds you what's due and helps you take care of it. Never miss a deadline again!

Your Guide to Government
With Gov2Go, you don‚Äôt have to know which agency handles property assessments or vehicle registration. No more navigating government to get things done. All you need to do is share a little about yourself. We‚Äôll handle the rest.
 
Personalized to You
Gov2Go learns about you and then carefully curates government information and services based on what you share. It knows your government deadlines, tracks them for you and tells you when it‚Äôs time to do something.
 
Secure & Private
Your data is secure. We will never sell it or share it with anyone. Information you provide is used only in the ways you allow. You‚Äôre in complete control of what you share and what conveniences you get in return. You can add or remove information at any time.
 
A Name You Can Trust
Gov2Go is offered by NIC, Inc., the people behind eGovernment. Over 3,500 government agencies (and counting) trust NIC with their payment processing and online services.

I believe this is why there's problems for some people getting there money. 2 weeks in a row.

Moreover, I called the customer service for thousands of times but it always says that the representative is busy. Sort and filter by brewery, beer name, beer style, special tapping times, real ales, and more.

Take notes and share your ratings and notes.

Continuously updated for the most complete and accurate information on Fest day.

title: OneSoil Scouting: Farming Tool
description:
Know what's on your fields, keep an eye on plant health, mark problem areas, and harvest on time.

OneSoil Scouting is a free agriculture app for farmers, crop consultants, and agronomists that assists with farming operations and lets you conduct farm monitoring via satellite.
 
üìà Get vegetation data updates

OneSoil Scouting calculates the vegetation index (NDVI) of a plant using satellite imagery. The field will be divided into colored zones (brown-yellow-green) based on the NDVI value. This helps detect problem areas.
The NDVI updates every 3-5 days if the weather is cloudless. Switch on notifications in app settings to stay on top of updates.

 üó∫ Automatic field boundary detection

OneSoil Scouting automatically detects your field boundary using satellite images from Sentinel-2. All you need to do is select your fields by tapping them on the map.

‚úç Add field notes

You can either choose a pre-selected issue type (e.g., crop diseases, pests, water, weeds, plant lodging) or create a blank note. Customize your note by adding a note color, writing a comment, or adding a photo. The note will be pinned on your field map.
This app just made agronomy easier. The pins can be added remotely from the office or when you're scouting fields. In this case, the satellite can determine your exact geolocation.

üí™ Work offline

No Internet connection? No problem! You can still check the last 6 months of NDVI values for your fields, add notes, and edit field info (add new crops, specify their growth stages and seeding dates, and more).

‚õÖ Weather forecast

Check the weather forecast for your field and see our spraying time recommendations. 

üå± Add crop growth stages

Add a growth stage for your crops to plan fieldwork more thoroughly. The current phenophase can be added in the field card.

üîóShare fields and notes

Share your fields and agro notes with your colleagues. They will be able to see the note content and/or vegetation index, but won't be able to make any edits.  

  ***

üèÜThe UN-supported WSA Global Congress 2020 ranks our platform as the Best Product in the Environment & Green Energy category.

descriptionHTML:
Know what's on your fields, keep an eye on plant health, mark problem areas, and harvest on time.

OneSoil Scouting is a free agriculture app for farmers, crop consultants, and agronomists that assists with farming operations and lets you conduct farm monitoring via satellite.

üìà Get vegetation data updates

OneSoil Scouting calculates the vegetation index (NDVI) of a plant using satellite imagery. The field will be divided into colored zones (brown-yellow-green) based on the NDVI value. This helps detect problem areas.
The NDVI updates every 3-5 days if the weather is cloudless. Switch on notifications in app settings to stay on top of updates.

üó∫ Automatic field boundary detection

OneSoil Scouting automatically detects your field boundary using satellite images from Sentinel-2. All you need to do is select your fields by tapping them on the map.

‚úç Add field notes

You can either choose a pre-selected issue type (e.g., crop diseases, pests, water, weeds, plant lodging) or create a blank note. Customize your note by adding a note color, writing a comment, or adding a photo. The note will be pinned on your field map.
This app just made agronomy easier. The pins can be added remotely from the office or when you're scouting fields. In this case, the satellite can determine your exact geolocation.

üí™ Work offline

No Internet connection? No problem! You can still check the last 6 months of NDVI values for your fields, add notes, and edit field info (add new crops, specify their growth stages and seeding dates, and more).

‚õÖ Weather forecast

Check the weather forecast for your field and see our spraying time recommendations.

üå± Add crop growth stages

Add a growth stage for your crops to plan fieldwork more thoroughly. The current phenophase can be added in the field card.

üîóShare fields and notes

Share your fields and agro notes with your colleagues. They will be able to see the note content and/or vegetation index, but won't be able to make any edits.

***

üèÜThe UN-supported WSA Global Congress 2020 ranks our platform as the Best Product in the Environment & Green Energy category.

OneSoil is a member of the Global Alliance for Climate-Smart Agriculture hosted by the Food and Agriculture Organization of the United Nations (FAO).
***

About OneSoil:

We also offer a web app with the following farming tools:

  • Fertilizers: Calculate variable rates to apply nitrogen or phosphorus and potassium fertilizers and then create a task for agricultural machinery equipped with onboard computers.

  • Sowing rate: Calculate variable sowing rates and create a task for agricultural machinery equipped with onboard computers.

  • Weather: See the five-day forecast and growing degree-days and accumulated precipitation charts.

  • Field Data: Visualize the results of your fieldwork that your onboard computer uploads as files.



‚ùì If you have any questions, please contact us at care@onesoil.ai or in the online chat (Look for the blue icon in your profile tab).

comments: Easy to use and useful application for crop monitoring

Love this app! Helps you with any issues with drought or too much watering. Satellite feeds. To give you accurate info for managing crops & balancing fertilizer placement. Weeding and feeding There is a lot more features than this. If your having issues with growing issues that need to be solved this app is a definite help. Best times to spray herbicides. Wind issues & weather.

this app is God sent...let's you record all farming activity and view all available NDVI images of the chosen field. not only that, it also lets you see the NDVI image of all available dates. I can track the progress of my crop by viewing all the images and highlight areas that are of low productivity. I hope you guys also add in other filters like EVI. That would be really great. thank you.

Amazing app, however after latest updates (probably since offline functionality was added) the interface is extremely slow and laggy and by that I mean it takes a lot of time from clicking on a field to when the app displays the field's ndvi image. I have an 8 core cpu and 6 gb ram so phone hw is not a problem. Kindly ask you to address this issue. Later review: I can confirm that as 27/01/2021, the app works smooth and I therefore can give 5 stars. Many thanks to the team, amazing work.

This is a great app. I can monitor vegetation dynamics and weather at my fields from any location without necessarily visiting them. It allows to now precipitation, wind speed, dew point, temperature, predicts growth stages. Extremely useful. I highly recommend it.

title: Reminders: to do list, daily planner with calendar
description:
Reminders is your personal planner. From a grocery list to a project planner Reminders can help keep you on track and increase your productivity! 

With Reminders app in your pocket, you can create to do lists effortlessly. Take notes, add alerts/alarms, priorities and flag the most important items. With the build in filters and calendar view you can see what is most important and get things done (GTD).

Reminders is easy to get started with its clean, intuitive design. It can be customised to your needs from a simple grocery list to complex filters. It's in your hands.

title: Twee Creator

Want to show a poll, add a real poll to the posts.

Don't want to type the same username repeatedly. Save users in the user list and use them later everywhere with ease. Verify a user or make it private, it's up to you.

Save a post to edit it later, or save it as an image for sharing on your favorite social networks.

-------------------------------------------------------------
Key Features

  • Light, Dim and Dark themes.

  • User Profiles

  • Different emoji styles

  • Polls

  • Quote

  • Saving posts

  • Add Images

  • Add Videos



Any suggestions are most welcome, for any suggestions or feedback write us at thesoonya@gmail.com

title: Volley - Video Messaging
description:
Volley is a video messaging app that professionals use to spontaneously connect and collaborate. Instead of coordinating schedules, just say what you need to say and move on with your day.

Unlike Slack, Volley lets you talk with co-workers using asynchronous video. 
Unlike Zoom, Volley doesn‚Äôt require you to coordinate schedules.
Unlike Loom, your volley (video) lives in a threaded conversation with context.

How does it work?  In Volley, we take turns just like any other conversation, except we record our turn with video (a volley) in a threaded conversation.  This gives us the best of both worlds‚Äìthe richness of talking with the flexibility of texting. 

And the best part?  It‚Äôs free!


COLLABORATION UNLEASHED
Spontaneously sync-up and unblock team members instead of coordinating schedules.

MEET LESS
‚ÄúVolley has easily replaced 4-5 hours of meetings for us.‚Äù

ACCOMPLISH MORE
‚ÄúWith Volley, I did two days worth of work yesterday and ended feeling energized‚Äù

EXPAND YOUR NETWORK
Connect with clients and professionals outside of your company.

KEEP IN TOUCH
Catch up on-demand.  Ain‚Äôt nobody got time for synchronous.  

MOVE WORK FORWARD FASTER
You can talk 7-8x faster than you type and you can listen 2-3x faster than that!

DEEPEN CONNECTION
‚ÄúI feel like I‚Äôm getting to know my team on a whole new level.‚Äù

MAKE WORK FUN AGAIN
‚ÄúVolley brings back the fun and spontaneity that we once had as a team, but lost when going remote‚Äù

BE MORE INCLUSIVE
‚ÄúSome of my team members don‚Äôt feel comfortable on the spot.  Asynchronous allows their personality to come out.‚Äù

GAIN TOTAL RECALL
Volleys are automatically recorded and stick around for 60 days so you can refer back to them. 

Use Volley for:
-When Slack is underkill
-When Zoom is overkill
-Daily Standup
-Networking
-Getting unblocked
-Staying connected
-Brainstorming
-Face-to-face intros
-Onboarding
-Asynchronous clubhouse
-Any scheduled meeting or call that doesn‚Äôt need to be

Volley is wrong for you if:
-You wish you had more appointments on your calendar.
-You like being out of touch with your team.
-You believe the future of work looks just like the past.

The next time you feel the urge to schedule a meeting, send a volley instead.

If you run into snags, hit us up at support@volleyapp.com

title: Microsoft To Do: List, Task & Reminder
description:
Microsoft To Do is a task management app to help you stay organized and manage your day-to-day. You can use Microsoft To Do to make shopping lists or task lists, take notes, record collections, plan an event, or set reminders to increase your productivity and focus on what matters to you. Microsoft To Do makes it easy to stay organized and manage your life.

Accomplish what's meaningful and important to you each day with My Day and Suggestions, your personalized daily planner tools. Intelligent suggestions recommend tasks from across your lists that may be relevant for the day. From grocery lists to housecleaning routines, daily tasks are simple with To Do. When you're quickly switching between contexts and tasks, it's important to have tools that help you achieve what matters. Microsoft To Do helps you quickly capture and retrieve your lists and tasks across devices and between multiple accounts.

Capture tasks from different Microsoft apps and services and sync them with Microsoft To Do. Flag emails as tasks in Outlook or any email account hosted by Microsoft, add to lists with Cortana, and see tasks assigned to you from Microsoft Planner. Get peace of mind knowing that your tasks and lists are hosted on the Microsoft 365 service ‚Äì one of the most reliable services with industry-leading security offerings.

Microsoft To Do‚Äôs modern, easy-to-use experience makes your lists unique, with customizable features like emoji in lists, colorful themes, dark mode, and more. Plus, shared lists help you stay connected and collaborate with family, friends, and colleagues.
 
Microsoft To Do features:

Daily planner
‚Ä¢ A daily planner personalized with suggested tasks: My Day
‚Ä¢ To do lists are accessible anywhere, on any device
‚Ä¢ Share lists and assign tasks with your friends, family, colleagues, and classmates
‚Ä¢ Task management features break your tasks into manageable steps
‚Ä¢ Take notes to add to any task
‚Ä¢ Group lists together by topic or project

Task manager
‚Ä¢ Add reminders, tasks and lists with the To Do widget
‚Ä¢ Daily organizer personalized with bold and colorful backgrounds
‚Ä¢ Reminders with one-time or recurring due dates
‚Ä¢ Make task lists and switch between school, work, and personal lists 
‚Ä¢ Attach up to 25 MB of files to any task

To Do lists for any purpose
‚Ä¢ Bill planner
‚Ä¢ Shopping list
‚Ä¢ Reminders
‚Ä¢ Task management
‚Ä¢ Take notes
‚Ä¢ And more

Office 365 integration
‚Ä¢ Sync reminders and task lists between Outlook and To Do
‚Ä¢ Lists and tasks are hosted with the security of Microsoft 365
‚Ä¢ Task lists are compiled from the apps and services across Microsoft 365
‚Ä¢ Add multiple Microsoft accounts 

Microsoft To Do helps you organize and simplify your plans, whether it's for work, school, or home.

To Do is free and available across the web and iOS, Mac, Android, and Windows devices.
 
Learn more: https://to-do.microsoft.com
Follow us on Twitter: @MicrosoftToDo
Need support? https://microsoft-todo.helpshift.com
By installing Microsoft To Do, you agree to the Microsoft Terms of Use: https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=842575

summary: Increase productivity! Make a daily to do list, create a reminder & share notes!
developerAddress: One Microsoft Way
recentChanges: In this release we have renamed the Assigned Tasks smart list to make it more personalized. We have also done some bug fixes to improve accessibility, list view and list sharing experiences.
comments: Pros: complete a repeat task & a copy of that task is created at the time interval specified; easy-to-use widget; sort by date or priority; different color themes; & ability to share lists by email or text (recipient doesn't need a Microsoft account). Cons: time interval for months & years do not allow for day-of-the-week repeat (for the date, not the first Saturday). Easy work-around is to repeat by week (52 weeks for a year).
I love this app. It has helped me to organize my life. I wish I could color code tasks or have a task list on my home screen. But other than that I love it.
I am liking the flexibility to use on both laptops and mobile but the mobile app has less feature available than the laptops. Lost a star. Also there is no calendar view. This is big.

I love this app, so far. I use it for my shopping lists, to do lists, scheduling, and other organizational needs. I am pleased that I can sync with my email, other devices, and calendar. I would love to be able to give it a full five üåü, but I can't. There's no way to delete a list that's been copied to another heading without deleting that list as well. List also sync up, apparently. Also, once a list is deleted, there's no way to bring it back; it's gone forever. Otherwise, great app!

It is a great step forward. Microsoft has a lot of assets within the office setting and this is just solidifying their position as king. The app could use some improvements: - 'open in outlook option for email chains. Could be awesome, but it opens via the web browser. I could maybe accept this on the app for a little longer, but on the desktop version this should open the email chain via outlook (if you have it) directly. - a refresh button

title: Scan to PDF - Free PDF Scanner APP, No Ads
description:
DocScan, a smart scanner app that turns your device into a portable PDF scanner, can easily convert paper documents and images to PDF/JPG in just one single tap.

Download DocScan and enjoy ALL FEATURES FOR FREE!

Amazing Features:
1.Convert All Kinds of Documents to PDFs
Easily scan & convert all kinds of documents to PDF format in a simple tap - receipts, invoices, notes, documents, photos, business cards, certificates, whiteboards, etc. The scan results can be printed out instantly via Cloud Print.

2.Easily Share Scanned Files
Conveniently share scanned files in PDF or JPEG formats with friends via Email, or post them on social media. Save and view the scanned files anytime, anywhere.

3.Professional Quality Scan Results
Its precise border detecting, smart cropping, and auto enhancing features ensure the PDF outputs clear, sharp, and high-resolution. Multiple filter options are also provided to further optimize the scan results - photo, document, clear, color, black & white.

4.Extract Texts from Images Accurately
The integrated OCR (optical character recognition) technology can precisely recognize and extract texts from papers and images. After extraction, you can edit, copy, search, and share the texts for free.

5.Add E-Signatures
DocScan allows you to add electronic signatures to the scan results. Easily sign your PDFs before sending and printing them!

6.Add Security Watermarks
You can add security watermarks to protect your files. Mark scanned files with customized watermarks at any time!

7.Search Files Quickly
Thanks to its quick search feature, you can quickly find your target files among multiple category folders by entering keywords; its OCR search feature can help you find texts inside notes and images in the shortest time.

8.Easy and Useful File Management Tools
Supports creating subfolders to help you categorize messy documents. Its amazing searching, sorting, and adding notes features can help you quickly find the document you want.

9.Convenient Documents Editing
Add or delete one page or the entire document; adjust the layout of documents; set page sizes of your PDF (Letter, Legal, A4, and more), all are supported!

Coming Soon: 
‚ñ∫Add Annotations
The advanced editing feature allows you to add annotations to the scan results. Conveniently review and mark the scanned documents!

‚ñ∫Protect Important Documents
You can set passwords to protect your confidential documents. Also, encrypting the files to be shared can effectively prevent others from peeking at it.

‚ñ∫Backup and Sync
Worried about losing important files when changing devices? DocScan helps you backup and sync scanned documents to Google Drive, Dropbox, Evernote, OneDrive, etc. Just log in to your account on any device, you can manage these documents conveniently. Store, sync and collaborate across smartphones, tablets, and computers.

DocScan can be used almost in any case:
*Receipt, Invoice, Contract, Tax Roll,  Business Card...
*PPT, Whiteboard, Note, Book, Curriculum Vitae...
*Passport, ID Card, Driver License, Certificate...
*QR Code, Memo, Letter, Map...
*Travel Brochure, Paint, Work Plan, Manuscript...

title: MyTales: Diary, Gratitude Journal & Daily Planner
description:
Become a real-life novelist and craft your day planner diary to shape your life the way you want! Reflect on yourself and think deeper about things with prompted journal titles that you never knew you needed to think about.

Journaling and therapy have more in common than you think. In the haste of our daily life, we sometimes forget to take care of our mental health.
Take a few minutes and journal your thoughts everyday. Journaling is thinking aloud. Journals help you connect to your values, emotions, and goals. Reduce stress & anxiety.

MyTales is a well-optimized gratitude journal and goal planner app that gives you room for your daily thoughts and saving milestones or for the future. As you write your journal, your autobiography will be created. You can customize your profile and set reminders to keep everything organized and reflect on yourself daily. You can save your memories along with dates, descriptions, and pictures, write a diary daily, and get the best insights into your memories.

‚ÄúA man holds his fate in his hand‚Äù is a genuine piece of saying. Now, it‚Äôs time to implement this rule in your life. Write your thoughts and diary daily and set milestones to pave your way to your destination. Reflect on your day daily and celebrate every little joy. MyTales will help you to explore your emotions, turn off your anxiety, and empower you to achieve more and execute your daily plans.
Do you want to save your valuable memories? üìë
Have you ever written a diary about your life? üìñ
Do you want to break your big goals into smaller daily milestones and take action by achieving them one by one?

Journaling and therapy have more in common than you think. In the haste of our daily life, we sometimes forget to take care of our mental health.
Take a few minutes and journal your thoughts everyday. Journaling is thinking aloud. Journals help you connect to your values, emotions, and goals. Reduce stress & anxiety.

title: Pomodoro
description:
*****Instructions for using the application*****
    - The notification will be send to our phone when a Pomodoro or Break is complete, even Silent mode.

*****There are six steps in the original technique*****
  1. Decide on the task to be done.
  2. Set the Pomodoro timer (traditionally to 25 minutes).
  3. Work on the task.
  4. End work when the timer rings and put a checkmark on a piece of paper.
  5. If you have fewer than four checkmarks, take a short break (3‚Äì5 minutes) and then return to step 2; otherwise continue to step 6.
  6. After four Pomodoros, take a longer break (15‚Äì30 minutes), reset your checkmark count to zero, then go to step 1.

Application developed by Linh Okita and co.

summary: Pomodoro Technique is a time management method by Francesco Cirillo in the 1980s
recentChanges: Fix bugs
comments: I love the simplicity, friendly user experience, the design. Basically everything. I've tested few similar apps and so far this one is the best. One feature I would love to have: option to add some background noise during the focus session. It can be traditional kitchen timer sound, nature sounds etc. It would make the app (for me) even greater.

This app is very visually pleasing but the image on screen that looks like a clock actually isn't a clock and just spins around at random speeds. I'm a very visual person and need an app that will show me a visual representation of what time is left. Honestly don't understand what the point of the clock-esque image is, if anything it's distracting because it wonder what it's purpose is. Also very basic app, no settings. There are much better pomodoro apps out there.

I really like the app except one feature. It makes the device vibrate and play sound once the timer is finished ( you can disable the sound, not the vibration ). If the Dev's make it so that you can disable the vibration this will be the perfect pomodoro timer.
the app performance is over-all good. I hope there would be option to add some personalized notes to each pomodoro session and if the breaktime starts automatically that would be more helpful.

The app is great. It is simple and effective. But there are 2 things, the data can be more specific (hours instead of %) and In the graph, the name of the pomos should be shown. It would also be helpful if we were allowed to switch between pomos and had an overall pomo count instead of individual. But it is a great app with lots of potential. Thanks :)

title: Internet Archive org app
description:
The Internet Archive is an American digital library with the stated mission of "universal access to all knowledge". It provides free public access to collections of digitized materials, including websites, software applications/games, music, movies/videos, moving images, and millions of books. In addition to its archiving function, the Archive is an activist organization, advocating a free and open Internet. As of April 2021, the Internet Archive holds over 30 million books and texts, 8.9 million movies, videos and TV shows, 649,000 software programs, 13,225,000 audio files, 3.8 million images, and 580 billion web pages in the Wayback Machine.

The Internet Archive allows the public to upload and download digital material to its data cluster, but the bulk of its data is collected automatically by its web crawlers, which work to preserve as much of the public web as possible. Its web archive, the Wayback Machine, contains hundreds of billions of web captures. The Archive also oversees one of the world's largest book digitization projects

title: Productive - Habit tracker
description:
Productive is a free and easy-to-use habit tracker that helps you build a routine of positive, life changing habits. Set personal goals, track your progress, and motivate yourself to achieve new heights!

Productive habit tracker is here to help you make the most of your task management and get things done. Whether you want to break bad, arrange a good habits list, or set task reminder, our app will guide and motivate you on a daily basis. Achieve your goals with our task tracker!

What can you do with the Productive habit tracker?

‚òÖ Plan your habits and tasks with an easy-to-use interface
‚òÖ Schedule tasks for any time of the day
‚òÖ Set smart reminders for your habit list for each time of the day
‚òÖ Stay on track with useful statistics

Why should you download the Productive habit tracker?

SIMPLICITY:
The clear and beautiful interface that will help you build customised habits lists, based on our handy habit presets. 

CUSTOMIZATION:
The app is fully customizable - you can name your habit, choose a unique icon and even pick its color. It is easy to create a task list that is perfect for you.

STATISTICS:
Track your habits and analyze progress for a task - build motivating chains when completing them. The longer your chain of completed tasks, the more likely you will keep the streak going.

NOTIFICATIONS
Smart reminders give a summary of what tasks from your list are scheduled for each part of the day.

TIME MANAGEMENT 
Habits and tasks broken down into daily fragments of your routine and suitable for anyone who wants to achieve more in less time.

PREMIUM FEATURES
Subscribe to Premium for even more great features to boost your personal productivity: 
- Unlimited number of habits
- Improved reminders for your task and habit lists
- Motivating stats for each habit

There are many things you may want to improve. Productive will help you track your habits, like taking your pills regularly, exercising, or keeping to a diet. It can also be used by people who have difficulty focusing and concentrating, allowing them to create their own daily tasks and habits to work on.

By downloading this application, you agree to the Apalon Apps End User License Agreement and Privacy Policy.
You can choose from different subscription options.
* A subscription with a free trial will automatically renew to a paid subscription unless you cancel the subscription before the end of the free trial period.
* Cancel a free trial or subscription anytime through your account settings on the Google Play Store and continue to enjoy the premium content until the end of the free-trial period or paid subscription!

descriptionHTML:
Productive is a free and easy-to-use habit tracker that helps you build a routine of positive, life changing habits. Set personal goals, track your progress, and motivate yourself to achieve new heights!

Productive habit tracker is here to help you make the most of your task management and get things done. Whether you want to break bad, arrange a good habits list, or set task reminder, our app will guide and motivate you on a daily basis. Achieve your goals with our task tracker!

What can you do with the Productive habit tracker?

‚òÖ Plan your habits and tasks with an easy-to-use interface
‚òÖ Schedule tasks for any time of the day
‚òÖ Set smart reminders for your habit list for each time of the day
‚òÖ Stay on track with useful statistics

Why should you download the Productive habit tracker?

SIMPLICITY:
The clear and beautiful interface that will help you build customised habits lists, based on our handy habit presets.

CUSTOMIZATION:
The app is fully customizable - you can name your habit, choose a unique icon and even pick its color. It is easy to create a task list that is perfect for you.

STATISTICS:
Track your habits and analyze progress for a task - build motivating chains when completing them. The longer your chain of completed tasks, the more likely you will keep the streak going.

NOTIFICATIONS
Smart reminders give a summary of what tasks from your list are scheduled for each part of the day.

TIME MANAGEMENT
Habits and tasks broken down into daily fragments of your routine and suitable for anyone who wants to achieve more in less time.

PREMIUM FEATURES
Subscribe to Premium for even more great features to boost your personal productivity:
- Unlimited number of habits
- Improved reminders for your task and habit lists
- Motivating stats for each habit

There are many things you may want to improve. Productive will help you track your habits, like taking your pills regularly, exercising, or keeping to a diet. It can also be used by people who have difficulty focusing and concentrating, allowing them to create their own daily tasks and habits to work on.

By downloading this application, you agree to the Apalon Apps End User License Agreement and Privacy Policy.
You can choose from different subscription options.
* A subscription with a free trial will automatically renew to a paid subscription unless you cancel the subscription before the end of the free trial period.
* Cancel a free trial or subscription anytime through your account settings on the Google Play Store and continue to enjoy the premium content until the end of the free-trial period or paid subscription!

Privacy Policy: http://apalon.com/privacy_policy.html
EULA: http://www.apalon.com/terms_of_use.html
AdChoices: http://www.apalon.com/privacy_policy.html#4
California Privacy Notice: https://apalon.com/privacy_policy.html#h

comments: Great app for tasks! I've only downloaded it today, and I already have most of my tasks done! This app has no bugs whatsoever, and I love the software. It's smooth, and it looks nice to me. There are so many reminders/habits that you can easily hand pick from the options given. Like sleeping, online studying, and so much more! As a student, this reminder app will definitely help me a lot with tracking tasks and more. The app has so much more to offer than you think, download it now! I love it!

I m not satisfied at all. I got the one year premium. How can you charge so much without the ability to sync between devices :O What would happen when i change my phone which i do regulary and how come u cannot save to tje cloud as advertised when the Premium was offered to me. I m looking for an alternative despite having like 11 months left as premium

Looks great - Sneaky & Annoying popups. Signed up for free, 1st thing you see is the 7 day free trial and it asks for CC #...you DON'T have too do this to use it, look for little X in corner that you can barely see. I feel many don't see this X and think you must do 7 day trial to use it free. SNEAKY tactic, making X-out so hard to notice. EVERY time you open app to use it they use this method of pop up to try and get you to subscribe. ANNOYING. Looks great, and fun to use, not user friendly

It's a nice app! I got the paid version and there are some things I'd like to see added: A way to add descriptions to some routines An explanation for how the weekly routines are calculated-I'm supposed to do something 3x a week but it stops counting when the weekend arrives A way to set our own times for morning/afternoon/evening More icons for routines (maybe emojis?) I've also had some notifications not showing up for some reason (in the evening)
I üíùüíóüíñ the clean and simple interface. I tried a more popular app and it was very busy and noisy. Full of animations and over the top cheerleading. I'm not. 12. I want a plan, not a game.

title: WaterDo:To Do List & Schedule
description:
WaterDo is the most satisfying and fun to-do list app made by the team of „ÄäForest„Äã - the app with more than 40 million users!

You cannot avoid the tedious chores in life, but you can choose to make it fun! In addition to the comforting interface and fun mechanism, WaterDo is equipped with features to remind or calendar that make your life more efficient! 
Let's see what WaterDo has to offer:
- Visualize your to-do list by turning your tasks into Water Balls.
- Add notes anytime and anywhere as things pop into your head.
- Use "Water Ball of the day" feature to focus on the most important task.
- Daily task review helps you go over your progress and take control of your life.
- Schedule your tasks with ease, being the master of time management.
- Set reminder and snooze. We've got all procrastinators covered!
- Complete tasks to unlock treasure chests. Your dedication deserves to be rewarded.
- Explore various theme islands and experience the magical journey.

In the world of "WaterDo", your schedule become bouncy Water Balls. Pop them after you've completed your tasks and enjoy the wonderful sensation of seeing them burst!
ÔºäWarning! Images of the Water Balls burst can be extremely comforting. Please enjoy yourself!

Gamification brings motivation and motivation boosts productivity. 
Download WaterDo now and turn those boring todos into motivations!

Subscriptions will be recorded in your Google Play account. After subscribing, your subscription will renew automatically 24 hours before the current subscription ends and payment of the same subscription plan will be made. You can cancel your subscription anytime in your Google Play account settings.

title: Post-it¬Æ
description:
Use Post-it¬Æ Notes anywhere and anytime. Post-it¬Æ App brings the simplicity of Post-it¬Æ Notes to your smartphone, tablet and Chromebook. Whether you use Post-it¬Æ Notes for teamwork and collaboration, or for reminders and personal note taking, Post-it¬Æ App helps you keep the momentum going.

If you work from home or as a student in remote learning, use the Post-it¬Æ App to share your ideas with co-workers, structure your assignments and share them with your teacher, or create colorful calendars and share them with your friends.

Simply capture analog notes with your camera or create digital notes right on your device. Arrange, refine and organize ideas anyway you see fit. Collaborate and share notes with co-workers, teachers and friends, or export to your favorite apps and cloud services‚Äîincluding Miro, Trello, Dropbox, PowerPoint, Excel, PDF, and more.

Post-it¬Æ App features:
‚Ä¢ Connect and share ideas from anywhere with co-workers and friends, whether it be a workshop, a brainstorm or you simply want to share notes with each other.
‚Ä¢ Capture more than 200 Post-it¬Æ Notes at a time with your camera. All our popular note sizes are supported.
‚Ä¢ Transcribe your notes automatically using Handwriting Recognition. Great for search and exports.
‚Ä¢ Draw, erase, type and change the color of your notes using powerful editing tools.
‚Ä¢ Organize your way‚Äîgroup your ideas by thought or simply organize on a grid.
‚Ä¢ Share to your favorite formats and cloud services to continue working on your ideas digitally‚Äîsupports Miro, Trello, Dropbox, PowerPoint, Excel, PDF, and more.
‚Ä¢ Use our Widget to put your most important notes directly on your home screen.

Learn more about Post-it¬Æ App at post-it.com/app

Terms of Service: https://www.post-it.com/3M/en_US/post-it/ideas/app/eula/

‚Ä¢ Structure your ideas in new ways by using empty groups. Empty groups will stay in the board to help you organize and rearrange notes any way you like.

comments: Definitely on the right track with this. Having a note posted to the phone screen is the real advantage here I think. It would be a great if you could just tap the widget and add a note from there. Quicker than having to go to the ap first, add a note, marking it as a favorite, then have it finally show on the widget on the phone screen.

Great but Lacks What I Needed Most. All I want is to be able to put multiple notes on a page of my screen so I can read them on the go. I just downloaded the app, so I don't have much of an opinion about its functionality other than the options that I saw and tried out are amazing and fun. And when I get a new job on a team, I will be able to use the collaboration aspects of it as well. üòä

Great app. The only reason I have not given a full 5 star rating is because there is now way to login, save your boards, back-up your work, or evensync from device to device. other than this the app is great.

Please simplify this note app. It's good for notes but very clunky. Every time you make note it creates its own group\boards. Simplify it's features and allow us to add photos to our notes and back up in Google or OneDrive .
Organization wasn't always the easiest if the note needed to change boards, but the ability to quickly photograph and store notes is helpful.

title: EBF Onboarder Helper
description:
The EBF Onboarder - App is a helper app, designed to help support end-users and your organizations‚Äô IT-department while migrating ‚ÄúAndroid for Work‚Äù enabled mobile devices from one EMM/UEM-system to another.

This app requires an enabled and corresponding backend system and won‚Äôt work as a stand-alone solution.

For further information on how EBF can support you during your Mobile-IT journey please checkout:
https://ebf.de/en/products/ebf-onboarder

or read more about the EBF Onboarder:

The EBF Onboarder is a software solution developed specially by EBF for the automated and standardized migration from one EMM system to another.
The combination of automation and the supportive, flexible integration of the enduser massively speeds up the migration process. This results in significantly high savings in terms of costs and time ‚Äì the Onboarder thereby reduces your support expenditure and frees up the resources of your IT department.

title: ActionDash: Screen Time Helper & Self Control
description:
‚úîÔ∏è Trusted Globally By Over 1 Million Users to Break Their Phone Addiction
‚úîÔ∏èFeatured by Google as an 'Essential App' on Play Store
‚úîÔ∏è Available in 17 Global Languages including English, German, Spanish, French etc.


ActionDash takes the Digital Wellbeing app as a starting point, makes it available to all Android users, but it is more than that. ActionDash is here to help you find your phone/life balance and overcome your Phone Addiction. It also helps you Self-control and boost your Productivity by showing how much time you spend on your favorite apps and set app usage limits and enter "focus mode".

With ActionDash you will:

üì± reduce screen time
üîã stay focused
üõ° reduce distraction
üîî detect noisy apps
üíØ increase efficiency and productivity
ü§≥ unplug more often 
‚åö stop phubbing
üìà increase your digital wellbeing 
üìµbreak phone addiction and manage your screen time
üë™ spend quality time with family or yourself
üí™ reduce wasted time with digital diet

‚ú¶ KEY FEATURES :

Get a daily view of your digital habits:
‚òÖ  Screen time: how much you use each apps and total
‚òÖ  App launch history: how frequently you use different apps
‚òÖ  Notification history: how many notifications you receive
‚òÖ  Unlock history: how often you check your phone or unlock your device

Stay focused and self-control:
‚òÖ  Focus mode: lets you pause distracting apps with a single tap so you can better focus your time. You can also set a schedule to turn on Focus mode automatically and reduce distractions while you‚Äôre at work, school, or home.
‚òÖ  App usage limits: temporarily block any application that you are over-using and stay focused.

Have a deeper experience with enhanced insights:
üìä Screen time breakdown
üìä Your usage average
üìä Global usage average
üìä App session length breakdown


‚óè YOU ARE IMPORTANT
Thanks¬†for¬†using the app. We'd really appreciate if you could rate us 5 stars here on Google Play. Rating is very important to us in establishing trust with our user base. If you have any concerns or suggestions, please let us know.

‚óè CONTACT US
We love hearing from our users and getting their feedback! If you encounter any issues or have any suggestions to improve the app, please feel free to write to us at actiondashapp@gmail.com .


This app is maintained by Sensor Tower.

recentChanges: Share your usage! With this release, ActionDash will allow you to share your usage statistics from the Summary page, Screen Time page, and on any individual app's page.
comments: It really helps to improve my daily mobile usage and to keep a track on apps that I have to make a limit on. It's comparison feature is a plus to this app as it make me realise that I am wasting my time more than average people on internet on some apps that I can use in other things. It hepls me improve my productivity but I think if there will be a feature of setting particular time slots for using apps than it will help me more. Overall I like this a lot.

This app is really useful, and it controls me in the use of some apps, like Facebook or YouTube. It makes it easier because of there are no ads in there. Thank you for the developer of this app, to use my phone for a short amount of time, and I'm already aware of how much time I use my phone when I downloaded and used this app.

Is this app has no ads? A bit suspicious tho. But the app runs pretty well and pretty easy to use, similar to Digital Wellbeing on my Samsung phone that also has time limit and even a twist of Homer GIF when the timer runs out. There is a good chance that your app usage is the data they are going to sell to substitute of paying with ads and I don't really mind about it. 5 stars.

I've found that when the display of the apps and the amount of time you used it is on "Grid" List Style, it tends to cause a bit of lag or slowness to show the app icon, the name of the app, and the time usage. This also happens when it's on "Linear" List Style mode, albeit a bit quicker, but it is still slow nevertheless. Please fix this bug. Thanks!

It really helps keep everything in check and order. It provide factual information about your usage and so on. The limits for the day are really useful. Ir would be better if you can choose to just do it in certain days though. Like have it less strict on a weekend and more strict on a weekday. Overall it's an amazing and good app. I would recommend it for anyone looking for this sort of thing.

title: üî•SMS Backup, Print & Restore -Export PDF,HTML,CSV
description:
Backup, Convert, Exports your SMS/MMS text messages to PDF,  CSV, JPG, HTML or TXT and then restore them back to your device, print, or share them

A MUST HAVE FOR EVERY SMARTPHONE!!!

Previously called "SMS Share 2"

With  "SMS Backup, Print & Restore" you can create backups of your SMS, MMS, and RCS logs and then share it using Email, Facebook, Twitter, Whatsapp, and every other sharing method your phone provides. then you can use the files for storing in your pc or backup to the cloud. later you can use these files to restore your messages or print them

So, What can you do with "SMS Backup, Print & Restore":
‚úâÔ∏è Backup & Restore your messages - just send your messages to your email or leave the files on your device - you can restore all the messages on the same device if they desire or on another device 
‚úâÔ∏è Print your SMS and MMS Backups! - Print directly from your phone or share the backup to your email, open on the desktop, and print.


Special Features:
‚≠ê Backup and restores both text and multimedia messages
‚≠ê Supports RCS and "Advanced Messaging" (Not on all devices)
‚≠ê Supports Emojis.
‚≠ê Previews PDF and TXT files
‚≠ê Supports contacts sharing - vCard, xCard, jCard, and hCard
‚≠ê Supports calendar events sharing - vCal (Events, Todos, Journal)

Pro Version
"SMS Backup & Restore", even though it performs a simple task, is a major project to develop and maintain. Because there are so many devices and so many different apps for texting, it requires constant attention, development, and improvements. in order to keep it moving, there is a symbolic fee for unlocking all the features.  
The free version allows you to share 6 messages each time and includes ads. It is a bit more complex but it actually allows the full functionality, especially for shorter conversions. If you upgrade to pro, you can send all the messages in one go. 

Personal note:
I'm very grateful to know that the app is serving many of you in important cases like getting justice or saving important messages of your families. I do the best I can to remember this and improve the app as much as I can with the intention to help in needed times and not just to treat it as a business. Backup, Convert, Exports your SMS/MMS text messages to PDF, CSV, JPG, HTML or TXT and then restore them back to your device, print, or share them

A MUST HAVE FOR EVERY SMARTPHONE!!!

Previously called "SMS Share 2"

With "SMS Backup, Print & Restore" you can create backups of your SMS, MMS, and RCS logs and then share it using Email, Facebook, Twitter, Whatsapp, and every other sharing method your phone provides. then you can use the files for storing in your pc or backup to the cloud. later you can use these files to restore your messages or print them

So, What can you do with "SMS Backup, Print & Restore":
‚úâÔ∏è Backup & Restore your messages - just send your messages to your email or leave the files on your device - you can restore all the messages on the same device if they desire or on another device
‚úâÔ∏è Print your SMS and MMS Backups! - Print directly from your phone or share the backup to your email, open on the desktop, and print.

The free version allows you to share 6 messages each time and includes ads. It is a bit more complex but it actually allows the full functionality, especially for shorter conversions. If you upgrade to pro, you can send all the messages in one go.

comments: This app works so well and I have never had any complaints about it. The ads in the free version aren't intrusive and once you go premium you will much more features as well, you can select a specific text conversation and email it as a PDF or a CSV file. Works great!

Exceptional, everything was done fast! I could not have asked for an easier and faultless restore and backup service like this app, it also supports RCS messages which is a huge advantage in my opinion and the price is not bad for all the features it provides.

It does a good job of backing up your messages. I had some really old messages that were occupying a lot of space on my phone, but I didn't wanna lose them either so I smartly backed up all of them with the help of this app and stored them on my PC. Very useful and now I have ample of space on my phone!

I really like the option of being able to customize your texts according to your liking. Allows you to tweak, color, and customize the conversations so you get the exact results you were looking for. Overall just a great app to have with lots of functions.

Bought the paid version to download bulk text messages that I needed to hand over to my attorney. There is even a feature to save the messages as PDF documents, which is something I particularly wanted to be able to do. Glad I bought the the premium version of the app.

title: Hero
description:
The new Hero app is designed to make tracking behaviors, complying disciplinary actions, and reviewing student information an efficient experience on any mobile device.
With drastic improvements to mobile barcode reading, redesigned workflows to make tracking multiple students easier, smarter ways to search for students, and new compliance modes, these new apps are designed to fit in seamlessly with how you work at school.

We're also excited about what these apps represent: a new mobile platform for Hero that we can aggressively expand upon. The world is mobile first, and we believe your school productivity apps should be the same. In the future, we will be adding classroom interfaces, integrating the student and guardian portals, and adding all kinds of amazing functionality to these apps.

Features Include: 

- Track single or multiple behaviors at once, by searching or scanning IDs.
- Choose disciplinary actions and dates, or apply a default policy.
- Comply student disciplinary actions by student, by scanning IDs, or by disciplinary action.
- See contact information, behavior history, behavior overview, and schedule in student profile.
- Enhanced security through supported biometrics (FaceID, TouchID, and Android Biometric ID).

Existing App Users, Notice These Key Differences:

- Event tracking is not supported in the new apps at this time.
- The general behavior tracking workflow has been revised.
- You are now able to select multiple behaviors, and then initiate a scan or search to select a student.
- Once you have selected a student, you can confirm all of the behaviors and consequences to apply.
- A student's behavior history only shows the 200 most recent entries.
- Compliance now has three modes: Search, scan, and list.

Don't worry that you should remember your password again! This password manager gives access to your vault with a fingerprint login.

Password manager app DroidPass is a powerful password generator that will ward off hackers and keep your treasured information safe. Strong passwords are generated by complex algorithms of this password app and stored in an encrypted database.You will only need one master pin to unlock it all and do as you wish.

DroidPass password manager stores information for different websites from medical and finances to simple game apps, so you can free your mind to solve more important tasks. Advanced Encryption Standard (AES-256) in this password manager app keeps your passwords safe and secured.

Password manager app DroidPass is more than just passwords. This password manager securely stores‚ÄØpersonal info‚ÄØlike your Contacts, Wi-Fi passwords, Secure Notes, or anything‚ÄØelse‚ÄØyou need to store secure and accessible.‚ÄØ

comments: Very user friendly. Love that! Wish it had a Search Field instead of having to roll through and scan. Very happy with it anyway. July 3, 2021 Just renewed my subscription. Cracking app. Does exactly what you need it to do, which surprisingly enough is to remember all your passwords!! Comes with an easy to use password generator which can be altered to be as long/short/ complicated as you need. Also for good measure you can add credit card details, bank account numbers, secure contact details and notes. Free version was handy if I remember correctly, but I paid for the full version and have never been disappointed. Top recommendation from me, buy it now!!
This app is a life saver. Reasonably priced, easy to use. The only change I would suggest is easier scrolling through the saved passwords.
