title: SignUpGenius
description:
SignUpGenius is the most popular online sign up service to organize group events. Sign up for events, message group participants and view event statistics from the app. Use SignUpGenius to simplify the process of coordinating events and people with sign ups for nonprofits, schools, sports, churches, families, colleges, businesses and organizations.

Each month, up to 14 million people use SignUpGenius to organize and participate in events.
Event participants can use the app to:
¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬†Sign up for events
¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬†Add events to personal digital calendar
¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬†View event details such as time and location
¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬†Contact customer support

In addition, event organizers can use the app to:
¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬†View sign up event participants
¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬†Search, view and message group participants
¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬†Create custom reports based on sign up visitor statistics

Popular uses for SignUpGenius include:
¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬†Coordinating volunteer schedules for schools, churches, nonprofits and community groups.
¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬†Collecting payments for fundraisers, business services, product sales and event registrations.
¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬†Managing business training, team-building events and employee interviews.
¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬†Coordinating potluck dishes and meal schedules for families.
¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬†Planning sports team schedules, concessions volunteers and snack rotations.
¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬†Coordinating scouting events such as camping, Girl Scout cookie booth schedules, Pinewood Derby and more.
¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬†Scheduling parent teacher conferences at school.
¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬†Managing event registrations for 5Ks, ticket sales, camps, sports tournaments and more.
¬†¬†‚Ä¢¬†Organizing school events such as book fairs, class parties, field trips and more.

title: Mustr
description:
Mustr enables organizations to:

‚óè Execute rapid status checks - Reach out in real-time to check on the current status of individuals within your group or team‚Äîwho are able to respond from anywhere with just a tap.

‚óè Quickly broadcast critical information - Securely disseminate important information to your team members with mobile push notifications and make sure they get messages with read receipts and full encryption.

‚óè Gather and aggregate input from the team - Write and save questions for push notification to get the pulse of your organization - with automated aggregation of responses.

‚óè Rapidly create subteams for information dissemination and data collection - Create new team structures and tailor information that flows out and back based on evolving needs

Given security concerns with this type of information flow, this tool was designed to meet or exceed stringent DoD, PII, HIPAA and other federal information requirements, and application data is fully encrypted. For government customers, we have a GovCloud hosted service.
‚Äç
This application, built on the Adyton Mobile App Stack, includes FIPS 140-2 Cryptography, encrypted data at rest and in transit and device-based authentication.

Mustr is brought to you by Adyton, a software technology company founded in 2018 by U.S. Army Special Operations veterans dedicated to providing the next generation of mobile capabilities for people where the mission is critical, lives are at stake, and data makes the difference.

comments: WOW! This app is so helpful! There's literally everything you need! I've always had problem with building my characters, but with this app I understand it better! I can compare weapons and artifacts... Awesome! Also, you can see which materials you can get on a certain day! Helps a lot, too. I recommend this app to every person who plays Genshin Impact! Great job, team! ‚ú®

Great app to use when you are looking for character builds, from what weapons to give to which artifact set to equip. It also provides alternative options if you do not have the best 5* weapon for the character you are looking for. It is also really helpful in finding out what talent and weapon materials are available on any given day.

I have been using this app for a long time. Its a very well designed app. A few things, as a user and a fellow developer, I would like to suggest. From a user PoV, the Old UI was much better than the new one. And the character images have been distorted so you should look into those. Other than these, you could add a feature where we can track progress of our characters. Like what level they are, what level their talents are, what constellation they are on, what weapon is their and all. Cheers!

Gives me general information I'm looking for (mats for weapons & characters, what mats can be farmed on a day, and a calculator that gives a general idea on how much resources I need to upgrade something). The only pet peeve I have with the app is that making personal lists is a bit bothersome. If you wanted to make a list of weapons you have, it would require you to apply filters each and every time you would search for a weapon you have. Nonetheless, this app is pretty useful though!

This app is awesome. Helpful in so many ways. I would like to ask the developer to add one feature. I want to see the inventory directly from the app. Everytime i have to change the inventory items. It's time consuming

title: ID123: Student ID, Employee ID, Member ID Cards
description:
ID123 is a mobile ID card application for schools, businesses and membership organizations. Administrators can use the cloud-based ID management system to securely issue and manage digital ID cards into this mobile app. 

** A VALID WEBSITE IS REQUIRED TO ADD A BUSINESS. **

In addition to student ID cards, school administrators can issue digital school ID cards to parents and teachers. They can also improve campus safety by creating temporary IDs for school meetings and events.

Business administrators can issue digital employee photo ID cards, as well as temporary ID cards to their interns, guests, contractors, and temporary workers through the cloud-based ID management system.

Membership administrators can issue mobile ID cards to their members with preset expiration dates. If desired, they can also enable their members to share their digital photo ID cards to their family members‚Äô mobile devices.

Join the schools, businesses, and memberships that are already benefiting from issuing digital credentials to this mobile ID app!

title: MobileServe
description:
Serve. Share. Inspire. Repeat.

That's the simple philosophy behind MobileServe. 


What is MobileServe?

MobileServe is a mobile app that helps organizations and individuals measure and communicate their social impact. By tracking an individual‚Äôs service, our app is able to produce compelling infographics for marketing and communication purposes. Our product is geared towards companies, non-profit entities, universities, and Greek organizations, all of who could benefit by demonstrating their social impact.


How does it work?

The idea is simple. While users are doing good, MobileServe lets them use their phones to report and measure their service. Simple integration with social media lets you leverage users' personal networks to promote organizations and causes. User data is aggregated and translated into catchy infographics and pictures that can be used for organizational communication.

IMPORTANT!
This is an early release of the MobileServe platform on GooglePlay. This release is not a truly native experience, but it allows Android users to gain easier access to the MobileServe responsive website. The mobile website is optimized for Android smartphones. We're working on an enhanced Android app that provides a native app experience to Android users and will release an app update soon.

title: The Clock: Alarm Clock & Timer
description:
Alarm Clock App with Timer, Stopwatch, Bedside Clock & World Clock 

Simple, Reliable, Precise

The Clock is a beautiful alarm clock with "extreme" functions. It includes features that prevent excessive snooze and get you out of bed. It also comes with a built-in timer, stopwatch, world clock and a stylish bedside clock. Combines all of the functionality you need into one simple, beautiful package. It is designed to create, edit and remove alarms in the easiest way. 

Timely and accurate
You can use it to wake up in the morning or to setup reminders for your tasks and ‚Äúto-do‚Äùs during the day. Set recurring alarms for repeating events. It‚Äôs an innovative solution for those who just can‚Äôt seem to get up on time, even with an alarm clock. 

 Gentle alarm with increasing volume (Alarm Fade-In)
üîäThe Clock offers an option to set alarmy volume increasing in a peaceful and progressive way to provide gentle wake-up experience (volume crescendo). You will be able to wake up gently from your dreams, in a peaceful and progressive way. 

You‚Äôll never oversleep or miss an appointment
Choose your favorite music or tunes for your wake up. Jump-start your brain by solving math problems to dismiss the alarm. Comes with a large snooze button to prevent you from accidentally pressing ‚Äòdismiss‚Äô. Wake up in time and never late for work.

Wake up to Spotify Music
Select your best track on Spotify and wake up to great music.

Set favorite tunes with online radio
Choose from many popular online radio stations, or add your own if your favorite isn‚Äôt already on the list.

Solve math problems
You get to choose the difficulty level: Easy, Medium, Hard, Very Hard.

Alarm Widget You can edit or remove alarms with just one touch. 

Nap Alarm Perfect for an afternoon siesta!

Perfect alarm clock for heavy sleepers 
Sleep if u can! Annoying alarm clock with loud alarm tones and vibration. Perfect solution for those sleepyheads. Wake up using only vibrations, with a choice between soft and intense. It will force you out of sleep.

Works better than other alarm clocks
It is flexible. You can set an exact alarm time or sleep goal. You can set as many timers as you want for activities like exercise, cooking, sports, games and more!

Timer The Clock has a Countdown Timer, both on app and as a widget on home screen. Use it for sports, fitness exercises, tabata, HIIT, games, in the kitchen, gym or wherever you need it.

Stopwatch Simple and reliable stopwatch to keep track of split/lap time and total time down to 1/100 of a second. Feature for games, sporting events, work, science experiments, etc. The results can be shared via any application such as SMS, e-mail or Whatsapp or recorded on your notepad. 

World Clock
Keep track of time around the world using the World Clock.

Widgets
Alarm Widget, Analog Clock, Digital Clock, Calendar, World Clock Widgets. One can decorate her/his home screen with those beautiful widgets. 

Bedside Clock Turn your device into a gorgeous bedside clock. Our alarm app features a night clock with gorgeous themes (in nightstand mode). You can set as a screen saver.

Themes Unique themes & custom background support (dark & light).

Compatible with Android 11 and 12
- Use voice commands to set alarm and timers (Google Assistant)
- Use strobe light for alarms
- üìÖ Set date for alarms

** Important Note: your phone must be on for the alarm to work **

title: UID
description:
UID, a secure digital identity platform

UID is an application that allows you to login and register on websites without having a username and password. UID also has an electronic documents wallet that to stores you‚Äôre ID cards and lets you share it with the websites of the electronic service providers you wish.

By installing the UID app, registering on sites and filling forms becomes short & easy while giving you the option of accessing your identification documents anytime and anywhere.

Login with UID:

- Run the UID app and fill the required fields to complete your profile.

- A QR code will be displayed on the partner‚Äôs websites, just scan it with the UID app.

- Allow the partner access to your information and revoke it any time you want.

From now on, you need only to scan a QR code to login to your account on the UID partner‚Äôs website. 


Advantages of using UID:

- Login to websites and apps with just a scan.

- Faster, shorter & easier signing and registering.

- No need for filling registration forms to receive online services.

- No need for physical copies to receive services anymore.

- Possible to store and maintain ID cards.

-  Access your documents anytime, anywhere.

title: Smart Remote Control for Samsung TV
description:
SamRemote is a virtual remote control that lets you control your Samsung TV. The application is completely free.

To use the Samsung remote control, you must have your mobile is on the same wifi network as your TV and you accept the message that appears on your TV. Because the application runs through the wireless network, it is not necessary to be close to the TV.

If by mistake you have refused the confirmation message of your TV ( Message for establishing communication ), it is possible to change your selection by going to :

/ Menu / Network / AllShare Settings

In addition to a careful representation of the remote control, you can use all the functionality of the real remote.

Samsung remote control works with the following tv:

- Series C (2010) with internet
- Series D (2011) with All Share
- E Series (2012) with All Share
- Series F (2013) with All Share
- Series K-L-M-N (2016/2017/2018)

DISCLAIMER
SamRemote is neither an official Samsung product nor are we affiliated with the Samsung Electronics company.

title: Google One
description:
The Google One app lets you automatically back up your phone and manage your Google cloud storage.
‚Ä¢ Automatically back up the important things on your phone, like photos, contacts and messages using your free 15 GB of storage that comes with every Google account. If you break, lose or upgrade your phone, you can restore everything to your new Android device.
‚Ä¢ Manage your existing Google account storage across Google Drive, Gmail and Google Photos.

Upgrade to a Google One membership to get even more: 
‚Ä¢ Get as much storage as you need for your important memories, projects and digital files. Choose the plan that works best for you. 
‚Ä¢ Get extra protection for your phone with a VPN that encrypts your online activity and helps keep your personal information safe
‚Ä¢ Get exclusive access to Google experts for help with all of Google‚Äôs products and services. If you have a question or need assistance, our team of Google experts is just a tap away.
‚Ä¢ Share your storage with up to 5 additional people. This gives each person access to more storage from your plan, but not access to each other‚Äôs files.

comments: being direct and honest this is my first every review on app store, never cared enogh,the plan is decent, but the service is so poor, the customer care executives doesn't even understand the product they are supporting, they don't know the functionality. My grandma knows better. I asked a couple of their representatives, but they lack so much, its really funny, but that can be ignored. the disappointment was they made me do something which made me loose my work and time just because of them

Broken promises. Says it backs up everything. Had my phone brick itself from an update last night and once I got it working again I had to restore it from a backup as it had been factory reset. Android said there was a backup from 13 hours ago but it doesn't seem to have done anything. No messages, no wallpaper and no apps. Only the basic android cloud app list re download. Don't know why I pay them for a backup that doesn't work.

I've always loved using Google, throughout every aspect of the services they offer/provide. I just recently subscribed to the "Google 1" 2TB package maybe about a week or so ago & I have my own personal private VPN that's enabled whenever I get on the internet, so I feel a lot safer with that üòÅ I always have, & always will be a "Google customer for Life" GC4L‚úäüèª

I wish Google would hire less marketing idiots to run things - this is a good example of implementation gone wrong . The alleged larger storage plan - has the fine line of being shared amongst all the family members. The so-called up to 40% discount on hotels - I have never gotten that. 2 out 3 times the so-called "Great Deal" price is gone or never existed in the first place and don't even try to book some place that is popular, or on the weekends. You are going to get better rates direct from the hotel. So what are we paying for? You tell me. CrApple has their lemmings who lap-up every stool sample they sell - to beat them you should invest in better products - not more marketing.

When I get my phone I had difficulties getting some of the apps even though I had time on my phone. Also getting connected to the network so you could actually look things up. I lost a lot of my photos if you don't know exactly if they went in albums or not. I finally contacted phone service and told them that some of the basic apps that are on the phone I haven't received them suddenly it started working again like Facebook Snapchat wish at first I was very disappointed üòÖ

title: Sortifyd: Family Organizer, Shared List & Calendar
description:
Sortifyd helps you organize your life and home on-the-go in a safe, secure way! Create lists, assign to dos, share files with your family, save health information, and more, all in one app.

You can add family members to your Sortifyd account and use shared lists to assign chores, view shopping and grocery lists and plan events that work for everyone‚Äôs calendar. Our list templates help you quickly create checklists for anything from travel, chores and shopping.

Password protect your health and other documents, modify access for each user on your account and keep certain things private for yourself. Access documents easily on the go. Organize your loved one‚Äôs medications, medical history, documents, appointments, caregiver information and more, anytime, anywhere.

Families of all sizes will love using Sortifyd to organize, from young professionals on the go, to busy families, to couples, and even empty nesters traveling the world!

Download now and start organizing your life!

Lists & Planner:
‚Ä¢ Checklists keep you organized day-to-day, weekly, monthly and more!
‚Ä¢ The calendar will help you organize and create events that work for the whole family. You can even import events from your other calendars into your shared calendar in Sortifyd.
‚Ä¢ Get event, task and expiring document reminders (for driver‚Äôs license, passport, etc.)
‚Ä¢ Chores can be assigned to specific family members
‚Ä¢ List templates will help you organize quickly and easily

Organize Documents:
‚Ä¢ Your account is password protected to keep documents, receipts and your other personal and private information secure
‚Ä¢ Organization is easy with predefined folders and categories (like a virtual filing cabinet)
‚Ä¢ Information is at the ready for any emergency: insurance cards, automobile records, health records, etc.
‚Ä¢ Pull up documents easily on the go with keyword search

Passwords & Security:
‚Ä¢ Keep your data secure in this vault where it is always fully encrypted and can be decrypted only on your authorized devices
‚Ä¢ Organize and customize user access and control who has access to what
‚Ä¢ Touch/Face ID allows secure and convenient access to the app
‚Ä¢ Be notified of any changes your family makes to shared information
‚Ä¢ Records and files are securely backed up on the cloud
‚Ä¢ Password sharing lets you share password information with family members

Family Health & Wellness:
‚Ä¢ Family organizer keeps everyone‚Äôs documents safe, secure and easy to access
‚Ä¢ Organize your family‚Äôs health information from eyeglass prescriptions to medical conditions
‚Ä¢ Save vaccination records, allergies, doctors, medical conditions, visits and more
‚Ä¢ Keep track of your pet‚Äôs vet visits and vaccination records by adding your pet to your account

Journal & Memory Timeline:
‚Ä¢ Add your favorite photos to create an organized timeline of your family‚Äôs memories
‚Ä¢ Journal and record your favorite memories and moments, all in one place.
‚Ä¢ Set some memories and journal entries private if you want to keep others in your account from viewing them

Travel:
‚Ä¢ List and share your vacation or travel itinerary with you family
‚Ä¢ Add notes on important hotel and flight details
‚Ä¢ Add reward cards, passports, and account information

Download Sortifyd today and start organizing your family life!
____

IN-APP PURCHASES
Start with the FREE plan and upgrade as your needs grow. Your payment will be charged to your Google Play Account once you confirm your purchase of a paid plan. With a free trial (if available), your subscription begins immediately, but you won‚Äôt be billed until the free trial is over. Your subscription will automatically renew at the end of the subscription period at then-current pricing unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the subscription period. You can manage your subscription and turn off auto-renewal by updating your Account Settings after making the purchase.
____

Terms of Use: https://sortifyd.com/terms-of-use/
Privacy Policy: https://sortifyd.com/privacy-policy/

comments: I am coming back to rate 5 stars. My only problem was the one time password. Now that you can reset it is 5 stars all day. Is there a tutorial maybe? Like if you're going to add a list are there a list of templates maybe? Just seeing other users ways of listing always seems to help me.

title: NETGEAR Nighthawk ‚Äì WiFi Router App
description:
The Nighthawk app gives you convenient access to your router‚Äôs features:
- Anywhere Access ‚Äì Monitor and control your home WiFi from anywhere.
- Smart Parental Controls ‚Äì Filter content and limit time online automatically with Circle¬Æ on NETGEAR. 
- Armor Security ‚Äì Advanced cybersecurity on your network to protect all devices from online threats.
- Speed Test ‚Äì See if you‚Äôre getting the internet broadband speeds you‚Äôre paying for.
- Guest WiFi ‚Äì Set up a secure and separate WiFi network for guests. 
- Traffic Meter ‚Äì Monitor internet usage over time.
- Easily pause WiFi, update firmware, and more!

The NETGEAR Nighthawk app (formerly Up App) is a complete upgrade from the legacy NETGEAR genie app. New features are consistently being added. Install it today!

For more information about your router, visit http://www.support.netgear.com

recentChanges: This latest release addresses some stability issues.  Also, make sure you update your router to the latest firmware version using the app in order to explore all the great features it has to offer. Please continue to reach out to us at netgearteam@netgear.com if you‚Äôre having any issues.
comments: I have to be as honest as possible here. The app is absolute trash. Constant freezing/ crashing on start up and when it doesn't freeze or crash its functions don't work properly 90% of the time. I'd have better luck beating my router with a coat hanger trying to edit its settings than using this app. Just log into the router manually and save yourself the headache of troubleshooting this garbage.

Every time I log into my router to change settings it tells me I can do what I'm trying to do better/faster via this app. That is simply not true. The app takes longer to load than logging in via browser and it is still missing almost every single advanced feature. It also doesn't actually show all the devices on the network. I've set up the wifi room tests multiple times as well but it never saves the information or past results making that feature useless as well.

It needs a traffic meter for each device, not just overall. I downloaded the app because I wanted to start measuring the traffic of a specific device, but it only monitors you overall traffic among all you devices. Plus, as soon as I opened the app, it locked my router. Nothing was seeing the wifi signal anymore. I had to reset my router for anything to see the signal. Then the app kept saying connected to internet, but kept giving me an error code. Had to direct connect with PC to fix it.

Absolutely garbage app. Requires email and password to login to router even though web admin uses username and password. Won't connect through LAN, has to use "connect anywhere" to go out to the Internet and back in using remote access. App won't let you rename the satellites. "Router not found" when you're perfectly able connected to your router's wifi and surfing the Internet.

this thing kicks whatever devices off for no reason. it could be in the middle of a movie or a wifi call. it just boots me right off. now my router will only display 5 devices which 3 of them are not even in the same state as me anymore and won't refresh. yes I rebooted the router, yes the modem yes the devices themselves. worst router I ever had to deal with.

title: Smart Home Manager
description:
Check out the incredible new version of Smart Home Manager! 

AT&T‚Äôs Smart Home Manager gives you more ways than ever to personalize and manage your home network. As an AT&T Internet customer, you can customize your home Wi-Fi network and get a complete view from your smartphone. You can troubleshoot with one intuitive, user-friendly interface that provides tips and tools in real-time.

Sign in with your AT&T Internet User ID and password to get started! 

¬∑         Enjoy clear, technician-free troubleshooting
¬∑         Easily view and update your Wi-Fi network name and password
¬∑         See what‚Äôs connected to your Network
¬∑         Personalize all your device names 
¬∑         Create Profiles, set Parental Controls and downtime schedules to manage your    family‚Äôs screen time at home
¬∑         Pause W-Fi access for any of your devices
¬∑         Test the Internet speed to your home Wi-Fi Gateway
¬∑         Pinpoint weak signal spots throughout your home
¬∑         Check your Network health, get notified of issues and service outages, restart your ¬∑         Wi-Fi Gateway, and more!

AT&T Smart Home Manager is available to AT&T Internet service customers with a compatible AT&T Wi-Fi Gateway. Feature availability based on Wi-Fi Gateway model. Limited to home Wi-Fi Network.

comments: The app has started to "lock up" a lot when using it to run a speed test and when checking security bookmarks. Constantly now getting the app has stopped working. This was not happening when I started using the app when getting the AT&T service. I have uninstalled and reinstall numerous of times and get the same results from the app. THIS PROBLEM WITH THE APP NEED TO BE FIXED...

This app is HORRIBLE!!!! does not show actual currently connected devices,if device is paused or blocked the device is still on wifi. Yes I've updated the app, uninstalled, reinstalled. Yes my phone software is up to date. I've done endless amounts of suggestions from tech support. The app is absolutely HORRIBLE

I've had it for a few hours now. I received the "upgraded" modem with fiber straight to it. Have to sign in with every page change for the app. I get signed out for security reasons if I minimize the app. When I do get the page I'm looking for to make a change I can't do it. Spinning circle of eternity happens. Best part is : my internet still doesn't work. But the reps assure me everything is good. With sprint going away I didn't realize att would back fill their garbage service. Smdh

Smart home manager has been very useful to me as... Just a real time answer to whether or not my Wi-Fi is really having issues or just my devices. That alone, is worth it to me In addition, I can tell which devices are being used and all past devices that have used my Wi-Fi.

Can only create 1 schedule per profile. I have my son's phone,TV, and game to go off at 8 during the we week, but can t make a different setting like 10pm on weekends. This wasn't an issue with xfinity app. I also can't find how to block certain divices from my wifi

title: AdTranquility Spam Protection
description:
Our mission is to get rid of aggressive advertising forever.

Spam and annoying ads - they're a nuisance we've gotten used to. Why?

You may be used to feeling a lack of control, of not being able to do anything about the nonsense you're bombarded with every day.

Fighting against greedy, unethical, aggressive advertisers isn't an easy game.

But that's where AdTranquility comes in. We want to equip you with the power to say "NO" to misleading, annoying ads.

We want to help you create a distraction-free environment.

So that using your mobile, or browsing the internet is a tranquil and relaxing experience.

The question is - do you want to join our cause? Do you believe that together we can stop abusive advertisers and bring back the beauty of the internet?

==============

Our first proposal for you is the Spam Protection app.

If you're getting bombarded with tens, maybe even hundreds of "push notifications" every day (yes, those annoying messages telling you about how you won a new iPhone), we have the solution.

==> Simply follow these 3 steps:

1. Download the application
2. Follow the simple (one step, one-click) on-screen instructions
3. Click the big button, and clear your current notifications. You won't get any more!

We hope you enjoy using our app. Please, tell your friends about us if you think they'll find this app - or our mission - aligned with their needs!

title: Simple Alarm Clock Free
description:
Simple Alarm is a free alarm clock application designed to create, edit and remove alarms in the easiest way. You can use Simple Alarm Clock to wake up in the morning or setup reminders for your tasks during the day.

Simple Alarm's main advantage is that you can type in the time for an alarm directly instead of using a selector, pressing arrows or moving through a large list of numbers. You can just press the buttons for the hours and minutes of your new alarm directly in a numeric keyboard on screen, and that's it! You can also edit or remove alarms with just one touch, saving a lot of time when you need to setup your alarms.

Unlike other alarm clocks for Android, Simple Alarm sorts your alarms in the order they will sound next, so you can easily identify which are the tasks you have to do next, if you are using Simple Alarm as a "To Do" tasks list.

If you use Simple Alarm Clock to wake you up in the morning, you will be able to wake up gently from your dreams, in a peaceful and progressive way, because Simple Alarm increases alarm volume slowly instead of starting at maximum volume. This way, you can avoid being startled with a loud sound while you are in a deep sleep.

Simple Alarm has a 3-button deactivation method (optional) that prevent you from accidentally turning off the alarm and oversleep. You will need to be really awake to press all 3 buttons. If you want to keep sleeping for a while, you can snooze the alarm by pressing just one big Snooze button. As everyone has his/her own preferences and needs, Simple Alarm Clock lets you customize alarm's sound (selecting any ringtone, sound or song in your phone), the pause duration between alarms, and many other settings.

If you want to wake up at the same time every day, on work days, weekends or just a few days a week, you can easily select which days when creating the alarm, and the alarm clock will go off on that selected days every week.

For all the reasons above, Simple Alarm is the best alarm clock in the market, and it is much better than Android's default alarm clocks.

Simple Alarm Clock Features:
‚óè Fastest setup method.
‚óè Alarm enabling/disabling with one touch.
‚óè Set a message for each alarm.
‚óè AM/PM or 24 hours format
‚óè Alarms sorted in the order they will ring.
‚óè Repeat alarms every week on certain days.
‚óè Smart alarm suggestions based on your previous alarms so you never forget to go to work or school.
‚óè Select the alarm sound you want from all your phone's ringtones, songs and sounds. Wake up to your favorite music!
‚óè Customize Snooze duration.
‚óè 3 buttons alarm de-activation to avoid turning alarm off and continue sleeping (optional).
‚óè 1 button alarm Snooze.
‚óè Wake up gently while volume and vibration increases slowly.
‚óè The alarm gets extremely loud after some time to help heavy sleepers wake up too. Our default sound has been optimized to be the loudest it can be.
‚óè Available in English, Spanish, French, Polish, Portuguese, Russian, Italian, Japanese, German, Korean, Arab, Hindi, Chinese and Indonesian.
‚óè Special design for tablets and big cellphones
‚óè It's free!

recentChanges:
Gradually launching:
* Several bug fixes
* Full re-design.

comments: I like this alarm. It works well and is easy to operate. It's easy to schedule an alarm, alter that time, add additional alarms, alter the snooze time and vary methods to turn off the alarm. A scheduled alarm can be turned off (say for a particular day) and can simply be turned on again with just one tap. My only CRITICISM is the sound choices for the alarm. I'd like a nice soothing alarm, non jarring option & easier to add different ringtones.

Great, simple, dependable alarm. As long as this alarm doesn't change, I see no reason to ever try another. Yes it's basic, but that's what so many people want. Easy to programme and reliable - unlike so many other alarms that start of well but don't their performance deteriorates over time. Would be nice to have the option to customize, but no great loss really. The only thing that would make me uninstall would be if there were an increase in ads. Thankfully, it's ok at the moment. Thanks üëç

I like this alarm but there are times where it inexplicably doesn't work. It's easy to set, and easy to add new alarms, easy to delete alarms. You can easily choose what you want to have as your wake-up sound and how long you want it to play. It has been helpful but there have been mornings when I thought I slept through the alarm and the case was that the alarm didn't go off. This morning I was awake before the alarm went off, and so was able to watch as it gave me precisely one second of music/alarm, then the tablet went to the lock screen, no more alarm. I have it set to play for five minutes...correction: I HAD it set to play for five minutes. This morning I checked the settings and it says one minute; and it only played for one second. I have no idea why it changed from five to one minute or why it only played for one second and then the tablet went to the lock screen. For that reason the app gets three stars. It's not reliable. When it works it's great. But when it doesn't it could really screw up your day.

Easy to use, but downloaded different alarm sounds, not crazy about the default "old timey" alarm clock sound. Would be cool if more alarm sounds were provided. I found some really great sounds on Zedge. The graduated alarm sound level is helpful. The option to choose up to 3 stop buttons is a great idea for those who need that extra wake up incentive. I prefer the one button stop!! Thanks this is my first experience with this app. Will revisit the rating after I've used it a little longer. üôÉ

It doesn't always operate the same way. Sometimes the buttons appear over my unlock code, sometimes I have to unlock first. Sometimes i can snooze with the power button, sometimes it doesn't work. Wish it would operate consistently.

Add frequently used notes, emails, locations, bank accounts to Copy Keyboard - Paste Keyboard
Quickly use them by switching to Copy Keyboard - Paste Keyboard by using the keyboard switch icon.

Send song lyrics, email templates, locations, messages, notes or any other with only one tap. Easily share your addresses, phone numbers, emails, emojis, songs, notes and any other just with one tap.

Add a Standard Keyboard

Auto Text Multiplier Function (For Pranks)
Do you want to spam your friends or family? This function is what you need.

Suitable for WhatsApp, Instagram, Facebook, Snapchat, TikTok and all others.

comments: The instructions seemed clear. I haven't used the phone to verify the transfer but at this time my only issue would be the transfer time est was 11 min which was only the first phase. The populating that followed was several hours! Also one document wasn't transferred but I don't know what it was yet. It would have been convenient if the name was provided.

Very fast... because it doesn't transfer everything. Image albums are copied to an arcane folder almost impossible to fjnd; images not in a folder don't get transferred at all; contact transfer is horrid, because (1) many contacts are not transferred at all, and (2) some contacts have reverted to a previous data version. Try Samsung smart transfer instead! This app has become an embarrassment to AT&T.

I loved how fast and rite on this application was. It was very easy and it colected more from my old phone then LG Switch ever could I recommend you get AT&T Mobile Transfer if you have a AT&T Phone. Thank you.

Something has changed. Worked fabulous in the past. Transferred my SMS and contacts and things however my MMS only some came through. There is a folder in my photo gallery that has those pictures they're not attached to the texts. Some of my messages actually are only showing my words and not the responses from the other party. I redid this four times with the same result each time. Very disappointed.

Awesome! Simple, three-click-N-done, type move. I'm sure more COULD be done, but I'm so basic when it comes to the contents of my mobile device... Photos, music, calls and texts. Ohh, and social media!!! So simple is everything!! Thank you!!

title: HabitNow - Daily Routine, Habits and To-Do List
description:
Keep your routine and tasks organized as you build strong habits!
Now you can manage your tasks and keep track of your habits at the same time. Just enter your routine in HabitNow and record your progress everyday.

Define habits according to your needs
Create different habits and to-dos, set daily, weekly or even monthly goals.
Fix your schedule, goals, priorities and organize your activities in different categories. 

Set up reminders and alarms to achieve all your daily goals!
To never forget your scheduled activities, HabitNow provides a highly customizable reminder system.

Build strong habits, improve every day!
Create streaks of success for your habits and motivate yourself tracking up your progress as time goes by.
Check your schedule in the app calendar and create a journal using daily notes! 

Track your progress in an advanced way
Know your performance in detail and analyze your progress on every habit that you record. HabitNow provides many different charts and statistics.

Customize your experience as you like!
Set your style with a wide range of themes and icons.

Discover the app Widgets
Consult and track your daily progress in an easy way! 

Reach your goals and win medals!
HabitNow can be helpful if you want to quit smoking, exercise or follow a healthy diet. Just focus on something you want to improve in your life and make it a habit!

comments: Good UX design. Quick and easy to add a task to my todo list. I like how the plus button and the option to select a new task are right by my thumb, I don't have to click all over the screen. I'd be interested to see more statistics and features in the settings. I like how minimal the app is, so if they add anything I hope they don't put it in a place that will bloat it, or require extra steps. I like the quick and easy UX. Happily purchased the pro version to support good app development.

Overall its pretty decent. The manual sorting issue is a real problem, it should be a basic function! Most apps like this you just long press and then drag and drop them into whatever order you want. The widget is decent, not the most aesthetically pleasing. However it does the job overall, and the good thing is it seems to be being updated! :)

It is simple and effective which is what I'm looking for but it lacks such a simple feature to help me organize my tasks and habits, manual sorting. I don't know why I can just drag and drop my habits in the order I want. It sounds small but it's a deal breaker for me. I have habits that I execute in the morning and some in the evening and I want to be and to group them accordingly. EDIT in response to developer: I found those options and tried them all. I couldn't get the sorting I wanted with them. If you add manual sorting as a feature in the near future that would absolutely solve this issue and make me a happy camper. Thank you for the quick reply.

This is one of my favourite and most used apps. The new UI was a bit of a shock at first but I'm quickly getting used to it. It's still clear, simple and easy to use and looks really nice. I have one problem now that I did not have before: the font is way too small. I have to increase it drastically in my phone's settings - and then, of course, it's huge in pretty much every other app. That makes HabitNow hard to use for me. Please make the font bigger again or offer in-app font size options.

Good app but some features are missing. Specifically the ability to have a counter option for habits (do this thing x amount of times per day) also the ability to order your list of daily habits with a user friendly 3 horizontal bar slider. These features would help users establish and work through daily routines. They seem like easy fixes. I'll update review when this changes

title: Notepad Free
description:
Notepad Free is a small and fast app to create and edit text notes. Features:
* simple interface that most of the users find easy to use
* no limits on note's length or number of notes (of course there's a limit to phone's storage)
* creating and editing text notes
* importing notes from txt files, saving notes as txt files
* sharing notes with other apps (e.g. sending a note in Gmail)
* widgets allowing to quickly create or edit notes
* backup function for saving and loading notes from a backup file (zip file)
* app password lock
* color themes (including dark theme)
* note categories
* automatic note saving
* undo/redo
* lines in background, numbered lines
* technical support

** Important **
Please remember to make a backup copy of notes before formatting a phone or buying a new phone. Since the 1.7.0 version the app will also use Google device copy, if it's turned on in the device's and the app's settings.

* Why do I advise to not install the app on an SD card?
I follow Google's advice to block installing on an SD card apps that use widgets. This app uses widgets, which are like icons for the notes, and can be placed on a phone's home screen (for example).

* Why is the permission for writing on SD card listed on the permissions list?
It's currently not used. It was an optional permission for cases when a backup copy was to be saved on the device. Play Store shows historical permissions, even if it's no longer in use by the app.
Please remember that the permission can be revoked at any moment by going into the app's settings. Also, the app will ask for the permission when needed.

If you have any additional questions, just contact me by email: notepad.free@outlook.com .

Thank you.
Arek

Notepad Free is a small and fast app to create and edit text notes. Features:

* creating and editing text notes
* importing notes from txt files, saving notes as txt files
* sharing notes with other apps (e.g. sending a note in Gmail)
* widgets allowing to quickly create or edit notes
* backup function for saving and loading notes from a backup file (zip file)

comments: I like your app. Firstly, there isn't a long list of intrusive and unreasonable permissions request for this app. I like that you respect your user's privacy. Secondly, it is simple to use. I don't need an elaborate app just to make short reminder notes. However, I was wondering if it is possible to underline, bold or even cross out the text in my notes. For example, when I have bought something on my shopping list, I might like to cross out the item on my list.

Top shelf app. Easy to use, nice to have access to this product. I have trouble moving all the info from one appliance to another. Any help would be appreciated. It should be simple, I can't seem to get my head around it. Thank you

This is a great app... I have used it for years now. I only suggest that you add a go to bottom of notepad button... I make very long notes and I feel like scrolling down to the bottom taking 30-45 seconds is excessive. Edit: OMG. Thank you to the developer!

Overall, an excellent little app. 1. Like Jenny Williams before, I'd like the app to open in Categories view instead of seeing every note in a long list. 2. The backup exports to a zip file which can only be read by the app. How about an option to back up all notes to a text file, as is possible with individual notes. 3. Change font size would be a good option.

Really like this app's features! Not bloated with ads, not overwhelming with options but still features many useful ones. I like being able to import txt files from my device and export them when I'm done. This app keeps a separate copy in case one of them is lost. It also now includes a read mode so I can review a note without accidentally modifying it. Nice app!

title: ha tunnel VPN
description:
Secure VPN is a lightning-fast app provide free VPN service. Not need any configuration, just simply click one button, you can access the Internet securely and anonymously.

Secure VPN encrypts your Internet connection so that third parties can‚Äôt track your online activity, making it more secure than a typical proxy, make your Internet's safety and security, especially when you using public free Wi-Fi.

We have built a global VPN network included America, Europe and Asia, and expand to more country soon. Most servers are free to use, you can click the flag and change server as any times as you want.

Why choose Secure VPN?
‚úÖ Large number of servers, high-speed bandwidth
‚úÖ Choose apps which using VPN (Android 5.0+ required)


Download Secure VPN, the world's fastest secure virtual private network, and enjoy it all!

If Secure VPN connect failed, don't worry, you can follow these steps to fix it:
1) Click the flag icon
2) Click the refresh button to check servers
3) Choose the fastest and most stable server to reconnect

Hoping you suggestion and good rating to keep it growing and make it better :-)


VPN related introduction

A virtual private network (VPN) extends a private network across a public network, and enables users to send and receive data across shared or public networks as if their computing devices were directly connected to the private network. Applications running across the VPN may therefore benefit from the functionality, security, and management of the private network.

Individual Internet users may secure their transactions with a VPN, to circumvent geo-restrictions and censorship, or to connect to proxy servers for the purpose of protecting personal identity and location. However, some Internet sites block access to known VPN technology to prevent the circumvention of their geo-restrictions.

VPNs cannot make online connections completely anonymous, but they can usually increase privacy and security. To prevent disclosure of private information, VPNs typically allow only authenticated remote access using tunneling protocols and encryption techniques.

Mobile virtual private networks are used in settings where an endpoint of the VPN is not fixed to a single IP address, but instead roams across various networks such as data networks from cellular carriers or between multiple Wi-Fi access points. Mobile VPNs have been widely used in public safety, where they give law enforcement officers access to mission-critical applications, such as computer-assisted dispatch and criminal databases, while they travel between different subnets of a mobile network.

comments: Haven't had much time to evaluate this app, but 1) The UI is impressive, 2) As is the support for importing photos, and 3) The list of features. However, the latter does NOT belong under the heading 'What's New'! I'm sure I'm not the only one who actually reads the 'What's New' section, which other Devs manage to use to communicate with (potential) users re new/enhanced features, issue/stability fixes, etc.

I have been using this app for about a month And except that the fact that we have to pay for all the themes, now it's difficult to back up. Every time I try to backup my notes ;; it's says 'backup failed please try again'. And I tried about a hundred times! I like this app that's why I use it but please fix it

This is dream app for students, Teachers, Businessmen, Entrepreneurs, for almost all of them, if you mastered it how to use. I was searching for these kind of app, for almost 3 years, later on found it I believe that I wish I had this kind of app 3 years before. Such a wonderful app you can give a try without even thinking twice. It's really worth it. One more thing even the paid plan is so reasonable and affordable by everyone. Really Impressive App -

I really like the concept and idea behind this app. The one thing I don't like is the stop of my audio when I open the app while listening to music. This may because of the ads üòÖ. I do not mind the banner ads since they don't interfere with my doing but I don't like the pop ups. For better earning I think it's better to make an ad to unlock a certain feature. Like I want to make use a VIP template. Maybe I can unlock by watching an ad. If I want to use the template again I gotta unlock again.

I like this app better than the regular one, but this app you have to pay for items. It's not free as advertised. There are many things you can due for free, but most of everything else comes with a subscription. Which is $29.99 for life!! Not bad right??? Well everything I want to use like auto save, auto back up, and many other similar things all have to be done on a subscription. Which at this very moment today I can't pay for. Not today anyways. It does have some nice features!!

title: Google Tasks
description:
Get more done with the Google Tasks mobile app. Manage, capture, and edit your tasks from anywhere, at anytime, with to-dos that sync across all your devices. Integrations with Gmail and Google Calendar help you get tasks done‚Äîfaster.

Quickly capture tasks anywhere
‚Ä¢ Create task lists with your most important to-dos
‚Ä¢ View, edit, and manage tasks on the go, from any device
‚Ä¢ Manage tasks created in Gmail or Calendar on the web from your mobile device

Add details and create subtasks
‚Ä¢ Break down your tasks to subtasks
‚Ä¢ Add details about the work you need to focus on
‚Ä¢ Edit details about any task as your work progresses

View tasks created from emails
‚Ä¢ Create a task directly from an email in Gmail
‚Ä¢ View your tasks in the side panel of Gmail
‚Ä¢ Trace a task back to its source email

Stay on track with due dates and notifications
‚Ä¢ Set a due date for every task to help you achieve your goals
‚Ä¢ Organize your tasks by date or prioritize using drag-and-drop
‚Ä¢ Receive due date notification reminders to keep your tasks on track

Part of G Suite
‚Ä¢ Bring Google's suite of powerful, intelligent apps to your business
‚Ä¢ Leverage Google‚Äôs AI to bring data insights and analysis to every employee
‚Ä¢ Connect with your team seamlessly using one suite: Gmail, Tasks, Calendar & more

Take control of your task management and install the Google Tasks mobile app. Start easily managing your to-do list on the go with the Tasks planner app from Google.

summary: Simply create any task or subtask. Integrated with Gmail for easy collaboration
developerAddress: 1600 Amphitheatre Parkway, Mountain View 94043
recentChanges:
‚Ä¢ Easily create a new task by long-pressing on the app icon
‚Ä¢ Create a task by sharing from other apps
‚Ä¢ General improvements and bug fixes
comments: Great app. Can repeat every day and will show up on your Google calendar if you want. You can set your own custom amount of reminders I the settings and all new tasks will automatically have those reminders. I like checking them off. Once they're checked off, they're still on a list below that you can find and reactivate. You can create subtasks. I would like to be able to set reminders hourly, however, for things like taking medicine or drinking water.

I *really* want to love this app and make it a part of my daily productivity. The integration with Google Calendar and the ability to create tasks from an email (in Gmail) are game changers for me, however there are two deal breakers: [1] There is no integration with the Google Assistant. This is a surprising oversight given that you can add everything else with your voice (Calendar Events, Reminders, Notes, etc). I have too many use cases where I need to add Tasks with my voice from either my phone, Google Home, or Android Auto. [2] There is no ability to share task lists with other Google users*. I need to share lists with my household (grocery lists, chores, house projects, etc). *Yes, I know there are services that will do this for you but it should be a native feature.

Pretty good. The link with Google Calendar is great, as is the ability to create different categories of task and to set different dates and times for subtasks. Two things that would make this nearly perfect in my view: (1) A separate standalone app for pc use, since the sidebar thing is extra clicks to get to and a computer screen is better for seeing the whole picture at once, and (2) the ability to set different colours to appear on the calendar (perhaps for different categories of task).

Google tasks is the ultimate app that is a necessity to the Google workspace. I give Google tasks a 5 star rating due to the fact all highlighted points stated that the application would accomplish for the user. Personally I downloaded the app to be a type of therapy to my procrastination and it has really helped me with big tasks being able to be broken down into subtasks etc. Highly recommend for your workspace whether it is just a reminder or a large task. üíúüåπ Stay safe y'all!

At last, a simple app! For all those that say it's too simple, and not enough colours, I say, go get a piece of paper, a pen, some coloured pencils and a fridge magnet. It's a fantastic basic job list for crying out loud. Thank you for this app.

title: Email - Lightning Fast & Secure Mail
description:
Email by Edison is the simplified, customizable inbox experience that allows you to manage unlimited email accounts in a seamless way! Get emails faster, block spam, and never see an ad clogging up your inbox again.

Enjoy Office 365, Yahoo Mail, AOL Mail, Hotmail, Outlook, MS Exchange, IMAP, Alto, Gmail, iCloud, Comcast, Verizon, AT&T, and more all in one application. Built for phone and tablet usage. 

Google Play Store 2017 Android Excellence Program Winner

TheVerge - ‚ÄúThe fastest email app around...‚Äù 
Android Authority - ‚Äú‚Ä¶useful features...great user interface‚Ä¶‚Äù
TechCrunch- ‚Äú‚Ä¶like you‚Äôve given the mail app an upgrade‚Ä¶‚Äù 
CNET- ‚Äú‚Ä¶imposes order on an unruly inbox‚Ä¶‚Äù 

With Edison Mail you get:
‚Ä¢ Price Alert - Get cash back on shopping! Enable Price Alert and Edison will alert you if your recent purchases dropped in price from retailers that offer price matching so you can ask for a refund for the difference.
‚Ä¢ All Your Inboxes The Way You Want - Manage all your mail accounts, easily switch between inboxes, optional Focus Inbox moves your important mail up front.
‚Ä¢ Closer to Inbox Zero - View all your subscriptions in a tab, unsubscribe from junk with a tap, bulk delete, block certain senders from messaging you again, easily block spam forever
‚Ä¢ Privacy From Prying Eyes - The only email to automatically block read receipt tracking pixels without degrading the email experience
‚Ä¢ Built-In AI Assistant - Easily search bills & receipts, attachments, travel, entertainment, and more without disturbing your email organization. Get real-time travel notifications about your flight plans. Check package statuses all in one folder. With our new Assistant, see your upcoming meetings, travel itinerary, bills due, smart unsubscribe suggestions, and more at a glance.
‚Ä¢ Fewer Mistakes - Always undo send and AI-based smart reply options.
‚Ä¢ Less Digging - A full search engine in your phone that allows you to search through all your folders quickly and seamlessly.
‚Ä¢ Customizable Notifications - Personalize sound and vibration settings. Only get alerted for the mail you care to see.

Privacy By Design is Our Promise to Our Users 
We put privacy first in all the things we do at Edison Software. We never target you for ads and prevent other companies from tracking you when you use our app. We also believe in being transparent and giving you choices. Please read our Privacy Policy to ensure that you are familiar with our practices and business model and to learn how you can manage your data.

Please send us your feature requests and feedback at mailsupport@edison.tech.

Special thanks to everyone who rates us 5 stars, or leaves kudos! Your support means the world to our team!


Price Alert is available in the US.
AI-Assistant available in the US, UK, Australia, Canada, and India.

summary: Lightning fast email for Samsung Galaxy, Google Pixel, OnePlus & more.
developerAddress: 1054 S De Anza Blvd, Suite 105, San Jose, CA, 95129
recentChanges:
Solve the problem that the AOL account cannot be logged in.
Fixed the issue that certain attachments cannot be downloaded or opened on some phones.
comments: Excellent - very happy with it so far. Having just changed my phone I had to reload apps etc. I tried several options, including MS Outlook, but had various issues with them all until I found this one. So far, none of the glitches I experienced with the others and some great functions as well. I have multiple email accounts so the colour codings function is really useful. Very happy and relieved I've finally found what appeares to be a user friendly and reliable email app. Thank you.

Nice enough app but with little annoyances... For example, emails with diary invite attachments. The app won't let you save to the phone's calendar, only to reply but then it says 'failed to send'. Also very very slow to update. I have to force it to refresh when I've deleted emails on my tablet, otherwise it will keep the undeleted emails in the inbox indefinitely.

It was working fantastic. Much better than nail app that came with phone... Until yesterday. All mail was gone. I updated the app and now everytime i go to check mail, it says I'm offline and have to put a password in again. This update was to fix AOL sign in, but I was not having that problem until I updated. Now it wont stay signed in to AOL.

Awesome, absolutely a breeze to use. I have multiple email accounts and need different settings for each one, which I can easily do through this app. I have no complaints at all after several months of using it now. There's small glitches that can happen here and there but due to the app being so good, u truly overlook the small little glitches!!!!

This is a nice email app, my favorite in fact, but it has one flaw that I've noticed. When using a VPN connection, a sent email is reported as successfully sent, but the email is not sent and will later be found in the Outbox. This has caused me problems and financial loss a few times. There should really be a 'failed' message if the email fails to send, regardless of the cause. Because of this flaw, I can no longer trust this as my primary email app.

title: Stack: PDF Scanner by Google Area 120
description:
Get rid of paper clutter with Stack. Stack is a PDF scanner, document organizer, and detail finder. All in one.

Scan with your phone
Stack can be used as a bill scanner, receipt scanner, invoice scanner and more. 

High-quality PDFs
Stack transforms your scanned documents into high-quality PDFs.
Easily edit with crop, rotation, color enhancement, and correction.

Make organizing easy
Stack automatically names and organizes your documents into useful categories.

Never miss a detail
Stack finds and displays key details from your document (like ‚Äútotal amount due‚Äù). Copying information has never been easier.

Private and secure
Stack uses Google‚Äôs world-class security to protect your data. You can turn on fingerprint or face lock for extra peace of mind.

Automatic Back Up
Stack backs up all your documents to the Cloud. You can save a copy of your documents also to Google Drive.

Import existing PDFs
Import from camera, gallery or files. Your documents have a new home.

Free
Stack has no ads or in-app purchases. And no watermarks. 

Share PDF documents
Share your scanned documents via email. 

Document search
Stack‚Äôs OCR scanner allows you to search for text within your documents. You can always find what you need.

Made by Google 
Built by Google‚Äôs in-house incubator ‚ÄúArea 120 by Google‚Äù, this app will show you why this is the best PDF scanner. Learn more at stack.area120.com.

recentChanges: Brand new app! Stack has just launched so please send us feedback on what can be improved.
comments: Very good app! I hope someday this can be used for official government ID. one little thing I just had trouble with is that it doesn't seem intuitive to move things between stacks. I added a document and it was in no stacks. I couldn't add it to one without downloading the PDF and sharing it to the app again, even though it already has a copy of it. minor thing but worth pointing out. I will still use this app heavily. I want to get copies of all my important documents in here.

I love everything Google; it's sync/accessibility/etc is a lifesaver. I would love a scanner app that also doubles as an organizer. While this app is off to a good start in that direction, it's still lacking features that prevent me from fully commiting to using it at the moment. The concept of organizing scanned items into folders is a huge asset for this app! However, the app NEEDS to allow the user to be able to sort said items by name/date. The sooner this function arrives, the better!!

I love this app. I'm documenting all of my purchases, with pics of serial numbers and receipts. They save in Google Drive as a PDF as well, so don't have to only use the app to view it. Google, please don't kill this one! One thing I'd like to see is the ability to change the order of the pics in the edit window. You can delete individual pics, but can't move one from the back to the front without deleting them all and adding them all back in a different order.

Decent app so far, I'm trying to use it for lots of files at a time and after a while it starts to crash a lot. The layout of nice all the right buttons in all the right places. Having documents save to one drive if nice. So far is good for small batchs of documents.

Awesome idea. Where are the images stored? Can a house hold share a folder for storing receipts? Like most ppl I already have images of receipts but Stack will only let me add images from photos, not from drive. Also there's no way to select all images in a gallery. So what about ppl that already track their receipts and want to organize them with this app?

title: ATTO Timesheets: Time & GPS Tracking for Employees
description:
Atto is the simplest timesheet app for small businesses. Tap a button to clock in and start tracking your time. Your work hours turn into simple, accurate timesheet reports automatically.

Detailed insights into your team's daily activity give you actionable knowledge that helps you grow your business. Find out instantly who‚Äôs on the clock, on break, hasn‚Äôt showed up for work yet or is enjoying some time off. Generate powerful timesheet reports automatically, including regular time, overtime, breaks, jobs and paid time off. Less time spent preparing timesheets means more time to focus on things that matter.

Increase accountability through complete transparency and never second-guess your team‚Äôs timesheet reports again. Save time and money and focus on real growth.


You run your business.
We‚Äôll make sure timesheets are filled painlessly and on time.


Key Features

‚Ä¢ SIMPLE TIME TRACKING
Whether in the office or while on the move, time tracking has never been simpler. Just tap a button to clock in and start tracking your time.

While on the clock, you can track time towards specific job codes, add insightful notes, take a break or add paid time off.

‚Ä¢ GPS LOCATION TRACKING
Get real-time updates on your team‚Äôs location. Mobile GPS tracking helps you ensure everyone is safe, productive and in the right place at the right time.

Location tracking turns off as soon as you clock out.

‚Ä¢ TEAM ACTIVITY INSIGHTS
You will never be in the dark again. At a glance, find out where your team is, how long they‚Äôve been working and what they‚Äôve been working on. 

Your team‚Äôs daily activity contains all the info you need to run your team while on the move.

‚Ä¢ AUTOMATED TIMESHEETS
Empower your team with automated timesheets and get accurate reports, including regular time, overtime and PTO. Never second-guess your timesheet report‚Äôs accuracy again.

Spend less time preparing and collecting timesheets and jump straight to what matters - the data.


And this is not all. Atto has so much more to offer, including: 

‚Ä¢ Organized Job Codes
Easily allocate time tracked to specific purposes with job codes. Get a better understanding of where your hours are going.

‚Ä¢ Transparent Breaks
While on the clock, start your break with the simple tap of a button and ensure your timesheets are accurate.

‚Ä¢ Insightful Notes
Add notes to each timesheet with as many details as you need and keep your team up to speed with the latest info.

‚Ä¢ Paid Time Off Hours
Track your team‚Äôs PTO hours, whether personal, vacation or sick leave.

‚Ä¢ Managed Clock In & Out
When your team is at the job site, managers can clock in and out on the employees‚Äô behalf.

‚Ä¢ Manually Added Time Entries
Add or edit time entries manually to ensure all work hours are accurate and accounted for. All edits are flagged for review.

‚Ä¢ Powerful Daily Timeline
In a clear and accurate timeline view, you‚Äôll get a powerful report of each employee‚Äôs daily activity.

‚Ä¢ Scheduled Email Reports
Schedule your team‚Äôs timesheet report straight to your email based on your payroll period.

‚Ä¢ Smart Notifications
Get clock in and out reminders and notifications whenever an employee clocks in/out or edits a time entry.

‚Ä¢ GPS Tracking, Only If Necessary
If it‚Äôs not the right fit for your team, you can turn off location tracking completely.

‚Ä¢ Job Sites
Name your job sites and generate easy-to-read timesheet reports.

‚Ä¢ Organized Departments
Group your teams into departments and stay organized.

‚Ä¢ Offline Compatibility
Keep your timesheets updated, even when out of service.

‚Ä¢ Battery Efficient GPS Technology
Ensure you are always powered up and there is minimal battery consumption.

‚Ä¢ Privacy & Security
As soon as you clock out, location tracking is turned off completely.


For feedback, ideas or questions, please contact us at support@attotime.com

comments: Purchased this app last year for $288. It was pricey and not worth it. I cacncled this last year and they took another $288 out of my account May 29th. Since then it has been like pulling teeth to get my money back. They agreed to give me the money back and said it would take 5-10 buisness days that was 15 buisness days ago and no refund. Do not use this app.
It wouldn't work it just should be taken down
Great way to keep up with your hrs.

Lots of glitches. You've clocked in or out but it refreshes and then you're not. I have to make corrections constantly because if this. Also, the requirement for 24/7 location tracking is ridiculous. When I'm not clocked in, my location is no one's business.

We have been using the app for just over a year.  While it does work for the Seats we have purchased I am having an issue with purchasing new seats for additional employees.  We just got an invoice for 2 seats, we had 3 purchased but it is telling me there are only 2 available.   In addition there is NO CONTACT info on the website or the App for Help or to contact the Developer.  I found an email here on the Play store.  We'll see how fast the Developer responds and rectifies our issues.  Quickbooks is pushing me to their app so I'm getting close to pulling that trigger.  I'll report back what I find out from the Developer.   For the Cost there should be Contact info and great Customer Support.  Update:  The developer did get a hold of me and rectified my issue with the billing.  Apparently it times out and the link expires to purchase additional seats.  The issue with not having a direct Customer Service link or option in the App or on the website does still exist.  I did see that if you do not sign into your account on their website there is a Support button.  However, when you sign into your account it disappears.  Very weird to not have this option for your paying customers.

title: Rocketbook
description:
The Rocketbook app instantly sends your Rocketbook pages and whiteboards enhanced with Beacons to your favorite cloud services. Access and share them anytime, anywhere!

The app has a unique seven-symbol shortcut system that gets your auto-cropped and high quality scans into the cloud faster than any other scanning app. Using our Handwriting Recognition (OCR) features, you can search your handwriting inside the app, use your handwritten text as the filename, and get a full-page transcription via email.

The Rocketbook app is designed to work with Rocketbook products including the:
- Core (endlessly reusable notebook)
- Mini (pocket sized version of the Core)
- Wave (microwave-to-erase notebook)
- Color (reusable kid's coloring book)
- Whiteboards enhanced with Rocketbook Beacons (adjustable whiteboard attachments)
- One (single use notebook)

Enjoy the pleasure of writing and the efficiency, organization, and shareability of digitization. Write freely and use our shortcut system to send your scans as PDFs or JPEGs to specific locations in Google Drive, Dropbox, Trello, Evernote, Box, OneDrive, OneNote, Slack, Google Photos, and Email.

For more information about our reusable notebooks, please visit getrocketbook.com. Free Rocketbook PDFs and customizable pages can be found at start.getrocketbook.com.
descriptionHTML:
The Rocketbook app instantly sends your Rocketbook pages and whiteboards enhanced with Beacons to your favorite cloud services. Access and share them anytime, anywhere!

The app has a unique seven-symbol shortcut system that gets your auto-cropped and high quality scans into the cloud faster than any other scanning app. Using our Handwriting Recognition (OCR) features, you can search your handwriting inside the app, use your handwritten text as the filename, and get a full-page transcription via email.

The Rocketbook app is designed to work with Rocketbook products including the:
- Core (endlessly reusable notebook)
- Mini (pocket sized version of the Core)
- Wave (microwave-to-erase notebook)
- Color (reusable kid's coloring book)
- Whiteboards enhanced with Rocketbook Beacons (adjustable whiteboard attachments)
- One (single use notebook)

Enjoy the pleasure of writing and the efficiency, organization, and shareability of digitization. Write freely and use our shortcut system to send your scans as PDFs or JPEGs to specific locations in Google Drive, Dropbox, Trello, Evernote, Box, OneDrive, OneNote, Slack, Google Photos, and Email.

For more information about our reusable notebooks, please visit getrocketbook.com. Free Rocketbook PDFs and customizable pages can be found at start.getrocketbook.com.
summary: Send your Rocketbook pages and whiteboards enhanced with Beacons to the cloud
recentChanges:
‚Ä¢ Bug fixes and performance improvements.

By the way, App Store reviews are really helpful for us. If you think Rocketbook is great, would you mind taking a moment to write a nice review? If you have any feedback, please contact us at feedback@getrocketbook.com. Thanks!
comments: Update Aug 3-The synch issue has been resolved. Would still like the ability to import scans from my old device/cloud. I don't like that you cannot import scans to the app when you get a new device. I get that it's cloud based, and I like that when I'm on my laptop. But it's a pain on a phone to have to log into another app, look for the folder, etc etc. Would be much better if they were handy in the Rocket app. 2 clicks away.

Scans won't send to email accounts despite trying every setting combo (auto send on/off, OCR on/off, different file types etc). Support just suggest "check your spam folders" which Ive done, so no help at all. Also, if you sign out of the app and then back in it loses all your saved destination info so you have to enter it again! Im thinking of returning my rocketbook fusion as its practically useless with the app in this state.

This is the 2nd part to owning a Rocketbook. They work perfectly together allowing a seemless journey from note taking to destination. Great effort put in to make everything logical. If you have ever used an app and thought "Why the **** haven't they done that?" or "What the **** is this for, why isn't it like I want it to be?" then you'll be happy with this. I haven't received any money or free stuff for this review. In fact I have bought both the Fusion & Panda. They just do what I need.

OCR not working. Keeps saying that I should check my internet connection which I doubt is the reason. If a 43Mmps internet speed can not do the trick, how fast does it need for it to work. But everything else works fine so 3 stars. If it somehow works in the future ill try to update

I love this app for OneNote and email, but it would be nice to have the ability to (1) OCR to Trello and (2) write to individual cards in Trello. In the meantime, I'll just do so to OneNote or email and then copy and paste to Trello.

title: BlockSite - Stay Focused & Control Your Time
description:
Stay focused with BlockSite the app that improves productivity by blocking websites and apps that waste your time. Create custom block lists, schedule tasks or start a focus session to make sure you stay focused, productive and in control of your time.

BlockSite is considered an awesome self control app to regain time control as it enables you to control your browsing content by blocking apps and sites when you need to keep focused.

All it takes is a few simple clicks once downloaded and you‚Äôll be able to avoid procrastination, increase concentration and stop wasting time.  You‚Äôll also be able to stay more engaged with the world around you and make time for what matters most, both online and offline. 

So whether you‚Äôre a student, professional in the workplace or just want to implement better productivity and time management in your life by improving your digital habits, we can help.

‚≠êÔ∏èFeatures‚≠êÔ∏è

Want to know how to block a website? We‚Äôve got you covered! Just add websites to your block list on and we‚Äôll do the rest, we‚Äôll even throw in some really funny images if you try and go on the sites while they‚Äôre blocked üí©

‚è∞Stay Focused App
Remove all distracting and harmful websites and apps from your life by blocking them while you need to stay focused and productive. You can even set yourself a focus timer and make sure you stay on track throughout the day while at work or school.

üë®üèº‚ÄçüíªFocus Mode
The work mode timer feature enables you to control your time via the Pomodoro technique timer. Break down your work into intervals, traditionally 25 minutes followed by a short break. With ‚ÄòWork Mode‚Äô you can set times when to block websites and when to browse freely - no willpower necessary.

üîûBlock Adult Content
Ever wondered how to block adult content on your device? Well now you can...easily! With the built in porn blocker that blocks all known adult sites by default making sure that you don‚Äôt see any inappropriate content.

üìÖScheduling
Set up your own daily schedules and daily routines when you need to stay on track with the ‚ÄòScheduling‚Äô feature that enables you to set days and times when you can access certain sites and apps. It‚Äôs the best time management planner you could ever wish for, we promise!

‚è≥Time Management
Now your time management schedule will never look better! You‚Äôll be able to get all your work done and still have time to browse your favorite sites and apps in between.

üì±üíªSync
BlockSite is a cross-browser website/URL and app blocker that helps you to control your website usage and manage distractions and addictions. It is available on Google Chrome and can be synced between your desktop and mobile so you stay productive and have total control over your time wherever you are.

As one of the best productivity tools available, we can help you  procrastinate less, become more productive and reach their life goals. You‚Äôll never have to worry again about how to stay focused at work. So what are you waiting for? Download now and start taking control of your time...today!

BlockSite helps you stay focused and avoid distracting websites and apps by using Accessibility services to block them from opening. As part of this process, BlockSite receives and analyzes aggregated de-identified information about your mobile data and app use. For more information, please see our Privacy Policy: https://blocksite.co/privacy/
Terms of Service: https://blocksite.co/terms/
