comments: This app is good but then there is only 1 issue that needs to be solved. I'm a premium user and I downloaded this app to curb certain addictions of mine. The only reason I went premium is because I felt like the uninstall feature would help me stay accountable. I soon realised I was wrong after the purchase because even if you turn on the uninstall feature, you can simply turn it off with 1 click and then uninstall the app. This need to be fixed. If you do fix it, I will reconsider my review.

It would be great if it actually blocked the site. The site will still populate and then you'll see a page overlapping it stating block site blocked it and you have to click out of that to go back to continue your search. Happens at least 5 times a day and I don't search the web that much. It's still very annoying just as much if not more than the site I want to block. Seems to defeat the purpose. Uninstalled.

Love your app. I honestly think you're the best App & Website Blocker out there that supports multi-platform. But it's just, i hope you'll realize WE NEED A DARK MODE toggle!!! Like come on. It is 2021 now, Dark Mode should be default design standard now these days. We have productivity and focusing to do at night too!!!

I DO NOT RECOMMEND!!! It's says free, you download, it it let's you block 1. After one you have to upgrade, you don't even get any comfort or peace of mind on knowing that this is actually doing the job before it says you need to upgrade to block anyone else.

The application didn't block or even slow down any pop- ups. Reached the Attorney Generals Office in Denver, Colorado Attorney General Tim Weisser. Recieved information to stop these unwanted. blocked, and other companies from coming into other secured websites continuing to put pop-ups in their websites. Anti- Spyware installed in your laptops, notebooks, and tablets is the only way.

title: Bublup
description:
Bublup is the easiest way to visually save, organize, and share any content, all in one place.

Save links, documents, notes, videos, photos, GIFs, music, and more in visual folders with customizable pictures, titles, and descriptions for at-a-glance navigation. Folders (and sub-folders) keep your information in one organized place, so you never have to worry about misplacing your important files and links. Share something as epic as a new business venture or as common as choosing a new couch with your friends, family, or co-workers. With Bublup, your information is laid out the way you want it, and seen by who you choose.  

Give SOS a new meaning. Save. Organize. Share. 

KEY FEATURES:

VISUALLY ORGANIZE EVERYTHING (WE MEAN EVERYTHING!):

‚Ä¢ Create an unlimited number of private or shared visual folders and subfolders.
‚Ä¢ Save any content and resource type side-by-side: links, notes, documents (PDFs, Word, Excel, Google Docs, etc.), photos, videos (.mp4, Quicktime, YouTube, Vimeo, etc.), emails, and more.
‚Ä¢ Navigate your content at a glance with images, titles, and descriptions.

GO BEYOND BASIC CLOUD STORAGE:

‚Ä¢ Easily organize saved web links and files in the same folder, so everything you need is always at your fingertips.
‚Ä¢ Share your folders with others and start a conversation with comments and reactions.
‚Ä¢ Discover fascinating new content related to what you save with ‚Äúbubbled up‚Äù suggestions.
‚Ä¢ Share your content easily with anyone via messaging, email, social media, etc.

ROLL UP YOUR CONTENT:

‚Ä¢ In just a few seconds, create beautiful web pages (‚Äúrolls‚Äù) from your saved content.
‚Ä¢ Customize rolls easily by choosing themes and layouts.
‚Ä¢ Brand your roll for professional use by customizing the URL and logo.

PLENTY OF STORAGE, TOTAL PRIVACY:

‚Ä¢ Bublup is a free app!
‚Ä¢ Bookmark an unlimited number of links and get 3 GB of private storage, with the ability to earn up to 12 GB of extra storage -- 1 GB for each person who joins Bublup via your group folder invitation or personal referral link.
‚Ä¢ Upload files as large as 3 GB for free.
‚Ä¢ Everything you save is kept private and secure. You decide what to share and with whom.

BUBLUP WORKS FOR YOU:

Use it for work to:

‚Ä¢ Create a portfolio of your creative work.
‚Ä¢ Share educational resources in an organized space.
‚Ä¢ Save & share large files with clients or colleagues.
‚Ä¢ Collaborate with your team in a productive, private, and organized digital work space.

Use it in your personal life to:

‚Ä¢ Plan a trip.
‚Ä¢ Organize your favorite recipes.
‚Ä¢ Look for a new apartment.
‚Ä¢ Save family photos.

No matter what you‚Äôre interested in, you can save everything visually in Bublup and share it like a pro. Please contact us at support@bublup.com for assistance.

Get your stuff together. Get Bublup today.

Some of the features in this release include the following:
- Support for HEIC images
- App shortcuts
- Option to open links in their native apps
- Multi-column view for the Bubbling Up feed
- And lots more!
comments: Best app this year!! Love the ability to create different folders and even include your own notes on the recipes with your personal preferences... Very cool for recipes! I was using Keep Notes, but this is so much better. If you provide password protection for the folders, then Bublup will be the only app I use for note taking and organization.

Hi, using this have been great in saving important materials I like: recipes, dance videos, crafts, friends and family. It was going well and now it shows I'm "Temporarily Blocked." WHY? What is the problem? I ask that you please unblock me. I'm new at this and now its confusing. What to do?

I really do love this app. It's a MUCH better way to save (and share) content in a more visually organized, appealing & functional way than browser bookmarks/favs. Only 3 stars because it's still missing one VERY crucial feature: the ability to SAVE ITEMS TO MORE THAN ONE FOLDER AT A TIME. I save a TON of content that FREQUENTLY overlaps folder subjects. I must exit app & start over at square one EVERY time I want to save an item to an additional folder. My req for this feature was dismissed.

My favorite and most comprehensive note keeping app. It offers so much breadth in terms of how you save your media, yeah it's so simple! The interface, colors, effects are well thought out by the developers and work perfectly for someone like me who is ADHD. I need to see the functionality of an quickly app without having to listen to hours of tutorials just to learn the new folder system. Great App. I hope it sticks around because I've been raving about it too my friends

This is a good app, but dislike how you have to confirm the dialog box that says your file is now uploading (a notification that I could silence/minimize and that I don't have to dismiss would be much nicer, even if a premium feature). This app actually works for everything I need it to do, and seems to have a really good development team or else I'd notice little things being wrong while using it. The only thing lacking seems to be a password protected folder.

title: Hourglass Time
description:
This app allows you to submit your field service reports directly to a Congregation of Jehovah's Witnesses.  You can also view your past reports and receive notifications to remind you to turn in your time.

To use this app, you need an invitation from your Congregation Secretary. Open the invitation email on your device and accept the invitation.
descriptionHTML:
This app allows you to submit your field service reports directly to a Congregation of Jehovah's Witnesses. You can also view your past reports and receive notifications to remind you to turn in your time.

To use this app, you need an invitation from your Congregation Secretary. Open the invitation email on your device and accept the invitation.
summary: Receive reminders and submit field service reports to your congregation.
recentChanges: Bug fixes & performance improvements
comments: Great app and software. Hourglass makes the secretaries and the publishers reporting so easy and safe specially during this time of pandemic. This software is a great help for secretaries and the publishers. I really appreciate it.

App is great for our field service report. How ever, some field is not working. Like i can't type minutes. Need to type exact numer of hours without minutes. And number of bible studies not working. Also cant connect invitation to app. I just use chrome. Please fix some issues.
A excellent tool for secretaries, also for publishers making it easy to report field service.
It's accurate and efficient
Perfect for my situation so thank you.üëçüëçüëç

comments: The app is a nice one, but, there no way to save the text.How i wish one can save the text for future purpose.I realy enjoy the application but i want you to improve more and create a chance for saving text. I promised to share this app to all my friends and to let them know the importants of using this app instead of using the mobile keyboard it is more faster than typing on the keyboard.And the most wonderful thing of it is that, you can translate your texts to any language of choice.good job

Good but not exceptional. Picks up the peech quite well, but no easy verbal way to correct App's mistake or your change of mind. Have to do it manually!!! The most useless App I ever saw! I could not get it to do anything. There were no instructions. The Ads were beyond intrusive. A total waste of my time. It demanded for money to remove the adverts- but there was no guarantee that it would ever work.
It's nice .only that it can't convert some of my native spoken words to text.so many alphabets are missing in the English alphabets.its awesome
Great app, I found all what I needed in one App. Text on pic. Speech to text etc. All in one.

title: ScannerPro with Pdf Converter & Text Extractor
description:
ScannerPro is an idea that helps you to scan all types of documents and convert them into your desired format. These are the top features that our application offers you to perform.

1- Scan Image and Extract Text out of it 
Scanning images and extracting the text out of it, made possible with the ScannerPro app. The feature that everyone requires many times a day. You happen to see a banner physically, digitally on Facebook, Instagram, or whatever. You wanted to include it in your digital diary. But, your diary can only invite text data. Alright, ScannerPro is always there to help you out.

You just need to open the ScannerPro and start extracting the text out of the banner image. This is one of the practical cases when you practically need this feature. You will come across many of the cases related to it.

2- Convert Image into PDF
The multifunctional app invites you to convert an image or a set of images into PDF/Word format. The required feature is well-researched from different sources that people are looking for. With the help of ScannerPro, You are just a few clicks away from converting your images into the required format.

Upload the images and select the required option, the efficient algorithms will capture images into the desired format. In just a few seconds, it converts and comes with a button to download it. Once it is downloaded, you can use it according to your requirements like you do with another word/PDF documents.

3- Professional scanning with ScannerPro
The universities and office require you to send digital copies of your certificates, experience letters. One of the many cases when you need to scan your documents. ScannerPro is there to replace the bulky scanners which you kept using till now. Your android phone installed with the ScannerPro works like a pro scanner for your documents anytime you want.

title: TeuxDeux
description:
TeuxDeux is the easiest way for anyone to get organized ‚Äì we're an app that's as simple as a piece of paper. 

We believe that nothing beats a scrap piece of paper when it comes to lists‚Äìexcept a scrap piece of paper that can be magically accessed from anywhere. Automatically synced to the cloud, your TeuxDeux to-dos are backed up, secure, and available wherever you are.  

Our minimalist Swiss design lets you greet each day with an uncluttered mind. Continually updated for increased stability and speed you need to breeze through your workday. 

Your TeuxDeux app comes with:

recentChanges:
Everything you've asked for! Easily move to-do dates, swipe to tomorrow and more!
‚Ä¢ Easily move a todo from the Edit screen to a calendar day or Someday list
‚Ä¢ Some onboarding screens for the new kids including custom color and flying cat!

comments: Quite the pain. It asks you to login periodically on app version and often will not engage the keyboard, forcing me to close the app down to reopen it again. Not optimal for this usage, but more optimized for web only.

The new Android app version is not usable. It's not possible to move tasks to separate to-do lists. Additionally, I'm constantly getting signed out and in the end, I end up using TeuxDeux in my browser only. Please fix this or revert to the previous version, I enjoy the product, but not the Android app. I'm using Motorola One Fusion+ and Android 10
No offline mode, seriously?Literally, no internet, no lists, no adding tasks. Unusable as this makes it super unreliable. Also no real dark mode

New version needs some updates for ease of use. I like the look of the new UI, and it's still useful but it's harder to get to the separate To-Do lists like Grocery and Shopping instead of it being conveniently at the bottom. I think they had the right idea initially with the layout, just keep the new aesthetic. Also, I had no idea until checking reviews that swiping right or left deletes or edits until checking reviews

I chose this app in the first place because I could see my to do lists for each day of the week on the same screen and could easily edit and move things around. I also liked having the lists of my own creation underneath the weekly view, it made things easy to edit and navigate. I am deleting this app unless y'all change it back or give the user the option to choose between the updated or original version. This is not worth paying right now, and this used to be my favorite productivity app.

title: Brother Print Service Plugin
description:
The Brother Print Service Plugin enables you to print directly from your Android devices (Android 5.0 or later), to your Brother printer through a Wi-Fi network. As this is a plugin application, you can print using the "Print" option of supported Android apps. Please see below for supported applications (as of March 2015):

- Chrome Browser
- Gmail
- Photos
- Google Sheets
- Google Slides
- Google Docs
- Google Drive

The following print options are available (compatible options will depend on the selected device):

- Copies
- Paper Size
- Color/Mono
- Orientation
- Media Type
- Quality
- Layout
- 2-sided
- Borderless

After installing this application, you must activate it in one of the following ways:
- Tap the icon displayed in the notification area immediately after installation, and enable it in the displayed screen.
- Tap "Settings" on your Android device and tap "Printing", then select "Brother Print Service Plugin". Enable it in the displayed screen.

Please visit your local Brother website for supported models.
*Please note the email address mobile-apps-id@brother.com is for feedback only. Unfortunately we cannot reply to inquiries sent to this address.

recentChanges: Software Update
comments: this used to work but no longer works for me. Yes it installed ok, yes it is enabled in the printing services and shows up when you go to add a printer, but it just says "cannnot add printers'. I guess it doesn't work with Android 11. I am instead able to use the app called 'Brother iPrint&Scan' and that works well, though its not as convenient as printing right from apps themselves. workaround is to print from apps to a pdf or picture file, save it, then use 'Brother iPrint&Scan' to print the pdf or picture file.

Love Brother Service! What You NEED: 1) Install Brother Printer App 2) Install Brother Print Service Plugin 3) Be on "SAME" Wifi to printer wireless! (Your printer & Your Device -ex... Laptop, Phone, desktop computer). When you finish printing you can go BACK to your phone's own wifi. *Note: When your device is desktop or laptop computer...You can download drivers (from finding & matching to your specific desktop/laptop model! Hope this info helps you. It has never failed me so far. ;)

Provides extra print settings. The typical connectivity issues seen to be sure to the printer going idle. I usually tap through the menu on the printer to print settings, then immediately cancel the print job before it's done thinking about it. Within 10 seconds or so if that, my phone should be able to detect the printer on the network and this app can then be used to drive the print options page. All the folks saying it can't find the printer, I'm sure it's actually the printer, not this app.

Every time recently, I am getting the error that my printer is not available. Only from my phone. I can print from any other device. Nothing has changed in the last few months. Just seems if I don't print daily, it doesn't work. Beyond frustrating at this point.

I am beyond frustrated. The reviews are exactly what i have going on. Why is it not fixed. I would never have bought a brother printer had i known that there would be reboot after reboot and connection to my phone to print soooooo awful. When it works i call it a miracle and am so happy. Really, this is not helping me with my productivity.....

title: AdRabbit: Faster Marketing
description:
With AdRabbit, you only need a few minutes to create and run beautiful Facebook campaigns that get you more customers, all in one place. 

AdRabbit makes advertising on social media easy for small businesses - and the best part is that no design or digital marketing experience is required - AdRabbit takes care of everything for you:
Create beautiful ads in minutes

AdRabbit‚Äôs advanced AI technology finds the right audience, then runs and optimizes your ad for the best possible results - you don‚Äôt have to do anything!

Tons of ready-made ad designs to choose from in lots of different categories


Get access to AdRabbit‚Äôs free library of images, icons, color schemes, fonts, and other design elements


Easily customize your ads for your own business or import your own images or videos from your phone‚Äôs camera, gallery, social media, and storage drives


Don‚Äôt worry about different ad sizes - we take care of it all

Get ad budget suggestions depending on how many leads you want to attract


Monitor and track your ad‚Äôs performance directly from the AdRabbit app, so you can see what‚Äôs working best


View all your leads from your ads, and manage them all from one place! 


And there‚Äôs no need to install Facebook Business Manager or Facebook Ads Manager - AdRabbit takes care of everything for you, making social media marketing fast and easy.

CREATE BEAUTIFUL ADS IN MINUTES

Choose from tons of eye-catching, professional, ready-made ad templates made by experienced designers, created specifically with different business types in mind to ensure the best ad results, including:


Real-estate agents
Beauty salons
Hair-stylists
Fitness instructors
Personal trainers
Gyms 
Restaurants and coffee shops
Caterers
Personal chefs
And more!

You don‚Äôt have to worry about different ad sizes for different formats and devices - AdRabbit automatically resizes your ads for the different Facebook sizes and formats, as well as different resolutions for different devices. 

GET FREE ACCESS TO OUR HUGE IMAGE LIBRARY

Our free image library offers tons of pictures, icons, and other design elements that you can use in your ads, at no extra cost, and we‚Äôre constantly adding more! 

Alternatively, you can easily import your own images or pictures from your camera roll or storage.

EASILY CUSTOMIZE YOUR AD

AdRabbit‚Äôs powerful editing tools make editing fast and easy - just tap to change anything! Whether you want to edit your image, ad structure, color scheme, position, text, icons - all you need to do is tap the element and change it in seconds. 

GET BUDGET RECOMMENDATIONS

AdRabbit will recommend a daily budget for your ads, showing you approximately how many leads to expect for your ad spend. 

ADRABBIT AUTOMATICALLY RUNS AND OPTIMIZES YOUR AD

You don‚Äôt have to worry about finding the right audience, figuring out their interests or location, or optimizing your ad - AdRabbit‚Äôs advanced AI technology does it all for you, ensuring your ad is viewed by the right audience in the right location, so that each click costs you less. 

TRACK YOUR AD PERFORMANCE

Learn which ads are working best and compare them to other ads you‚Äôre running. You can also track views and leads for each ad. 

You can also easily rerun ads that performed well.

MANAGE YOUR LEADS

You can view the leads from every ad, and contact them directly from the app, allowing you to track and manage your leads from one place! 

Questions? We‚Äôre here to help!
Contact us at support@ad-rabbit.com

title: STOPit
description:
STOPit is transforming the way the world reports and prevents inappropriate behavior. Communities and organizations, such as schools, businesses, and governments, depend upon the individuals within them to speak up in order to keep people safe and mitigate risk. With a simple mobile app, STOPit instantly and anonymously enables users to share information with those who can help resolve issues. STOPit also equips administrators with a smart, easy backend system which supports anonymous two-way communication and other tools to save time and conduct effective, efficient investigations. Most importantly, STOPit is a powerful deterrent for inappropriate behavior. STOPit is helping create safe, smart places for people to live, work and learn.

With the STOPit app, you can anonymously report incidents to your school or employer, which may include text and photos or video. Use STOPit to anonymously alert your organization to inappropriate conduct or safety concerns such as harassment, bullying, ethics or compliance violations, weapons possession, hazing, safety hazards, threats, assault, or illegal activity, or to ask for help for yourself or another.

You can also use STOPit Messenger, which provides for two-way anonymous communication between you and your organization. With STOPit Messenger, your organization can respond to your report to ask questions, and you are able to provide more information, while remaining completely anonymous. You can also use STOPit Messenger to begin a completely anonymous conversation with someone from your organization.
Your organization may also use STOPit to provide you with access to Resources under Get Help. Your organization may also send you Notifications such as updates or alerts, which you will receive in the STOPit app.

Download STOPit for free and get started by entering the access code provided by your organization.

comments: Overall, pretty great game. The plot kept me interested enough, I thought the storyline with the evil Stop-It button being defeated by the Report button was intriguing. The graphics are stunning but the real joy comes from the gameplay, oh man the joy that can come from solving the "Write a report" puzzle, it's incredibly confusing because the game never tells you what actually qualifies as a death threat, so it was really challenging. Overall 7.8/10 too much water. -Will Bair, scientologist

this app is a good idea, that being said it is a idea that is not ever going to be perfect. Does it give some the voices to speak up, yes, but it also increases fear in the minds of students. The fear of messing up can take over ones mind small things that don't really matter. This app is a good way to speak up but it can just as easily be used to spread hate or push someone over the edge. This is a step to fixing a problem but one that needs much improvement.

I think the app has a wonderful purpose and purely good intent behind it--I'm a 16 year old that has endured hell itself with peers. While I love the message and meaning of it, my school is so small I'm rendered unable to use it; as everyone knows everyone, and though it is anonymous someone some way or another will find out and my a$$ will promptly be kicked. The bad reviews are truly pointless to me. Before you trash talk it: think about the meaning of it. Its intent is solely to help you.

Overall pretty good game good setup thought the "report button" could use a little bit more work. Wish the game could be cross platform so I can play with friends. Pretty challenging writing a report.

honestly the reviews are off the wall and i think they should improve to stop the nonsense reporting because if something was a crime or reporting someone doing something they shouldn't be doing all these petty reporting are wasting the police time. of course always go old school if it was emergency to call 911. as an example if there was a woman who her boyfriend was beating her and this is safest to report for help, she wont get help right away because of petty reports cops are investigating.

title: Calendar: Planner & Reminders
descriptionHTML:
The best Calendar, awesome Schedule Planner, great Organizer - all this can be said about our Planner, which allows you to make a To-Do List, set Reminders, make an Agenda and generally manage your Schedule for the day, week, month. and year. Also syncs with Google Calendar.

Some of the fantastic features of MC Calendar are:

üìÖ Calendar
‚óè Create reminders in a format convenient for you;
‚óè Manage the schedule planner with a simple drag and drop;
‚óè Create, manage and duplicate daily schedule;
‚óè Invite participants;

‚úÖ To-Do List
‚óè User friendly task management;
‚óè Syncing with Google that just works;
‚óè Grouping tasks in handy task lists;
‚óè Intelligent notifications exactly when you need them;
‚óè Smart home screen widgets show instantly what to do;
‚óè Add notes;

üé® Design and customization
‚óè Standard calendar views (daily, weekly, monthly and yearly basis);
‚óè Weekly view in two layouts: standard day-columns format and journal;
‚óè Use the interactive widget as your calendar icon;
‚óè Combined agenda and monthly views for more convenience;
‚óè Automatic day or week swiping of the past or upcoming events;
‚óè Graphical visualization;
‚óè Interactive widget (5 types);
‚óè Day and night modes for the user interface;
‚óè Highlighted working hours in daily and weekly views;
‚óè Other tweaks to match personal preferences;

Try some of the schedule planner features for free or activate the Pro version for more features. The Pro version is available as a monthly / yearly subscription or a one-time payment.

Some of the advanced features are:
‚óè Attaching files to events and tasks;
‚óè Printing tasks/events;
‚óè Creating up to five private calendars;
‚óè Accessing full data backup and recovery;
‚óè Application blocking;
‚óè Converting tasks into events;
‚óè Configurable number of days viewed (per week);
‚óè Visualization of the weekly schedule in different formats;
‚óè Graphic visualization of how busy you are;
‚óè Forwarding of tasks and events;
‚óè Invitations to events;

The calendar is easy to use online and offline!
Quick business calendar, or personal digital agenda manager planner!
Quickly switch between daily, weekly, monthly, yearly & event views!
No ads or annoying popups, truly great user experience!
No internet access needed, giving you more privacy, security, and stability!
Sync with Google Calendar, Outlook Calendar, Office365, etc.

Download the Calendar app for your Android and manage your time efficiently!

Our team constantly monitors the software and updates the app regularly, for all questions and suggestions, you can write to: support@mcontrol.com

Website: https://mccalendar.app
